original: 'di'i 'jug pa rigs pa med pa med pa can kho na yin no //
analyzed: 'di'i 'jug pa rigs pa med pa med pa can kho na yin no //
translated: But this is not the case.

original: byed pa'i yang dag pa'i man ngag rgyun chad pa can gyis byas pa yang mthong ngo //
analyzed: byed pa'i yang dag pa'i man ngag rgyun chad pa can gyis byas pa yang mthong ngo //
translated: And we see that the scriptures are composed by authors who are not omniscient.

original: gal te 'bad rtsol dang ldan pas dmigs pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gal te 'bad rtsol dang ldan pas dmigs pa yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that the scriptures are the object of effort,

original: ma yin te nges pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ma yin te nges pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: no, because there is no certainty.

original: gzhan la yang mi dmigs pa dang dmigs pa gzhan gyis bstan pa yid ches par bya ba ma yin pa las nges par rigs pa nyid ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan la yang mi dmigs pa dang dmigs pa gzhan gyis bstan pa yid ches par bya ba ma yin pa las nges par rigs pa nyid ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is not reasonable to be certain about something that is not perceived and that is not taught by a reliable person.

original: bdag nyid kyis byas pa dag la yang bsnyon pa mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bdag nyid kyis byas pa dag la yang bsnyon pa mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: And we see that people who are not omniscient are contradicted.

original: nges pa la brten par mi nus pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: nges pa la brten par mi nus pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: And it is not possible to rely on certainty.

original: ji ltar skyes bu 'di gzhan las //
analyzed: ji ltar skyes bu 'di gzhan las //
translated: Just as this person cannot

original: thos med par 'di yi ge dang / tshig bkod pa 'di brjod nus med //
analyzed: thos med par 'di yi ge dang / tshig bkod pa 'di brjod nus med //
translated: recite these words and letters without having heard them from another,

original: de ltar gzhan la'ang zhes 'ga' smra //
analyzed: de ltar gzhan la'ang zhes 'ga' smra //
translated: so it is with others.

original: gang skyes bus ma byas pa nyid min na /
analyzed: gang skyes bus ma byas pa nyid min na /
translated: If the scriptures were not composed by a person,

original: gang skyes bus byas pa yin zhes bya ba la sogs pa de nyid lan yin no //
analyzed: gang skyes bus byas pa yin zhes bya ba la sogs pa de nyid lan yin no //
translated: The answer to this is the same as the one given above, namely, that the scriptures are the work of human beings.

original: de ltar na gzhung bkod pa gzhan dag tu //
analyzed: de ltar na gzhung bkod pa gzhan dag tu //
translated: In this way, in other treatises that are composed,

original: spel pa yi ni gzhung gzhan yang //
analyzed: spel pa yi ni gzhung gzhan yang //
translated: there are other scriptures that are expanded.

original: man ngag med par gzhan rnams kyis //üîΩbrjod pa ci mthong na gang gis //
analyzed: man ngag med par gzhan rnams kyis // brjod pa ci mthong na gang gis //
translated: Without instruction, othersüîΩcannot read them, even if they see them.

original: de yang de ltar rjes mi dpogs //
analyzed: de yang de ltar rjes mi dpogs //
translated: And even if they do, they cannot infer the meaning from the words.

original: de ltar ba rnams man ngag med par klog par mi nus pa las gzhan du skyes bus ma byas pa nyid kyi rten cung zad kyang yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de ltar ba rnams man ngag med par klog par mi nus pa las gzhan du skyes bus ma byas pa nyid kyi rten cung zad kyang yod pa ma yin no //
translated: Thus, without instruction, one cannot read the scriptures. Apart from that, there is not the slightest basis for claiming that the scriptures are not the work of human beings.

original: de ni gcig gis brtsams pa'i gzhung gzhan la yang gzhan gyi dang mtshungs so //
analyzed: de ni gcig gis brtsams pa'i gzhung gzhan la yang gzhan gyi dang mtshungs so //
translated: The same is true of other treatises composed by other people.

original: de'i rjes su @330b 'bras nas thams cad de ltar rjes su dpog pa yin pa'am /üîΩ'ga' zhig kyang ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i rjes su @330b 'bras nas thams cad de ltar rjes su dpog pa yin pa'am / 'ga' zhig kyang ma yin no //
translated: If one were to infer that all scriptures are like that,üîΩthen one would be wrong about some of them.

original: de ni de ltar mi 'dod pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: de ni de ltar mi 'dod pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: But that is not what we maintain.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la 'dod pa ni de'i rten nyid yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang bshad zin to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la 'dod pa ni de'i rten nyid yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang bshad zin to //
translated: ‚ÄúDesire‚Äù and so on have already been explained as ‚Äúbecause it is the basis of that.‚ÄùüîΩMoreover,

original: gzhan yang / rig gang gang las rub pa des //
analyzed: gzhan yang / rig gang gang las rub pa des //
translated: Whatever is the basis of cognition,

original: rgyu ma mthong ba can gzhan yang //
analyzed: rgyu ma mthong ba can gzhan yang //
translated: That is not seen as a cause.

original: bye brag med par me shing bzhin //
analyzed: bye brag med par me shing bzhin //
translated: Without distinction, like fire and fuel,

original: de las 'gyur bar yang dag shes //
analyzed: de las 'gyur bar yang dag shes //
translated: It is known to be the transformation of that.

original: rgyu ma mthong ba'i phyir rgyu med pa can zhes bya ba ma yin no //üîΩdngos po rgyu ma mthong ba can yin na yang de las gzhan pa dag gi rang bzhin tha dad pa nyams su myong ba med par de lta bu'i rnam pa yang dag par rjes su dpog par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rgyu ma mthong ba'i phyir rgyu med pa can zhes bya ba ma yin no // dngos po rgyu ma mthong ba can yin na yang de las gzhan pa dag gi rang bzhin tha dad pa nyams su myong ba med par de lta bu'i rnam pa yang dag par rjes su dpog par 'gyur ro //
translated: It is not called ‚Äúcauseless‚Äù because the cause is not seen.üîΩEven though the thing has a cause that is not seen, it is inferred in that way, without experiencing a difference in the nature of anything else.

original: rgyu'i ngo bo log tu zin kyang de'i ngo bo log pa ma yin na ni 'bras bu chos las 'das pa'i phyir //
analyzed: rgyu'i ngo bo log tu zin kyang de'i ngo bo log pa ma yin na ni 'bras bu chos las 'das pa'i phyir //
translated: If, even when the nature of the cause has ceased, its nature has not ceased, then the effect would be beyond all the principles of reality.

original: de las 'gyur ba med pas na cung zhing de ltar brjod par bya ba ma yin pa'am /
analyzed: de las 'gyur ba med pas na cung zhing de ltar brjod par bya ba ma yin pa'am /
translated: Since it would not transform from that, it would not be possible to say anything about it at all.

original: ngo bo bye brag bstan par bya ba yin na ni da gang gis rgyu de'i rjes su byed par 'gyur /
analyzed: ngo bo bye brag bstan par bya ba yin na ni da gang gis rgyu de'i rjes su byed par 'gyur /
translated: If it is the case that the nature of the effect is taught, then what is it that conforms to the cause?

original: gang zhig 'dod pa dang mi 'dod pa phyin ci log tu mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang zhig 'dod pa dang mi 'dod pa phyin ci log tu mi 'gyur ro //
translated: And what is it that does not conform to the cause?

original: rgyu'i rang bzhin ldog pa las kyang dngos po rnams tha dad pa med pa yin no //
analyzed: rgyu'i rang bzhin ldog pa las kyang dngos po rnams tha dad pa med pa yin no //
translated: And, the effect is not different from the cause, because of the cessation of the nature of the cause.

original: tha dad pa de ni glo bur par 'gyur ba'i phyir 'ga' zhig tu yang ldog par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: tha dad pa de ni glo bur par 'gyur ba'i phyir 'ga' zhig tu yang ldog par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: And, the difference is adventitious, because it does not cease at all.

original: de bas na rang bzhin gang las skye ba can du mthong ba gang yin pa de ni gzhan la yang tha dad par mi byed pa na shing dang me bzhin du rang bzhin bdag nyid kyis de'i 'bras bu nyid las 'das pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de bas na rang bzhin gang las skye ba can du mthong ba gang yin pa de ni gzhan la yang tha dad par mi byed pa na shing dang me bzhin du rang bzhin bdag nyid kyis de'i 'bras bu nyid las 'das pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, that which is seen to arise from a nature does not make a difference in anything else, just as a tree and fire do not.

original: de la 'bras mtshungs mthong ba'i phyir //
analyzed: de la 'bras mtshungs mthong ba'i phyir //
translated: Because of seeing the same effect,

original: khyad par dag ni ma bstan par //
analyzed: khyad par dag ni ma bstan par //
translated: without teaching a difference,

original: gtan tshigs rab tu spros pa dag / de dag thams cad 'khrul pa yin //
analyzed: gtan tshigs rab tu spros pa dag / de dag thams cad 'khrul pa yin //
translated: all of these elaborations of reasons are mistaken.

original: dper na thog mar 'dron pos gtang ba'i me nyid kyang 'dron pos btang ba'i me nyid yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: dper na thog mar 'dron pos gtang ba'i me nyid kyang 'dron pos btang ba'i me nyid yin pa'i phyir /
translated: For example, the fire that is first set by the travelers is the fire that is set by the travelers.

original: me gzhan sngon du song ba can yin gyis //
analyzed: me gzhan sngon du song ba can yin gyis //
translated: It has another fire as its antecedent,

original: gtsub shing gtsubs pa sngon du song ba can ni ma yin te /
analyzed: gtsub shing gtsubs pa sngon du song ba can ni ma yin te /
translated: but it does not have the rubbing sticks as its antecedent,

original: de ma thag pa'i me bzhin no //
analyzed: de ma thag pa'i me bzhin no //
translated: like the fire that is immediately antecedent.

original: ji ltar na 'dron pos btang ba'i me yang 'khrul pa yin te /
analyzed: ji ltar na 'dron pos btang ba'i me yang 'khrul pa yin te /
translated: How is it that the fire that is set by the travelers is mistaken?

original: me las byung ba'i nus pa la brten nas me'i rgyu gzhan spong bar byed do //
analyzed: me las byung ba'i nus pa la brten nas me'i rgyu gzhan spong bar byed do //
translated: On the basis of the power that arises from fire, one eliminates the other causes of fire.

original: gal te me med par yang 'gyur na ni gzhan dag la yang 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: gal te me med par yang 'gyur na ni gzhan dag la yang 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: If it were to occur even in the absence of fire, it would occur in other things as well.

original: de la me nyid dang cig shos las byung bdag la gnod par bya ba dang gnod par byed pa med pas me las byung ba nyid ni gzhan dag la yang 'gyur ba /
analyzed: de la me nyid dang cig shos las byung bdag la gnod par bya ba dang gnod par byed pa med pas me las byung ba nyid ni gzhan dag la yang 'gyur ba /
translated: In that case, since there is no object that is burned and no agent that burns in either fire or something else, that which arises from fire would occur in other things as well.

original: @331a * // de ltar na chos gnyis dag don gcig la srid pa'i phyir /
analyzed: @331a * // de ltar na chos gnyis dag don gcig la srid pa'i phyir /
translated: Thus, since two properties are possible in one thing,üîΩthe fire that is set by the travelers

original: 'dron pos btang ba'i me'am /üîΩdon gzhan ni gcig la /
analyzed: 'dron pos btang ba'i me'am /üîΩdon gzhan ni gcig la /
translated: The fire that is set by travelersüîΩorüîΩanother person is one thing.üîΩ

original: so sor nges par 'gyur ba med pas na 'khrul par dogs pa yin no /
analyzed: so sor nges par 'gyur ba med pas na 'khrul par dogs pa yin no /
translated: Therefore, there is no fear of error.

original: phan tshun tha dad pa can gyi chos gnyis 'jug pa de yang phyi'i dngos po la 'gal ba med do //
analyzed: phan tshun tha dad pa can gyi chos gnyis 'jug pa de yang phyi'i dngos po la 'gal ba med do //
translated: And the occurrence of two properties that are mutually different is not contradictory in external things.

original: zhes brjod par bya ba'i gnas skabs tha dad pa can gyi khyad par ni ma yin te /
analyzed: zhes brjod par bya ba'i gnas skabs tha dad pa can gyi khyad par ni ma yin te /
translated: But it is not the case that the difference of the two states is different.

original: cha med pa'i bdag nyid las de nyid dang de nyid ma yin pa 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: cha med pa'i bdag nyid las de nyid dang de nyid ma yin pa 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is contradictory that what is partless has both that nature and a different nature.

original: 'dron pos btang ba'i me la me dang cig shos kyis bskyed pa ni gnod bya dang gnod byed ma yin te /
analyzed: 'dron pos btang ba'i me la me dang cig shos kyis bskyed pa ni gnod bya dang gnod byed ma yin te /
translated: The fire that is abandoned by the caravan and the fire that is produced by the other is not the object damaged and the object damaging.

original: de ni mes bskyed pa med par mi srid pa med pa'i phyir ro //üîΩde lta bur gyur pa'i 'dron pos btang ba'i me me las byung ba zhes bya bar ni 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: de ni mes bskyed pa med par mi srid pa med pa'i phyir ro // de lta bur gyur pa'i 'dron pos btang ba'i me me las byung ba zhes bya bar ni 'gyur gyi /
translated: Because it is not impossible that it is not produced by fire.

original: thams cad ni ma yin te /
analyzed: thams cad ni ma yin te /
translated: The fire that is abandoned by the caravan becomes that which is produced from fire, but not everything.

original: de la khyad par spong bar byed par mi nus pa'i phyir dang / khyad par yod pa can gyi de'i gnas skabs can nyid la nges pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de la khyad par spong bar byed par mi nus pa'i phyir dang / khyad par yod pa can gyi de'i gnas skabs can nyid la nges pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is not possible to eliminate the distinction in that way, and because there is no certainty that the state of having a distinction exists.

original: gal te me med par yang 'gyur na ni gzhan dag la yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te me med par yang 'gyur na ni gzhan dag la yang 'gyur ro //
translated: If it were to occur even without fire, it would occur in other things as well.

original: zhes bya ba gal te tshogs pa gang gis der 'gyur ba na de 'gyur zhing 'gyur ba nyid yin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba gal te tshogs pa gang gis der 'gyur ba na de 'gyur zhing 'gyur ba nyid yin no //
translated: If it were to occur in a collection in which that exists, then it would occur in that and would be just that.

original: de yod pas bstan nas de med par bstan par 'gyur ba'am de la me'am de med par ston na der 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de yod pas bstan nas de med par bstan par 'gyur ba'am de la me'am de med par ston na der 'gyur ro //
translated: If it were to occur when that exists, and then occur when that does not exist, or if it were to occur in that or in the absence of that, then it would occur.

original: de bas na gcig gis 'don par byed pa gzhan sngon du song ba can yin pa de lta bu'i ngo bor thams cad sgrub par byed pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de bas na gcig gis 'don par byed pa gzhan sngon du song ba can yin pa de lta bu'i ngo bor thams cad sgrub par byed pa ma yin te /
translated: Therefore, since one is not established as having another as its prior state, all are not established as having that nature.

original: de la rnam pa gzhan du mi srid pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de la rnam pa gzhan du mi srid pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is not impossible for it to be otherwise.

original: de byed pa'i spobs pa dang bral ba de lta bu'i rnam pa la ni de ltar 'gyur ba'i phyir de lta bur gyur pa kho na brjod par bya bar 'gyur la /
analyzed: de byed pa'i spobs pa dang bral ba de lta bu'i rnam pa la ni de ltar 'gyur ba'i phyir de lta bur gyur pa kho na brjod par bya bar 'gyur la /
translated: But in the case of a person who is devoid of the requisite confidence, such a statement would be meaningless.

original: bye brag med par khyad par srid pa can de brjod na ni mdzes par thob pa ma yin no //
analyzed: bye brag med par khyad par srid pa can de brjod na ni mdzes par thob pa ma yin no //
translated: But if the statement is made without any distinction, then it is not a proper statement.

original: ji ltar khyad par srid pa yin //
analyzed: ji ltar khyad par srid pa yin //
translated: How can there be a distinction?

original: gang gi tshe skyes bus de dag kyang nus pa med pa kho na yin te /
analyzed: gang gi tshe skyes bus de dag kyang nus pa med pa kho na yin te /
translated: When a person is incapable of doing something,

original: de ltar ba'i skyes bu 'dra'o //
analyzed: de ltar ba'i skyes bu 'dra'o //
translated: then he is like a non-person.

original: nus pa dag la 'gal ba cung zad kyang mthong ba med pa'i phyir dang / mi 'gal ba sgrub pa can mi dmigs pa'i sbyor ba ni go bar byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: nus pa dag la 'gal ba cung zad kyang mthong ba med pa'i phyir dang / mi 'gal ba sgrub pa can mi dmigs pa'i sbyor ba ni go bar byed pa ma yin no //
translated: And since no contradiction is seen in the case of a person who is capable, the non-apprehension of what is non-contradictory cannot serve as a probative argument.

original: dbang po las 'das pa dag la ni 'gal ba rtogs pa yod pa ma yin no zhes bshad zin to //
analyzed: dbang po las 'das pa dag la ni 'gal ba rtogs pa yod pa ma yin no zhes bshad zin to //
translated: And in the case of what is beyond the senses, there can be no apprehension of contradiction.

original: sbyor ba 'di yang sbyor ba snga ma las tha dad pa ma yin no //
analyzed: sbyor ba 'di yang sbyor ba snga ma las tha dad pa ma yin no //
translated: This argument is no different from the previous one.

original: gal te skyes bus @331b nus par 'gyur na da ltar bas kyang yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gal te skyes bus @331b nus par 'gyur na da ltar bas kyang yin no zhe na /
translated: If a person could be capable, he would be so now.

original: khyad par med pa yin na der 'gyur na /
analyzed: khyad par med pa yin na der 'gyur na /
translated: If there were no difference, that would be so.

original: de yang bsgrub par dka' ba yin no //
analyzed: de yang bsgrub par dka' ba yin no //
translated: But that is difficult to establish.

original: gang la gcig nus pa med pa de las skyes bus thams cad kyang zhes bya ba yang snga ma bzhin du 'khrul pa yin te /
analyzed: gang la gcig nus pa med pa de las skyes bus thams cad kyang zhes bya ba yang snga ma bzhin du 'khrul pa yin te /
translated: If one thing is incapable, then all things are incapable in that regard, as before.

original: bha ra ta la sogs pa da ltar ba rnams la yang nus pa med pa yin na yang 'ga' zhig la nus pa grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bha ra ta la sogs pa da ltar ba rnams la yang nus pa med pa yin na yang 'ga' zhig la nus pa grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Even though the present, such as the Bharata, are incapable, some are established as capable.

original: de bas na rgyu rnam par 'byed par byed pas /
analyzed: de bas na rgyu rnam par 'byed par byed pas /
translated: Therefore, the cause is distinguished.

original: de las byung ba can dang de las byung ba can ma yin pa'i don rnams kyi yang rang bzhin gyi khyad par bstan par bya'o //
analyzed: de las byung ba can dang de las byung ba can ma yin pa'i don rnams kyi yang rang bzhin gyi khyad par bstan par bya'o //
translated: The nature of things that arise from it and that do not arise from it should be taught.

original: de med na thams cad de'i bdag nyid can nam 'ga' zhig kyang ma yin no //
analyzed: de med na thams cad de'i bdag nyid can nam 'ga' zhig kyang ma yin no //
translated: If it does not exist, then everything has that nature or nothing has that nature.

original: 'di la 'jig rten pa dang rig byed pa dag gi rang bzhin gyi khyad par mthong ba med do //
analyzed: 'di la 'jig rten pa dang rig byed pa dag gi rang bzhin gyi khyad par mthong ba med do //
translated: In this regard, the nature of worldly and Vedic things is not seen.

original: de yod pa ma yin pa de dag mtshungs pa nyid du mthong ba'i phyir /
analyzed: de yod pa ma yin pa de dag mtshungs pa nyid du mthong ba'i phyir /
translated: Because they see that the existence of those is the same as their nonexistence.

original: gcig gi chos 'ga' zhig rnam par 'byed pa'i de'i rang bzhin srid pa des 'khrul par dogs pa'i brjod pa can du 'byed do //
analyzed: gcig gi chos 'ga' zhig rnam par 'byed pa'i de'i rang bzhin srid pa des 'khrul par dogs pa'i brjod pa can du 'byed do //
translated: Therefore, they distinguish the one from the other, fearing that the nature of one will be confused with the nature of the other.

original: rig byed de rig byed ma yin pa dag la de nyid kyi mtshan nyid can gyi khyad par yod pa ma yin nam //
analyzed: rig byed de rig byed ma yin pa dag la de nyid kyi mtshan nyid can gyi khyad par yod pa ma yin nam //
translated: Don‚Äôt the Vedas have a distinctive characteristic that is not found in non-Vedas?

original: yod pa bden te de dag 'ba' zhig kho na la ma yin te /
analyzed: yod pa bden te de dag 'ba' zhig kho na la ma yin te /
translated: It is true that they do, but not only in them.

original: 'on kyang kha bya'i mna' gtam dang cig shos dag la yang yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang kha bya'i mna' gtam dang cig shos dag la yang yin no //
translated: They also exist in the words of the KƒÅkavƒÅr·π£i·πáya and in other texts.

original: rang nyid kyi lo rgyus kyi bye brag gsal bar byed pa'i ming gi khyad par gyis skyes bus byas pa la gnod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: rang nyid kyi lo rgyus kyi bye brag gsal bar byed pa'i ming gi khyad par gyis skyes bus byas pa la gnod pa ma yin te /
translated: The distinctive names that clarify the specific details of one‚Äôs own history do not invalidate the fact that they were composed by a person.

original: gzhan dag la yang thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan dag la yang thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the same consequence applies to others.

original: gal te de 'dra ba'i sbyor ba skyes bus byed par mi nus par 'gyur ba'am /
analyzed: gal te de 'dra ba'i sbyor ba skyes bus byed par mi nus par 'gyur ba'am /
translated: If such a composition is not possible for a person,üîΩthen it is not possible for a god either.

original: byas pa lam byas pa'i brdas rnam par 'byed pas 'gyur ba na /
analyzed: byas pa lam byas pa'i brdas rnam par 'byed pas 'gyur ba na /
translated: The Vedas are revealed by the change of the letters of the mantras, which are the means of achieving the desired objects.

original: rig byed skyes bus ma byas par gsal ba yin no //
analyzed: rig byed skyes bus ma byas par gsal ba yin no //
translated: Thus the Vedas are clearly not composed by a person.

original: skyes bu dag gi sngags byed pa'i nus pa dang mi ldan pa kho na ma yin nam /
analyzed: skyes bu dag gi sngags byed pa'i nus pa dang mi ldan pa kho na ma yin nam /
translated: But aren‚Äôt the mantras composed by persons?

original: de ni 'og nas rnam par dpyad par bya'o //
analyzed: de ni 'og nas rnam par dpyad par bya'o //
translated: This will be investigated later.

original: gzhan yang sngags zhes bya ba gzhan cung zad kyang yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan yang sngags zhes bya ba gzhan cung zad kyang yod pa ma yin no //
translated: Moreover, there is no other so-called mantra.

original: 'o na ci yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci yin zhe na /
translated: What is it?

original: bden pa dang dka' thub kyi mthu dang ldan pa'i 'dod pa'i don sgrub par byed pa'i tshig yin te /
analyzed: bden pa dang dka' thub kyi mthu dang ldan pa'i 'dod pa'i don sgrub par byed pa'i tshig yin te /
translated: It is a statement that accomplishes the desired object through the power of truth and austerity.

original: de ni da ltar nyid kyang skyes bu rnams la snang ba kho na yin te /
analyzed: de ni da ltar nyid kyang skyes bu rnams la snang ba kho na yin te /
translated: This is clearly seen in persons even today.

original: bdag nyid ji lta ba bzhin du bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs las dug dang me la sogs pa kun nas rengs par byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bdag nyid ji lta ba bzhin du bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs las dug dang me la sogs pa kun nas rengs par byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Through the power of the blessing of truth, just as they are, they paralyze poison, fire, and so on.

original: da ltar yang ri khrod 'ga' zhig sngags byed pa'i phyir @332a * //
analyzed: da ltar yang ri khrod 'ga' zhig sngags byed pa'i phyir @332a * //
translated: Even today, in some mountain regions,

original: dang / rig byed ma yin pa'i sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i sngags dang rtogs pa dag mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dang / rig byed ma yin pa'i sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i sngags dang rtogs pa dag mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: and because the mantras and the knowledge of the Buddha, etc., are seen to be not produced by a person.

original: de dag kyang skyes bus ma byas pa nyid yin na de skyes bus ma byas pa bden pa yin te /
analyzed: de dag kyang skyes bus ma byas pa nyid yin na de skyes bus ma byas pa bden pa yin te /
translated: And if they are not produced by a person, they are true.

original: 'di ltar sangs rgyas pa dang cig shos dag gi sngags dang rtogs pa dag la 'tshe ba dang / 'khrig pa dang bdag tu lta ba la sogs pa mngon par mtho ba ma yin pa'i rgyu dang rnam pa gzhan du brjod do //
analyzed: 'di ltar sangs rgyas pa dang cig shos dag gi sngags dang rtogs pa dag la 'tshe ba dang / 'khrig pa dang bdag tu lta ba la sogs pa mngon par mtho ba ma yin pa'i rgyu dang rnam pa gzhan du brjod do //
translated: Thus, the mantras and the knowledge of the Buddhists and the non-Buddhists are said to be causes of non-prosperity, and are described in other ways, as being harmful, sexual, and having the view of self.

original: de ji ltar na gcig la 'gal ba brjod na gnyis bden par 'gyur /
analyzed: de ji ltar na gcig la 'gal ba brjod na gnyis bden par 'gyur /
translated: How can one say that they are contradictory and that both are true?

original: de la don gzhan du rtogs pa na de ni gzhan la yang mtshungs pa de ltar na don la nges pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de la don gzhan du rtogs pa na de ni gzhan la yang mtshungs pa de ltar na don la nges pa'i phyir /
translated: If one understands them in another way, that is the same for the other. Thus, because of the certainty of the meaning,

original: 'ga' zhig kyang rtogs par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'ga' zhig kyang rtogs par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: nothing is understood.

original: de ltar na yang skyes bus ma byas pa yin du zin kyang nye bar mkho ba ma yin no //
analyzed: de ltar na yang skyes bus ma byas pa yin du zin kyang nye bar mkho ba ma yin no //
translated: Even so, although they are not produced by a person, they are not useful.

original: sangs rgyas pa la sogs pa dag gi sngags nyid ma yin na de las gzhan pa la yang mna' chu btung dgos par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sangs rgyas pa la sogs pa dag gi sngags nyid ma yin na de las gzhan pa la yang mna' chu btung dgos par 'gyur ro //
translated: If the mantras of the Buddhists and so on are not mantras, then one should drink the water of an oath from someone other than them.

original: sangs rgyas pa la sogs pa dag dug gi las la sogs pa byed pa mthong ste /
analyzed: sangs rgyas pa la sogs pa dag dug gi las la sogs pa byed pa mthong ste /
translated: One sees that Buddhists and so on perform the actions of poison and so on.

original: de la yang sngags nyid bkag pa med do //
analyzed: de la yang sngags nyid bkag pa med do //
translated: And there is no prohibition of mantras in that regard.

original: phyag rgya dang dkyil 'khor dang bsam gtan yi ge med pa can dag gis kyang las rnams byed par 'gyur te /
analyzed: phyag rgya dang dkyil 'khor dang bsam gtan yi ge med pa can dag gis kyang las rnams byed par 'gyur te /
translated: Also, actions are performed by means of seals, ma·πá·∏çalas, and meditations that do not have syllables.

original: de dag ni skyes bus ma byas pa dang rtag par rigs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de dag ni skyes bus ma byas pa dang rtag par rigs pa ma yin no //
translated: But it is not reasonable that they are not made by a person and are permanent.

original: de dag gi byed pa yod na skyes bu rnams yi ge bkod pa byed pa la 'gal ci yod /
analyzed: de dag gi byed pa yod na skyes bu rnams yi ge bkod pa byed pa la 'gal ci yod /
translated: If they have a maker, what is the contradiction in saying that people arrange the syllables?

original: de bas na de dag gi byed pa nus pa med pa na cir yang mi rung ngo //
analyzed: de bas na de dag gi byed pa nus pa med pa na cir yang mi rung ngo //
translated: Therefore, if they are not capable of making them, then they are not suitable for anything.

original: da ni ji ltar na bden pa las byung ba can gyi sngags dang rtogs pa phan tshun 'gal ba dag yin /
analyzed: da ni ji ltar na bden pa las byung ba can gyi sngags dang rtogs pa phan tshun 'gal ba dag yin /
translated: Now, how are the mantras and realizations that arise from the truth mutually contradictory?

original: de dag ni thams cad du bden pa las byung ba can dag ma yin te /
analyzed: de dag ni thams cad du bden pa las byung ba can dag ma yin te /
translated: They are not all mantras that arise from the truth.

original: skyes bu mthu dang ldan pa'i dam bcas pa'i mtshan nyid can dag la yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: skyes bu mthu dang ldan pa'i dam bcas pa'i mtshan nyid can dag la yang 'gyur ro //
translated: The power of a person is the characteristic of a vow.

original: mthu de ni 'gro ba dang grub pa'i khyad par dag las kyang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mthu de ni 'gro ba dang grub pa'i khyad par dag las kyang 'gyur ro //
translated: That power is also from the special attainment of going.

original: gal te sngags skyes bus byas pa yin na skyes bu thams cad ci'i phyir sngags byed pa ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gal te sngags skyes bus byas pa yin na skyes bu thams cad ci'i phyir sngags byed pa ma yin no zhe na /
translated: If the mantra is made by a person, why is it that not all persons make the mantra?

original: de byed pa'i sgrub par byed pa dang bral ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de byed pa'i sgrub par byed pa dang bral ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is devoid of the means of making it.

original: gal te de 'dra ba'i bden pa dang dka' thub la sogs pa dang ldan par 'gyur na byed pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te de 'dra ba'i bden pa dang dka' thub la sogs pa dang ldan par 'gyur na byed pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: If it were endowed with such truth, austerity, etc., it would be made.

original: gzhan yang skyes bu snyan dngags byed pa'i phyir //
analyzed: gzhan yang skyes bu snyan dngags byed pa'i phyir //
translated: Moreover, because a person composes poetry,

original: skyes bu thams cad snyan dngags byed par 'gyur la /
analyzed: skyes bu thams cad snyan dngags byed par 'gyur la /
translated: all persons would compose poetry.

original: mi byed na 'ga' zhig @332b kyang mi byed pa de dang 'dra bar de ltar na rig pa de dag ni snga na med pa yin no //
analyzed: mi byed na 'ga' zhig @332b kyang mi byed pa de dang 'dra bar de ltar na rig pa de dag ni snga na med pa yin no //
translated: If they do not compose, then none would compose. It is like that. Thus those knowledges are non-existent.

original: sngags byed pa'i sgrub par byed pa dang bral ba dag sngags mi byed pa ni bden na /
analyzed: sngags byed pa'i sgrub par byed pa dang bral ba dag sngags mi byed pa ni bden na /
translated: But it is true that those who are not engaged in the performance of a mantra do not perform a mantra.

original: tshogs pa de yang 'ga' zhig la yang ma mthong ste /
analyzed: tshogs pa de yang 'ga' zhig la yang ma mthong ste /
translated: But we have never seen such a collection.

original: skyes bu rnams ni chos mtshungs pa can nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: skyes bu rnams ni chos mtshungs pa can nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because people are similar in their nature.

original: 'dir sngags zhes bya ba bden pa la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i tshig dang dam bcas pa las gzhan cung zad kyang med do zhes bshad zin to //
analyzed: 'dir sngags zhes bya ba bden pa la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i tshig dang dam bcas pa las gzhan cung zad kyang med do zhes bshad zin to //
translated: Here we have already explained that a mantra is nothing but words endowed with truth and so on, and a promise.

original: de dag kyang skyes bu 'ga' zhig la mthong ngo //
analyzed: de dag kyang skyes bu 'ga' zhig la mthong ngo //
translated: And we have seen that in some people these are present.

original: skyes bu thams cad de dang bral ba yin pa de ltar yang nges pa yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: skyes bu thams cad de dang bral ba yin pa de ltar yang nges pa yod pa ma yin te /
translated: But it is not certain that all people are devoid of these,

original: de yod pa la 'gal ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de yod pa la 'gal ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is no contradiction in their presence.

original: lkog tu gyur pa'i rang bzhin can dag las mi dmigs pa'i nges pa'i gtan tshigs ma yin no //
analyzed: lkog tu gyur pa'i rang bzhin can dag las mi dmigs pa'i nges pa'i gtan tshigs ma yin no //
translated: And nonapprehension is not a valid reason for the certainty of an unknown nature.

original: dran pa dang blo dang so sor rig pa dang bden pa dang nus pa thams cad la 'gyur ba yang ma yin no //
analyzed: dran pa dang blo dang so sor rig pa dang bden pa dang nus pa thams cad la 'gyur ba yang ma yin no //
translated: And there is no change in all memory, understanding, awareness, truth, and ability.

original: de sgrub par byed pa'i yang dag pa'i man ngag gi khyad par 'dra bar yon tan gzhan sgrub par byed pa dag kyang yod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de sgrub par byed pa'i yang dag pa'i man ngag gi khyad par 'dra bar yon tan gzhan sgrub par byed pa dag kyang yod par 'gyur ro //
translated: and there are also other special correct instructions for accomplishing that, which are similar.

original: yod du zin kyang thams cad mthong bar nus pa yang ma yin no //
analyzed: yod du zin kyang thams cad mthong bar nus pa yang ma yin no //
translated: Even if they exist, it is not possible to see everything.

original: de nyid kyi phyir ma mthong ba la bsnyon du med do //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir ma mthong ba la bsnyon du med do //
translated: Therefore, it is not denied that something is not seen.

original: skyes bu rnams yon tan 'ga' zhig bskyed par 'dod pa la yang 'gal bar byed pa med do //
analyzed: skyes bu rnams yon tan 'ga' zhig bskyed par 'dod pa la yang 'gal bar byed pa med do //
translated: There is no contradiction in people desiring to develop some qualities.

original: gnod par bya ba ma mthong bas gnod par bya ba dang gnod par byed pa ngo bo ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gnod par bya ba ma mthong bas gnod par bya ba dang gnod par byed pa ngo bo ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the object of refutation and the refutation are not established as entities, since the object of refutation is not seen.

original: des ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'gog pa la sogs pa'i lan nges par brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: des ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'gog pa la sogs pa'i lan nges par brjod pa yin no //
translated: This expresses the answer to the refutation of omniscient knowledge, etc.

original: de la de sgrub par byed pa'i yang dag pa'i man ngag med pa can 'di ci 'dra ba gzhan dag kyang de lta bur gyur pa yin na /
analyzed: de la de sgrub par byed pa'i yang dag pa'i man ngag med pa can 'di ci 'dra ba gzhan dag kyang de lta bur gyur pa yin na /
translated: If this person, who lacks the correct instruction for accomplishing that, is like that, then others are also like that.

original: de lta bur gyur pa yang ma yin no zhes bya ba ni rigs pa yin gyi shes par byed pa ma mthong ba can ma yin no zhes bya ba yang ma yin te /
analyzed: de lta bur gyur pa yang ma yin no zhes bya ba ni rigs pa yin gyi shes par byed pa ma mthong ba can ma yin no zhes bya ba yang ma yin te /
translated: It is logical to say that it is not like that, but it is not logical to say that it is not seen to be the cause.

original: yod du zin kyang 'bras bu rtsom pa med pa srid pa'i phyir dang / rang bzhin gyis bskal pa rnams ni mthong bar mi nus pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: yod du zin kyang 'bras bu rtsom pa med pa srid pa'i phyir dang / rang bzhin gyis bskal pa rnams ni mthong bar mi nus pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Even if it is seen, it is possible that the effect does not commence, and it is impossible to see that which is naturally hidden.

original: de bas na 'don par byed pa yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de bas na 'don par byed pa yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Therefore, it is not logical to say thatüîΩbecause it is a cause,üîΩit is preceded by another cause.

original: 'don par byed pa ni 'don par byed pa gzhan sngon du song ba can yin no zhes bya ba ni 'khrul pa yin te /
analyzed: 'don par byed pa ni 'don par byed pa gzhan sngon du song ba can yin no zhes bya ba ni 'khrul pa yin te /
translated: This is a mistake,

original: bha ra ta 'don par byed pa la yang yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bha ra ta 'don par byed pa la yang yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is also possible that the cause of the recitation of the Bharata is a cause.

original: rig byed kyi khyad par du byas pa'i phyir skyon med pa ma yin nam zhe na /üîΩrig byed 'don @333a * //
analyzed: rig byed kyi khyad par du byas pa'i phyir skyon med pa ma yin nam zhe na / rig byed 'don @333a * //
translated: But is it not faultless because it is distinguished as a Vedic recitation?

original: par byed pa la phul du byung ba yang ci zhig yod na gang gis rnam pa gzhan gyis 'don par mi nus pa yin /
analyzed: par byed pa la phul du byung ba yang ci zhig yod na gang gis rnam pa gzhan gyis 'don par mi nus pa yin /
translated: What is so special about the recitation of the Veda that it cannot be recited in another way?

original: mi mthun pa'i phyogs dang khyad par 'gal ba med pa 'di las gtan tshigs ldog par byed pa ma yin te /
analyzed: mi mthun pa'i phyogs dang khyad par 'gal ba med pa 'di las gtan tshigs ldog par byed pa ma yin te /
translated: This reason is not reversed by the non-existence of incompatibility and the absence of a specific contradiction.

original: 'gal ba med pa dag ni gcig la srid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'gal ba med pa dag ni gcig la srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the absence of contradiction is possible in one.

original: gal te da ltar rnams 'don par byed pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: gal te da ltar rnams 'don par byed pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: If you say, ‚ÄúBecause they are recited now,‚Äù

original: de'i lan ni bshad zin to //
analyzed: de'i lan ni bshad zin to //
translated: the answer has already been given.

original: gal te ma mthong ba'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: gal te ma mthong ba'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: If you say, ‚ÄúBecause they are not seen,‚Äù

original: 'di la yang spangs zin to //
analyzed: 'di la yang spangs zin to //
translated: this has already been refuted.

original: ma mthong ba tsam yang med par go bar byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir 'khrul pa kho na yin no //
analyzed: ma mthong ba tsam yang med par go bar byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir 'khrul pa kho na yin no //
translated: Because mere non-seeing does not prove non-existence, it is simply a mistake.

original: de bas na khyad par phul du byung ba la brten pa ma yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de bas na khyad par phul du byung ba la brten pa ma yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Therefore, because it is not based on a superior specific quality,

original: ma bzung ba dang mtshungs pa yin no //
analyzed: ma bzung ba dang mtshungs pa yin no //
translated: it is the same as not being apprehended.

original: gang cung zhig rig byed 'don par byed pa de thams cad ni rig byed 'don pa gzhan sngon du song ba can yin no zhes bya ba'i khyab pa yang 'grub pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gang cung zhig rig byed 'don par byed pa de thams cad ni rig byed 'don pa gzhan sngon du song ba can yin no zhes bya ba'i khyab pa yang 'grub pa ma yin te /
translated: It is not established that the pervasion, ‚ÄúWhatever recites the Vedas all do so based on another who recites the Vedas,‚ÄùüîΩis true.

original: thams cad de lta bu'i ngo bor ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thams cad de lta bu'i ngo bor ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because all things are not established in such a nature.

original: de'i rgyu mtshan ci 'dra ba mthong ba de ni de ltar yin no zhes bya bar 'gyur la //
analyzed: de'i rgyu mtshan ci 'dra ba mthong ba de ni de ltar yin no zhes bya bar 'gyur la //
translated: Whatever the reason is seen, that is the way it is.

original: khyad par mthong ba de dor zhing de'i rgyu mtshan can nyid kyis spyi smos pa ni bsreg za sgrub pa la rdzas sngon po dang 'dra bar 'khrul pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: khyad par mthong ba de dor zhing de'i rgyu mtshan can nyid kyis spyi smos pa ni bsreg za sgrub pa la rdzas sngon po dang 'dra bar 'khrul pa nyid yin no //
translated: That special seeing is abandoned, and by the reason of that, the mention of the universal is just like the confusion of the blue substance in the proof of the burning.

original: 'dis 'dod chags la sogs pa ni grub par byed pa la tshig la sogs pa dag gsal ba yin no //
analyzed: 'dis 'dod chags la sogs pa ni grub par byed pa la tshig la sogs pa dag gsal ba yin no //
translated: By this, attachment and so forth are established in the proof of the words and so forth.

original: 'don par byed pa 'di 'don par byed pa sngon du song ba can sgrub pa yin par yang bla ste /
analyzed: 'don par byed pa 'di 'don par byed pa sngon du song ba can sgrub pa yin par yang bla ste /
translated: It is also possible that the recitation is the proof that has the recitation as a prior cause.

original: rnam kun thog med grub 'gyur ba //
analyzed: rnam kun thog med grub 'gyur ba //
translated: The recitation is established in every way without beginning.

original: de ltar skyes min rten can min //
analyzed: de ltar skyes min rten can min //
translated: In that way, it is not produced, and it is not dependent.

original: de'i phyir skyes bus ma byas nyid //
analyzed: de'i phyir skyes bus ma byas nyid //
translated: Therefore, it is not made by a person.

original: gzhan yang mi min rten can 'gyur //
analyzed: gzhan yang mi min rten can 'gyur //
translated: Moreover, it would be dependent on a non-human.

original: skyes bu bdag nyid kyis brtags nas sam //
analyzed: skyes bu bdag nyid kyis brtags nas sam //
translated: After the person investigates himself,

original: gzhan las 'don par byed pa na //
analyzed: gzhan las 'don par byed pa na //
translated: or after he recites from another,

original: byed pa'i bya ba med pa can //
analyzed: byed pa'i bya ba med pa can //
translated: And they are not self-uttered.

original: de dag gi sgra rang nyid sgrogs par byed pa ma yin na gang gis na skyes bus ma byas par 'gyur /
analyzed: de dag gi sgra rang nyid sgrogs par byed pa ma yin na gang gis na skyes bus ma byas par 'gyur /
translated: If the sounds are not self-uttered, then by whom are they uttered?

original: gal te skyes bu rnams kyi thog ma nyid yod par 'gyur na //
analyzed: gal te skyes bu rnams kyi thog ma nyid yod par 'gyur na //
translated: If the first person existed,

original: skyes bus ma byas pa la yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: skyes bus ma byas pa la yang 'gyur ro //
translated: then it would be without a person.

original: de'i tshe yang gzhan sngon du song ba can mi 'grub ste /
analyzed: de'i tshe yang gzhan sngon du song ba can mi 'grub ste /
translated: But at that time, it is not established that there is a prior person,

original: 'don par byed pa po med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'don par byed pa po med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is no utterer.

original: de'i dang po 'don par byed pa ni byed pa po nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i dang po 'don par byed pa ni byed pa po nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: The first person would be the utterer.

original: de bas na 'di ni byis pa sa rdul gyi rtsed mo la sogs pa dang 'dra bar snga ma snga ma mthong bas 'jug pa yin pas na /
analyzed: de bas na 'di ni byis pa sa rdul gyi rtsed mo la sogs pa dang 'dra bar snga ma snga ma mthong bas 'jug pa yin pas na /
translated: Therefore, this is like the play of children with dust, etc., where the first person is engaged by seeing the prior person.

original: @333b skyes bu'i tha snyad thog ma med can du 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: @333b skyes bu'i tha snyad thog ma med can du 'gyur gyi /
translated: Thus, the convention of a person is without beginning.

original: skyes bus ma byas pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: skyes bus ma byas pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: It is not that it is without a person.

original: thog ma med pa nyid kyi phyir skyes bus ma byas pa yin na ni /
analyzed: thog ma med pa nyid kyi phyir skyes bus ma byas pa yin na ni /
translated: If it is without a person because it is without beginning,üîΩthen

original: da shin tu mang po skyes bus ma byas pa yin no //
analyzed: da shin tu mang po skyes bus ma byas pa yin no //
translated: But now, they are very numerous, and are not made by man.

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /
translated: Thus,üîΩThe expressions of barbarians, etc.,

original: kla klo la sogs pa tha snyad dang // med par smra ba'i tshig rnams ni//
analyzed: kla klo la sogs pa tha snyad dang // med par smra ba'i tshig rnams ni//
translated: and the words of the nihilists,

original: thog med phyir na de bzhin 'gyur //
analyzed: thog med phyir na de bzhin 'gyur //
translated: are so because they are beginningless.

original: sngon legs byas pa'i rgyun phyir ro //
analyzed: sngon legs byas pa'i rgyun phyir ro //
translated: Because of the continuity of good actions in the past.

original: kla klo la sogs pa'i tha snyad ma bag mar len pa la sogs pa dang / 'dod pa'i dga' ston la sogs pa dang / med par smra ba'i tshig snga na med pa dang / 'jig rten pha rol la sogs pa la skur bar byed pa dag thog ma med pa can yin no //
analyzed: kla klo la sogs pa'i tha snyad ma bag mar len pa la sogs pa dang / 'dod pa'i dga' ston la sogs pa dang / med par smra ba'i tshig snga na med pa dang / 'jig rten pha rol la sogs pa la skur bar byed pa dag thog ma med pa can yin no //
translated: The expressions of barbarians, etc., such as taking a mother or sister as wife, and the words of the nihilists, such as nonexistence, denial of past and future lives, etc., are beginningless.

original: de dag ni gzhan gyis legs par ma bsgos na 'jug par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de dag ni gzhan gyis legs par ma bsgos na 'jug par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: They do not occur without the cultivation of others.

original: bdag nyid kyis spobs pas bkod pa'i brda byed pa can dag kyang don ji ltar thos pa bzhin du rnam par rtog pas bsdus pa'i sgo nas 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bdag nyid kyis spobs pas bkod pa'i brda byed pa can dag kyang don ji ltar thos pa bzhin du rnam par rtog pas bsdus pa'i sgo nas 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
translated: They are also the expressions of those who are eloquent by nature, because they occur by way of the conceptualization of the meaning as it is heard.

original: de ni 'ga' zhig las cung zad 'ongs pa yin no zhes ston par byed pa gcig ni rgyun gyis med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de ni 'ga' zhig las cung zad 'ongs pa yin no zhes ston par byed pa gcig ni rgyun gyis med pa'i phyir /
translated: It is taught that it is a little bit more than that.

original: gzhan sngon du song ba can ma yin no zhes brjod de /
analyzed: gzhan sngon du song ba can ma yin no zhes brjod de /
translated: But it is not preceded by another, because the continuum does not exist.

original: phal cher 'jig rten gyi tha snyad dag ji ltar mthong ba bzhin du 'jug pa can te /
analyzed: phal cher 'jig rten gyi tha snyad dag ji ltar mthong ba bzhin du 'jug pa can te /
translated: For the most part, they engage in worldly conventions as they see them.

original: yang dag pa log par 'jug pa can dag yin no //
analyzed: yang dag pa log par 'jug pa can dag yin no //
translated: They engage in what is correct and incorrect.

original: thog ma'i bskal pa pa rnams la mthong ba nyid med par tha snyad rnams la phyis 'jug par 'gyur bar 'dod pa ma yin nam ma yin te /
analyzed: thog ma'i bskal pa pa rnams la mthong ba nyid med par tha snyad rnams la phyis 'jug par 'gyur bar 'dod pa ma yin nam ma yin te /
translated: Don‚Äôt you accept that those in the primordial eon do not see and later engage in conventions?

original: legs par byas pa gzhan gyis bsgos pas de dag gis ni rkyen ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu sad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: legs par byas pa gzhan gyis bsgos pas de dag gis ni rkyen ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu sad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: No, because they are awakened by conditions in accordance with their own karma.

original: gal te thams cad skyes bus ma byas pa nyid du 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: gal te thams cad skyes bus ma byas pa nyid du 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: If you say that all conventions would be uncreated by persons,

original: de 'dra'i skyes bus ma byas nyid //
analyzed: de 'dra'i skyes bus ma byas nyid //
translated: even if that uncreatedness were established,

original: grub na'ang yon tan ci zhig 'gyur //
analyzed: grub na'ang yon tan ci zhig 'gyur //
translated: what good would come of it?

original: rnam pa gang gis mi slu ba'i phyir /
analyzed: rnam pa gang gis mi slu ba'i phyir /
translated: By what aspect is it nondeceptive?

original: skyes bus ma byas pa nyid du 'dod na de ni thog ma med pa nyid can du yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: skyes bus ma byas pa nyid du 'dod na de ni thog ma med pa nyid can du yin pa'i phyir /
translated: If you accept that it is not created by a person, then it is eternal,

original: slu bar byed pa la la dag la yang yod pas skyes bus ma byas pa nyid kyis ci zhig bya /
analyzed: slu bar byed pa la la dag la yang yod pas skyes bus ma byas pa nyid kyis ci zhig bya /
translated: and since it is also found among some deceivers, what is the use of its not being created by a person?

original: rig byed kyi ngag dag kho na skyes bus ma byas pa yin na yang /
analyzed: rig byed kyi ngag dag kho na skyes bus ma byas pa yin na yang /
translated: Even if the words of the Vedas are not created by a person,

original: don ni 'dus byas khyad par rnams //
analyzed: don ni 'dus byas khyad par rnams //
translated: the meaning is that the specific conditioned

original: mthong phyir the tshom dag kyang yin /
analyzed: mthong phyir the tshom dag kyang yin /
translated: phenomena are seen, and there is doubt.

original: gal te skyes bus byas ma byas pa nyid yin yang de'i don gyis spobs pa so sor nges pa bskyed par 'gyur ba na yid ches par 'gyur ro //üîΩji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du sgro 'dogs @334a * //
analyzed: gal te skyes bus byas ma byas pa nyid yin yang de'i don gyis spobs pa so sor nges pa bskyed par 'gyur ba na yid ches par 'gyur ro // ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du sgro 'dogs @334a * //
translated: Even if the meaning is created by a person or not created by a person, if it generates the ascertainment of eloquence, it is credible.üîΩOne sees that the NaiyƒÅyikas and so on, through superimposition and denial as they wish,

original: pa dang skur pa 'debs pa dag gis nges par brjod pa dang dpyod pa pa la sogs pa dag gis rig byed kyi ngag rnams tha dad par byed par mthong ngo //
analyzed: pa dang skur pa 'debs pa dag gis nges par brjod pa dang dpyod pa pa la sogs pa dag gis rig byed kyi ngag rnams tha dad par byed par mthong ngo //
translated: differentiate the words of the Vedas.

original: don de rnams de dag mi 'thad par 'gyur ba ma yin te /
analyzed: don de rnams de dag mi 'thad par 'gyur ba ma yin te /
translated: Those meanings are not invalidated by them.

original: don la 'jug pa brda gtso bo yin pa'i phyir dang / ngag gcig la yang rnam par rtog pa du ma srid pa'i phyir dang / rang bzhin dang rkyen rnams kyi don du mar brjod pa'i phyir dang / grogs su zin kyang gcig nyid du khas mi len pa'i phyir dang /
analyzed: don la 'jug pa brda gtso bo yin pa'i phyir dang / ngag gcig la yang rnam par rtog pa du ma srid pa'i phyir dang / rang bzhin dang rkyen rnams kyi don du mar brjod pa'i phyir dang / grogs su zin kyang gcig nyid du khas mi len pa'i phyir dang /
translated: Because the meaning is engaged by the primary sign, because many concepts are possible in a single statement, because the meaning of the nature and the conditions is expressed in many ways, because even if they are companions, they are not accepted as one,

original: ma grags pa'i mang ba nyid phyir dang / de'i don skyes bus bstan pa la rag lus pa'i phyir dang / des bstan pa ni de'i 'dod pa'i rjes su 'jug pa'i phyir /
analyzed: ma grags pa'i mang ba nyid phyir dang / de'i don skyes bus bstan pa la rag lus pa'i phyir dang / des bstan pa ni de'i 'dod pa'i rjes su 'jug pa'i phyir /
translated: because many are not renowned, because the meaning of that depends on the teaching of a person, and because what is taught by that follows the desire of that person,

original: rig byed kyi ngag gi don rnams nges pa kho na yin no //
analyzed: rig byed kyi ngag gi don rnams nges pa kho na yin no //
translated: the meaning of the statements of the Vedas is definitely not certain.

original: gzhan yang 'di skyes bus ma byas pa nyid du bsgrubs na yi ge rnams sam ngag sgrub par byed par 'gyur grang na /
analyzed: gzhan yang 'di skyes bus ma byas pa nyid du bsgrubs na yi ge rnams sam ngag sgrub par byed par 'gyur grang na /
translated: Moreover, if you prove that the Vedas are not made by a person, are you proving that the letters or the statements are not made by a person?üîΩIn response to that, it says:

original: de la / yig rnams gzhan la khyad med phyir //
analyzed: de la / yig rnams gzhan la khyad med phyir //
translated: Because the letters are not different from others,

original: sgrub par byed par 'bras cir 'gyur //
analyzed: sgrub par byed par 'bras cir 'gyur //
translated: what would be the result of the proof?

original: 'jig rten pa dang rig byed pa dag gi ngag gi yi ge tha dad pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'jig rten pa dang rig byed pa dag gi ngag gi yi ge tha dad pa ma yin no //
translated: The letters of the speech of worldly people and of the Vedas are not different.

original: tha dad na yang ngo shes pa la khyad par med pa'i phyir //
analyzed: tha dad na yang ngo shes pa la khyad par med pa'i phyir //
translated: If they were different, there would be no difference in recognition.

original: de las gcig nyid ma grub par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir dang / khyad par rtogs pa med pa'i phyir dang / rig byed pa'i yi ge dag ma 'grub pa'i phyir dang / ngo shes pa las rtogs pa med pa'i thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir dang /
analyzed: de las gcig nyid ma grub par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir dang / khyad par rtogs pa med pa'i phyir dang / rig byed pa'i yi ge dag ma 'grub pa'i phyir dang / ngo shes pa las rtogs pa med pa'i thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir dang /
translated: Because it would follow that one of them would not be established, because there would be no realization of a difference, because the letters of the Vedas would not be established, because it would follow that there would be no realization from recognition,

original: khas mi len pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: khas mi len pa'i phyir ro //
translated: and because it is not accepted.

original: de dag skyes bus ma byas pa nyid du bsgrubs pa na de thams cad la mtshungs pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de dag skyes bus ma byas pa nyid du bsgrubs pa na de thams cad la mtshungs pa'i phyir /
translated: When they are established as not being created by a person, all of that is the same.

original: 'dis lhag pa ci zhig byas /
analyzed: 'dis lhag pa ci zhig byas /
translated: What is the point of adding more?

original: de ltar tha snyad thams cad skyes bus ma byas pa yin na thams cad bden pa ma yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de ltar tha snyad thams cad skyes bus ma byas pa yin na thams cad bden pa ma yin pa'i phyir /
translated: If all conventions are not created by a person, because all of them are not true,

original: yongs su ngal ba don med pa yin no /üîΩ// / bam po brgyad pa /
analyzed: yongs su ngal ba don med pa yin no / // / bam po brgyad pa /
translated: this is a pointless waste of effort.

original: ci ste ngag rnams skyes bus ma byas par 'dod na ni /
analyzed: ci ste ngag rnams skyes bus ma byas par 'dod na ni /
translated: If you assert that speech is not created by a person,

original: ngag ni yi ge las tha dad //
analyzed: ngag ni yi ge las tha dad //
translated: Speech is not different from the letters,

original: par yod min te mi dmigs phyir //
analyzed: par yod min te mi dmigs phyir //
translated: because it is not perceived as different.

original: kho bo cag gi blo la lha sbyin la sogs pa'i tshig dang ngag rnams kyi yi ge da la sogs pa snang ba ma gtogs par yi ge gnyis pa snang ba dang 'dra bar /
analyzed: kho bo cag gi blo la lha sbyin la sogs pa'i tshig dang ngag rnams kyi yi ge da la sogs pa snang ba ma gtogs par yi ge gnyis pa snang ba dang 'dra bar /
translated: In our opinion, in the word ‚ÄúDevadatta,‚Äù for example, and in the speech, only the letters ‚Äúda‚Äù and so on appear to the mind, not a second appearance of the letters.

original: snang ba gzhan ni ma mthong ngo //üîΩ'dzin pa la snang bar gyur pa med na gzung bar 'dod pa yod @334b pa'am /
analyzed: snang ba gzhan ni ma mthong ngo // 'dzin pa la snang bar gyur pa med na gzung bar 'dod pa yod @334b pa'am /
translated: We do not see any other appearance.

original: gzhan zhes nges par nus pa ma yin te rnam pa gzhan bzhin no //
analyzed: gzhan zhes nges par nus pa ma yin te rnam pa gzhan bzhin no //
translated: If the object of apprehension does not appear, it is not possible to ascertain that it exists or that it is different, just like another aspect.

original: gal te gzhan la mi srid pa can gyi 'bras bu go bar byed pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gal te gzhan la mi srid pa can gyi 'bras bu go bar byed pa yin no zhe na /
translated: If the result is understood from the presence of something that is not possible in another,

original: yin na gal te yi ge yod pa de dag la yang 'bras bu de med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yin na gal te yi ge yod pa de dag la yang 'bras bu de med par 'gyur ro //
translated: then the result would not exist in those letters that do exist.

original: gal te tshig dang ngag gzhan la de dag khyad par med pa yin na yang /
analyzed: gal te tshig dang ngag gzhan la de dag khyad par med pa yin na yang /
translated: If the result is not different in other words and speech,

original: med pa'i phyir 'gyur ba ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: med pa'i phyir 'gyur ba ma yin no zhe na /
translated: then it would not exist because it does not exist in those.

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: No, it is not so,

original: de dag ni khyad par med pa ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dag ni khyad par med pa ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the nondifference is not established.

original: gal te ngo shes pa las khyad par grub pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gal te ngo shes pa las khyad par grub pa yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that the difference is established from recognition,

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: This is not so.üîΩ

original: de ni 'khrul pa'i phyir dang / dpe med pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni 'khrul pa'i phyir dang / dpe med pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because that is mistaken and because there is no example.

original: yi ge khyad par med pa yin na yang ngag gi khyad par las don rtogs pa'i khyad par ni 'bras bu'i khyad par yin par 'gyur la de yang ngag las 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yi ge khyad par med pa yin na yang ngag gi khyad par las don rtogs pa'i khyad par ni 'bras bu'i khyad par yin par 'gyur la de yang ngag las 'gyur ro //
translated: Even if the letters are not different, the difference in the understanding of the meaning from the difference in speech is the difference in the effect, and that is due to speech.

original: de yang dbang po las 'das pa yin pa'i phyir gang las 'gyur /
analyzed: de yang dbang po las 'das pa yin pa'i phyir gang las 'gyur /
translated: And since that is beyond the senses, how could it be?

original: thag nye ba tsam gyis bskyed pa yin na ma byang bar yang 'gyur ro //üîΩde bas ngag ces bya ba yi ge dag las don gzhan du 'gyur pa cung zhig kyang med na gang skyes bus ma byas pa nyid du bsgrub par 'gyur /
analyzed: thag nye ba tsam gyis bskyed pa yin na ma byang bar yang 'gyur ro // de bas ngag ces bya ba yi ge dag las don gzhan du 'gyur pa cung zhig kyang med na gang skyes bus ma byas pa nyid du bsgrub par 'gyur /
translated: If it is produced merely by proximity, then it would be unrefined.üîΩTherefore, since there is not even the slightest difference in what is called speech from the letters, what is established as not produced by a person?

original: de med pa'i phyir rig byed kyi khyad par du ma byas pa'i yi ge skyes bus ma byas pa nyid kyi phyogs dang po'i yang lan btab pa yin no //
analyzed: de med pa'i phyir rig byed kyi khyad par du ma byas pa'i yi ge skyes bus ma byas pa nyid kyi phyogs dang po'i yang lan btab pa yin no //
translated: Since that does not exist, the first position that the letters not distinguished as a specific type of speech are not produced by a person is also refuted.

original: gzhan yang don gzhan du gyur pa'i ngag yod pa ni bla ste /üîΩde yan lag du ma'i bdag nyid can nam /
analyzed: gzhan yang don gzhan du gyur pa'i ngag yod pa ni bla ste / de yan lag du ma'i bdag nyid can nam /
translated: Moreover, it is possible that speech is something else.üîΩBut it would be a collection of many parts,

original: yan lag med pa can du 'gyur grang na /
analyzed: yan lag med pa can du 'gyur grang na /
translated: or it would be partless.

original: yan lag du ma'i bdag nyid yin //
analyzed: yan lag du ma'i bdag nyid yin //
translated: It is a collection of many parts.

original: de rnams tha dad don med nyid //
analyzed: de rnams tha dad don med nyid //
translated: Those parts are meaningless if they are different.

original: gal te de'i yan lag de dag kyang du ma yin na /
analyzed: gal te de'i yan lag de dag kyang du ma yin na /
translated: If those parts of it are many,

original: tha dad pa'i rang bzhin don med pa can yin no //
analyzed: tha dad pa'i rang bzhin don med pa can yin no //
translated: their different natures are meaningless.

original: de dngos can min de dngos can //
analyzed: de dngos can min de dngos can //
translated: It is not a substance, nor is it a substance.

original: brtags pa seng ge nyid sogs bzhin //
analyzed: brtags pa seng ge nyid sogs bzhin //
translated: It is like the lion, etc., which are imagined.

original: don dang ldan pa'i bdag nyid kho na ngag yin no //
analyzed: don dang ldan pa'i bdag nyid kho na ngag yin no //
translated: Speech is only a substance that has meaning.

original: yan lag de dag kyang bdag nyid don med pa yin te /
analyzed: yan lag de dag kyang bdag nyid don med pa yin te /
translated: Those parts are meaningless by themselves.

original: de dag bdag nyid des rtogs pas sgro btags par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de dag bdag nyid des rtogs pas sgro btags par 'gyur ro //
translated: They are imagined to be it because they are recognized by that nature.

original: bram ze'i khye'u la sogs pa la seng ge nyid la sogs pa'i dang 'dra ba yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: bram ze'i khye'u la sogs pa la seng ge nyid la sogs pa'i dang 'dra ba yin pa'i phyir /
translated: It is like the lion, etc., of a young brahmin, etc.

original: skyes bus byas pa kho na yin no //
analyzed: skyes bus byas pa kho na yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is only a human creation.

original: ci ste gal te skyon der ma gyur cig snyam pas yan lag de dag so so don dang bcas par 'dod na /
analyzed: ci ste gal te skyon der ma gyur cig snyam pas yan lag de dag so so don dang bcas par 'dod na /
translated: But if you think that the fault of redundancy does not arise because you maintain that each part has a meaning,

original: re re don bcas nyid yin na'ang //
analyzed: re re don bcas nyid yin na'ang //
translated: then even if each part has a meaning,

original: du ma nyid rtogs log pa yin //
analyzed: du ma nyid rtogs log pa yin //
translated: the understanding of the many is incorrect.

original: yan lag gcig ni rtogs @335a * //
analyzed: yan lag gcig ni rtogs @335a * //
translated: And if one part is understood,

original: pas kyang // ngag gi don dag rtogs par 'gyur //
analyzed: pas kyang // ngag gi don dag rtogs par 'gyur //
translated: the meaning of the sentence is understood.

original: don yongs su rdzogs pa can gyi sgra'i ngo bo ni ngag yin no //
analyzed: don yongs su rdzogs pa can gyi sgra'i ngo bo ni ngag yin no //
translated: A sentence is the nature of a sound that has a complete meaning.

original: yan lag de dag kyang so so so sor de lta bu'i rnam pa yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: yan lag de dag kyang so so so sor de lta bu'i rnam pa yin pa'i phyir /
translated: And each part has that kind of form.

original: so so de dag ngag yin no //
analyzed: so so de dag ngag yin no //
translated: Therefore, each part is a sentence.

original: de ltar yan lag du ma can ni ngag ma yin no //
analyzed: de ltar yan lag du ma can ni ngag ma yin no //
translated: Thus, a sentence does not have many parts.

original: yan lag gcig rtogs pas kyang ngag gi don rtogs pa'i phyir /
analyzed: yan lag gcig rtogs pas kyang ngag gi don rtogs pa'i phyir /
translated: And if one part is understood, the meaning of the sentence is understood.üîΩTherefore, it is not necessary to rely on other parts,

original: yan lag gzhan la ltos pa dang // dus la sdod par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yan lag gzhan la ltos pa dang // dus la sdod par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: and it is not necessary to wait for the last part.

original: cha shas med pa'i bdag nyid can de ni skad cig ma gcig gis rtogs pa'i phyir /
analyzed: cha shas med pa'i bdag nyid can de ni skad cig ma gcig gis rtogs pa'i phyir /
translated: And because it is understood in a single moment,

original: shes pa gcig skyes pa na ma lus par khong du chud pa'i phyir ro /
analyzed: shes pa gcig skyes pa na ma lus par khong du chud pa'i phyir ro /
translated: because when a single cognition arises, all are comprehended.

original: de lta ma yin na gcig pa nyid 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de lta ma yin na gcig pa nyid 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: If it were not so, then singularity would be contradicted.

original: thams cad cig car thos na yang //
analyzed: thams cad cig car thos na yang //
translated: Even if all are heard simultaneously,

original: dus kyi tha dad mi rung ngo //üîΩyan lag gzhan la ltos pa med par yang yan lag gcig kho na la ngag gi don grub pa'i phyir /
analyzed: dus kyi tha dad mi rung ngo // yan lag gzhan la ltos pa med par yang yan lag gcig kho na la ngag gi don grub pa'i phyir /
translated: it is not possible for them to be different in time.

original: ngag gi yan lag du ma nyid nyams par ma gyur cig snyam pas cig car yan lag thams cad thos par 'dod na /
analyzed: ngag gi yan lag du ma nyid nyams par ma gyur cig snyam pas cig car yan lag thams cad thos par 'dod na /
translated: If, thinking that the meaning of the sentence is established in a single part without relying on another part, and thinking that the multiplicity of parts of the sentence is not impaired, one maintains that all parts are heard simultaneously,

original: de'i tshe yang dus la sdod pa mi rigs pa kho na yin te /
analyzed: de'i tshe yang dus la sdod pa mi rigs pa kho na yin te /
translated: then even at that time it is not possible for them to be different in time,

original: yan lag gcig rtogs pa'i dus nyid na thams cad thos pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yan lag gcig rtogs pa'i dus nyid na thams cad thos pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because all are heard at the time of understanding a single part.

original: rim bzhin du thos pa yin na yang don tha dad pa dang ldan pa dag ni gcig nyid las de'i don grub pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rim bzhin du thos pa yin na yang don tha dad pa dang ldan pa dag ni gcig nyid las de'i don grub pa'i phyir /
translated: If they are heard sequentially, then because the meaning of the sentence is established from a single one that possesses a different meaning,

original: gzhan ni don med pa can nyid du 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan ni don med pa can nyid du 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: the others would be meaningless.

original: cig car thos na yang don tha dad pa dag la mthong ba'i nus pa med pa can dag gi don dang ldan pa nyid kyang mi 'grub po //
analyzed: cig car thos na yang don tha dad pa dag la mthong ba'i nus pa med pa can dag gi don dang ldan pa nyid kyang mi 'grub po //
translated: Even if they are heard simultaneously, it is not established that they have meaning, since they are not capable of being seen as having different meanings.

original: gal te tshogs pa rnams kyi don mthong ba'i phyir skyon med do zhe na /
analyzed: gal te tshogs pa rnams kyi don mthong ba'i phyir skyon med do zhe na /
translated: If you say that there is no fault because the meaning of the collection is seen,

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: that is not so.

original: tha dad pa la yod pa ma yin pa'i ngo bo'i tshogs pa la yang mi srid pa'i phyir dang / don gzhan mi skye ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tha dad pa la yod pa ma yin pa'i ngo bo'i tshogs pa la yang mi srid pa'i phyir dang / don gzhan mi skye ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is impossible for a collection to have an essence that does not exist in the individual members, and because another meaning is not produced.

original: re zhig sgra skye bar smra ba la skyon 'di nyid yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: re zhig sgra skye bar smra ba la skyon 'di nyid yod pa ma yin te /
translated: This fault does not apply to the proponent of sound arising.

original: so sor nus pa med pa'i yan lag rnams kyang phan 'dogs pa'i khyad par las phul du byung ba dang ldan pa'i 'bras bu'i khyad par las nye bar sbyor ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: so sor nus pa med pa'i yan lag rnams kyang phan 'dogs pa'i khyad par las phul du byung ba dang ldan pa'i 'bras bu'i khyad par las nye bar sbyor ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because even though the individual members are not individually capable, they are connected to a special result that has an enhanced capacity due to a special benefit.

original: yan lag re re nus pa yod pa yin na yang gzhan du rtogs pa don med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yan lag re re nus pa yod pa yin na yang gzhan du rtogs pa don med par 'gyur ro //
translated: Even if each member has the capacity, it is pointless to understand it as something else.

original: ci ste yang dag gcig kho na yin lag med pa can yin na /
analyzed: ci ste yang dag gcig kho na yin lag med pa can yin na /
translated: But if it is only one and has no members,

original: de la / @335b gcig nyid ni yang tha dad med //
analyzed: de la / @335b gcig nyid ni yang tha dad med //
translated: one is not different,

original: go rims 'dzin pa mi srid phyir //
analyzed: go rims 'dzin pa mi srid phyir //
translated: because it is impossible to hold a sequence.

original: dus tha dad nyid mi rung ngo //
analyzed: dus tha dad nyid mi rung ngo //
translated: It is not possible to have a different time.

original: gcig la ni go rims bzhin du rtogs pa mi rigs te /
analyzed: gcig la ni go rims bzhin du rtogs pa mi rigs te /
translated: It is not reasonable to understand one in sequence,

original: gzung ba dang ma bzung ba dag tha dad pa med pas bzung ba dang ma gzung ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzung ba dang ma bzung ba dag tha dad pa med pas bzung ba dang ma gzung ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is no difference between what is grasped and what is not grasped, and so there is no grasping and no not grasping.

original: rim bzhin du ngag rtogs pa yang mthong ste /
analyzed: rim bzhin du ngag rtogs pa yang mthong ste /
translated: One sees the understanding of speech in sequence,

original: ngag thams cad kyi tha snyad dang thos pa dang 'dren pa'i dus su mig tu mtshungs pa skad cig ma du ma can gyi go rims kyis yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ngag thams cad kyi tha snyad dang thos pa dang 'dren pa'i dus su mig tu mtshungs pa skad cig ma du ma can gyi go rims kyis yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because all speech is completed by the sequence of many moments of the eye that is the same in the time of the convention, hearing, and leading.

original: yi ge'i ngo bo la ma reg pa can dang blo gcig la snang ba can gyi sgra'i bdag nyid ni mi snang pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: yi ge'i ngo bo la ma reg pa can dang blo gcig la snang ba can gyi sgra'i bdag nyid ni mi snang pa'i phyir te /
translated: The nature of sound that is not in contact with the nature of the letters and that appears in one awareness does not appear,

original: yi ge'i go rims kyis rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yi ge'i go rims kyis rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is understood by the sequence of the letters.

original: de khyad par med pa yin na yang ngag gi khyad par go rims bzhin du byas pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: de khyad par med pa yin na yang ngag gi khyad par go rims bzhin du byas pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: Even if it is without distinction, because the distinction of speech is made in sequence,

original: ngag go rims dang ldan pa rtogs pa yin no //
analyzed: ngag go rims dang ldan pa rtogs pa yin no //
translated: Speech is understood through the order of the phonemes.

original: yi ge'i go rims kyi phan btags pa la ltos pa med pa'i phyir dang / gang ji ltar yang rung ba de dag rab tu sbyar ba dag gis sam /
analyzed: yi ge'i go rims kyi phan btags pa la ltos pa med pa'i phyir dang / gang ji ltar yang rung ba de dag rab tu sbyar ba dag gis sam /
translated: Because it is not dependent on the help of the order of the phonemes, and because the phonemes are applied in any way whatsoever,

original: yi ge med pa dag gis kyang ngag rtogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yi ge med pa dag gis kyang ngag rtogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: speech is understood even without phonemes.

original: go rims dang ldan pa de dag gis go rims med pa la phan 'dogs pa mi rung ba'i phyir dang / go rims med par rjod par mi nus pa nyid kyi phyir dang / rnam pa gzhan med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: go rims dang ldan pa de dag gis go rims med pa la phan 'dogs pa mi rung ba'i phyir dang / go rims med par rjod par mi nus pa nyid kyi phyir dang / rnam pa gzhan med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is not possible for those with order to help those without order, because it is impossible to express without order, and because there is no other way.

original: ngag la yi ge dag yod pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: ngag la yi ge dag yod pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, phonemes do not exist in speech.

original: gal te sgra'i ngo bo gcig po de nyid ni gsal byed kyi go rims kyi dbang gis go rims dang ldan pa dang / yi ge'i rnam par dbye ba dang ldan par snang ngo zhe na /
analyzed: gal te sgra'i ngo bo gcig po de nyid ni gsal byed kyi go rims kyi dbang gis go rims dang ldan pa dang / yi ge'i rnam par dbye ba dang ldan par snang ngo zhe na /
translated: If it is argued that the very nature of sound appears with order and with the distinction of phonemes due to the order of the phonemes,

original: gsal byed go rims dang ldan pas gsal bya go rims med pa spangs zin te /
analyzed: gsal byed go rims dang ldan pas gsal bya go rims med pa spangs zin te /
translated: the order of the phonemes has already excluded the orderless expressible.

original: gsal ba dang gsal ba ma yin pa 'gal ba phyir ro //
analyzed: gsal ba dang gsal ba ma yin pa 'gal ba phyir ro //
translated: because clarity and non-clarity are mutually exclusive.

original: ngag yi ge dang cha med pa can yin na ma lus par thos pa med par ngag mnyan par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: ngag yi ge dang cha med pa can yin na ma lus par thos pa med par ngag mnyan par mi 'gyur te /
translated: If speech is composed of indivisible syllables, then speech cannot be heard in its entirety,

original: gcig la cha med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gcig la cha med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the indivisible cannot be heard.

original: yang 'ga' zhig kyang cha med pa mnyan par mi 'gyur ro //üîΩyi ge ma lus pa legs par byas pa dang ldan pa'i blo thams cad ngag nges par gzung ngo zhes bya ba yang log pa yin te /üîΩyi ge'i ngo bo la ma reg pa de la 'ga' zhig kyang 'ga' zhig gi tshe rtogs pa med pa'i phyir dang / yi ge rnams kyang go rims med par rtogs pa med pa'i phyir gang las ngag ces bya ba @336a * //üîΩgo rims med pa blo gcig gis gzung bar bya ba yin //
analyzed: yang 'ga' zhig kyang cha med pa mnyan par mi 'gyur ro // yi ge ma lus pa legs par byas pa dang ldan pa'i blo thams cad ngag nges par gzung ngo zhes bya ba yang log pa yin te / yi ge'i ngo bo la ma reg pa de la 'ga' zhig kyang 'ga' zhig gi tshe rtogs pa med pa'i phyir dang / yi ge rnams kyang go rims med par rtogs pa med pa'i phyir gang las ngag ces bya ba @336a * // go rims med pa blo gcig gis gzung bar bya ba yin //
translated: And if the indivisible is not heard,üîΩthen the cognition of speech cannot be apprehended.üîΩThe cognition of speech cannot be apprehended by a cognition that does not contact the entity of the syllables, because the cognition of speech is not possible without the cognition of the syllables.

original: yi ge tha ma rtogs pa las phyis kyang sgra'i bdag nyid cha med pa gzhan nye bar rtogs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: yi ge tha ma rtogs pa las phyis kyang sgra'i bdag nyid cha med pa gzhan nye bar rtogs pa ma yin te /
translated: And the cognition of the syllables is not possible without the cognition of the indivisible, because the cognition of the syllables is not possible without the cognition of the indivisible.üîΩAnd the cognition of the indivisible is not possible without the cognition of the indivisible, because the cognition of the indivisible is not possible without the cognition of the original: smra ba po bdag nyid 'dis kyang nges par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: smra ba po bdag nyid 'dis kyang nges par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: But this is not so, even for the speaker himself.

original: gal te 'di ltar blo tha mal sgra cha shas rdzogs pa yan gar ba snang bar 'gyur na /
analyzed: gal te 'di ltar blo tha mal sgra cha shas rdzogs pa yan gar ba snang bar 'gyur na /
translated: If the ordinary mind were to perceive a mere sound that is the complete collection of the parts of the word,

original: legs par 'gyur ba de ltar na dge ba 'dod pas rmongs pa'i blo can rmi lam bzhin du spyod do //
analyzed: legs par 'gyur ba de ltar na dge ba 'dod pas rmongs pa'i blo can rmi lam bzhin du spyod do //
translated: then the one who desires virtue would act like a fool, as if in a dream.

original: tshig dang ngag dran par gyur pa dag la yang yi ge'i go rims kyi khyad par nges par 'gyur ba ma yin no //
analyzed: tshig dang ngag dran par gyur pa dag la yang yi ge'i go rims kyi khyad par nges par 'gyur ba ma yin no //
translated: And even if the words and speech were remembered, the particular order of the letters would not be ascertained.

original: blo go rims med pa can dag la snga phyi med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: blo go rims med pa can dag la snga phyi med pa'i phyir /
translated: And for those whose mind is without order, there would be no sequence.

original: des byas pa'i tshig dang ngag gi khyad par de dag khyad par med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des byas pa'i tshig dang ngag gi khyad par de dag khyad par med par 'gyur ro //
