translated: Therefore, the particular words and speech produced by them would be without distinction.

original: yi ge'i go rims med pa can gyi sgra'i ngo bo gzhan ma mthong ngo zhes bshad zin to //
analyzed: yi ge'i go rims med pa can gyi sgra'i ngo bo gzhan ma mthong ngo zhes bshad zin to //
translated: And we have already explained that we do not see any other nature of sound that is without the order of the letters.

original: yod na yang de mi rtag pa'am rtag par 'gyur grang na /
analyzed: yod na yang de mi rtag pa'am rtag par 'gyur grang na /
translated: Even if it did exist, it would be either impermanent or permanent.

original: gal te mi rtag pa yin na ni /
analyzed: gal te mi rtag pa yin na ni /
translated: If it is impermanent,

original: rtsol ba las byung mi rtag na /
analyzed: rtsol ba las byung mi rtag na /
translated: then it arises from effort.

original: de ci skyes bus byas pa min //
analyzed: de ci skyes bus byas pa min //
translated: How could it be produced by a person?

original: mi rtag pa ni gdon mi za bar 'ga' zhig las skye ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mi rtag pa ni gdon mi za bar 'ga' zhig las skye ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
translated: If it is impermanent, it must be produced from something.

original: de ldan par yod pa nyid glo bur pa yin na yul la sogs pa nges par mi 'gyur ro zhes bshad zin te /
analyzed: de ldan par yod pa nyid glo bur pa yin na yul la sogs pa nges par mi 'gyur ro zhes bshad zin te /
translated: If it is impermanent and its existence is adventitious, then it would not be restricted to a particular place, etc.üîΩThis has already been explained.

original: de yang 'bad rtsol gyis 'phangs pa byed pa'i yon tan dang bral ba ma yin pa can dag la mthong ba gzhan du ma mthong ngo //
analyzed: de yang 'bad rtsol gyis 'phangs pa byed pa'i yon tan dang bral ba ma yin pa can dag la mthong ba gzhan du ma mthong ngo //
translated: Moreover, we see that the existence of a thing that is not devoid of the quality of being projected by effort is not adventitious.

original: de ltar rgyu'i chos mthong ba'i skyes bu'i bya ba nyid ni rgyu yin pa de bas na skyes bus byas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar rgyu'i chos mthong ba'i skyes bu'i bya ba nyid ni rgyu yin pa de bas na skyes bus byas par 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, the activity of a person who sees the qualities of a cause is itself the cause. Therefore, it is produced by a person.

original: rtag nyid yin na'ang rtag pa ni //
analyzed: rtag nyid yin na'ang rtag pa ni //
translated: Even if it is permanent,

original: dmigs 'gyur sgrib g-yogs med phyir ro //
analyzed: dmigs 'gyur sgrib g-yogs med phyir ro //
translated: it would be perceived, because it would not be obstructed.

original: ci ste sgra'i ngo bo nyid de rtag pa dang dmigs pa'i rang bzhin can du 'gyur na de'i rang bzhin de ni 'ga' zhig gi tshe yang nyams pa med pa'i phyir rtag tu dmigs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ci ste sgra'i ngo bo nyid de rtag pa dang dmigs pa'i rang bzhin can du 'gyur na de'i rang bzhin de ni 'ga' zhig gi tshe yang nyams pa med pa'i phyir rtag tu dmigs par 'gyur ro //
translated: If the nature of sound is permanent and the nature of being perceived, then because its nature is never lost, it would always be perceived.

original: gal te nus pa 'ga' zhig las kyang 'pho ba med pa de ltar na rtag par gyur te /
analyzed: gal te nus pa 'ga' zhig las kyang 'pho ba med pa de ltar na rtag par gyur te /
translated: If it does not move from any of the potencies, then it is permanent.

original: shes pa bskyed pa de'i nus pa bskyed pa bdag nyid can nyid yin pa'i phyir dang // don gzhan du gyur pa ni sngar bkag zin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: shes pa bskyed pa de'i nus pa bskyed pa bdag nyid can nyid yin pa'i phyir dang // don gzhan du gyur pa ni sngar bkag zin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because it is the nature of the potency to generate cognition, and because it has already been refuted as being a different object.

original: dmigs pa'i bdag nyid can de la yang dmigs pa'i sgrib g-yogs su gyur pa cung zad kyang yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: dmigs pa'i bdag nyid can de la yang dmigs pa'i sgrib g-yogs su gyur pa cung zad kyang yod pa ma yin te /
translated: And in that which has the nature of an object, there is not the slightest obscuration that is an object.

original: de yod du zin kyang de'i bdag nyid nyams pa med par nus pa zil gyis mnan par mi rung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de yod du zin kyang de'i bdag nyid nyams pa med par nus pa zil gyis mnan par mi rung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because even if it existed, it is not possible to suppress its potency without destroying its nature.

original: de @336b la phul du byung ba bskyed par mi nus na ni cung zhig byed pa zhes bya ba ma yin no //
analyzed: de @336b la phul du byung ba bskyed par mi nus na ni cung zhig byed pa zhes bya ba ma yin no //
translated: If it is not able to generate the highest, it is not called ‚Äúdoing something.‚Äù

original: cung zhig mi byed na yang dag la sgrib par byed pa'am /
analyzed: cung zhig mi byed na yang dag la sgrib par byed pa'am /
translated: And if it does not do something, it is not an obscuration of the real.

original: gzhan zhes bya ba de ni mang du dpyod zin to //
analyzed: gzhan zhes bya ba de ni mang du dpyod zin to //
translated: We have already analyzed extensively what is called ‚Äúanother.‚Äù

original: bum pa la sogs pa dag la rtsig pa la sogs pa dag gis phul du byung ba skyed par byed pa'am nyams pa ci zhig byed na gang gis sgrib par 'dod ce na /
analyzed: bum pa la sogs pa dag la rtsig pa la sogs pa dag gis phul du byung ba skyed par byed pa'am nyams pa ci zhig byed na gang gis sgrib par 'dod ce na /
translated: What benefit or harm do walls, etc., do to pots, etc., that you think they obscure them?

original: de dag 'ga' zhig gi phul du byung ba byed pa yin par ni mi smra'i /
analyzed: de dag 'ga' zhig gi phul du byung ba byed pa yin par ni mi smra'i /
translated: We do not say that they benefit or harm them in any way.

original: 'on kyang bum pa'i skad cig ma thams cad dbang po'i shes pa'i rgyu ma yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang bum pa'i skad cig ma thams cad dbang po'i shes pa'i rgyu ma yin no //
translated: However, not all moments of a pot are causes of a sensory consciousness.

original: phan tshun 'dus pa yul dang dbang po dang snang ba rnams ni gcig la gcig gis khyad pa can gyi skad cig ma gzhan bskyed pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa'i rgyu yin te /
analyzed: phan tshun 'dus pa yul dang dbang po dang snang ba rnams ni gcig la gcig gis khyad pa can gyi skad cig ma gzhan bskyed pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa'i rgyu yin te /
translated: The mutual contact of the object, the sense faculty, and the light is the cause of consciousness, because they produce a different moment that is qualified by each of them.

original: phan gdags par bya ba ma yin pa'i ltos pa mi rung ba'i phyir ro //üîΩnus pa'i rang bzhin can rtag tu skyed par byed pa'am /üîΩskyed par mi byed pa'am /
analyzed: phan gdags par bya ba ma yin pa'i ltos pa mi rung ba'i phyir ro // nus pa'i rang bzhin can rtag tu skyed par byed pa'am / skyed par mi byed pa'am /
translated: Because it is not possible for a nonbeneficial thing to be a condition.

original: gzhan thams cad du 'gyur ro zhes bshad zin to //
analyzed: gzhan thams cad du 'gyur ro zhes bshad zin to //
translated: It has been explained that a thing that has the nature of capability either always produces or never produces.üîΩIt cannot be otherwise.

original: de dag kyang thogs par byed pa gzhan gyi bar ma chod par phan tshun du 'dogs par byed pa yin te /
analyzed: de dag kyang thogs par byed pa gzhan gyi bar ma chod par phan tshun du 'dogs par byed pa yin te /
translated: Moreover, they are mutually connected without being obstructed by other things that would impede them.

original: bar du gcod pa med pa can gyi yul rung ba nyid kyi lhan cig byed pa can nyid kyis de dag phan tshun du phul du byung ba bskyed pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: bar du gcod pa med pa can gyi yul rung ba nyid kyi lhan cig byed pa can nyid kyis de dag phan tshun du phul du byung ba bskyed pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because they are co-operating causes of a suitable object that is not obstructed, they mutually generate an excellence.

original: bar chad yod na ni rgyu med pa nus pa'i skad cig ma gzhan mi bskyed pa'i phyir /
analyzed: bar chad yod na ni rgyu med pa nus pa'i skad cig ma gzhan mi bskyed pa'i phyir /
translated: If there is an obstruction, then because a cause that lacks the capacity to generate another moment does not exist,

original: rnam par shes pa mi bskyed pa yin no //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa mi bskyed pa yin no //
translated: consciousness is not generated.

original: de bas na sngar byung ba'i nus pa 'gags pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de bas na sngar byung ba'i nus pa 'gags pa'i phyir /
translated: Therefore, because the capacity that previously arose has ceased,

original: rtsig pa yod na gzhan skye bar 'dod pa rgyu med pas mi skye ba'i phyir rgyu dang bral bas shes pa mi skye ba de ltar na rtsig pa la sogs pa la sgrib g-yogs zhes bya'o //
analyzed: rtsig pa yod na gzhan skye bar 'dod pa rgyu med pas mi skye ba'i phyir rgyu dang bral bas shes pa mi skye ba de ltar na rtsig pa la sogs pa la sgrib g-yogs zhes bya'o //
translated: if a wall exists, another is not generated, because it is causeless. Since it is devoid of a cause, consciousness is not generated. Thus, a wall, etc. is called an obstruction.

original: sngar rung ba la gegs byed pa'i phyir ni ma yin te /
analyzed: sngar rung ba la gegs byed pa'i phyir ni ma yin te /
translated: It is not because it previously obstructed the suitable.

original: de'i rang bzhin las ma 'phos pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin las ma 'phos pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because its nature does not change.

original: yang na dngos po skad cig ma rnams phan tshun phan 'dogs pa yod du zin kyang /
analyzed: yang na dngos po skad cig ma rnams phan tshun phan 'dogs pa yod du zin kyang /
translated: Or, even if there is mutual benefit among momentary things,

original: thams cad shes pa ma yin pas //
analyzed: thams cad shes pa ma yin pas //
translated: all are not consciousness.

original: rgyu dang rkyen gyi nus pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: rgyu dang rkyen gyi nus pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because the power of causes and conditions is inconceivable.

original: de bas na gal te dbang po dang yul gyi bar na gnas pa'i sgrib g-yogs nges de la rnam par shes pa skyed par byed pa dang shin tu mi mthun pa'i bye brag gis phul du byung ba can du byed zin kyang /üîΩsgrib g-yogs kyi bye brag gis sgra la sogs pa @337a * //
analyzed: de bas na gal te dbang po dang yul gyi bar na gnas pa'i sgrib g-yogs nges de la rnam par shes pa skyed par byed pa dang shin tu mi mthun pa'i bye brag gis phul du byung ba can du byed zin kyang / sgrib g-yogs kyi bye brag gis sgra la sogs pa @337a * //
translated: Therefore, if the obstruction that exists between the sense faculty and the object is determined, and if it is made superior by the particular that is very incompatible with the production of consciousness,üîΩthen sound, etc. are heard clearly or unclearly due to the particular of the obstruction.

original: mnyan pa gsal ba dang mi gsal ba mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mnyan pa gsal ba dang mi gsal ba mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is seen.

original: de lta ma yin na 'ga' zhig la yang thag nye ba yin du zin kyang cung zhig med pa thag nye ba ma yin pa dang mtshungs pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de lta ma yin na 'ga' zhig la yang thag nye ba yin du zin kyang cung zhig med pa thag nye ba ma yin pa dang mtshungs pa'i phyir /
translated: Otherwise, even if something is close to some, it would be the same as not being close at all.

original: 'di'i 'di zhes nye bar sbyar ba ni rnam par rtog pas sprul pa nyid yin gyi /
analyzed: 'di'i 'di zhes nye bar sbyar ba ni rnam par rtog pas sprul pa nyid yin gyi /
translated: The application of this to that is just a conceptual fabrication.

original: dngos po la brten pa can ni ma yin no //
analyzed: dngos po la brten pa can ni ma yin no //
translated: but not in the case of a real thing.

original: sgro btags pa'i rjes su byed pa'i ngang tshul can ni don byed pa dag ma yin te /
analyzed: sgro btags pa'i rjes su byed pa'i ngang tshul can ni don byed pa dag ma yin te /
translated: Those that are of the nature of being dependent on superimposition are not causally effective.

original: bram ze'i khye'u la me nye bar btags pa las 'tshed pa'i phyir bsten pa ma yin pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: bram ze'i khye'u la me nye bar btags pa las 'tshed pa'i phyir bsten pa ma yin pa lta bu'o //
translated: For example, a boy of the brahmin caste is not to be relied on for cooking, even though he is designated as fire.

original: de bas na rtogs pa yod du zin kyang dngos po de yongs su gyur pa can ma yin pa dag ni rang bzhin ji lta ba bzhin du gnas pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bas na rtogs pa yod du zin kyang dngos po de yongs su gyur pa can ma yin pa dag ni rang bzhin ji lta ba bzhin du gnas pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, even if there is understanding, those that are not of the nature of a real thing remain just as they are, in their own nature.

original: de bas na sgrib g-yogs yod du zin kyang dbang po la sogs pa dag shes par byed par 'gyur na de lta yang ma yin no //
analyzed: de bas na sgrib g-yogs yod du zin kyang dbang po la sogs pa dag shes par byed par 'gyur na de lta yang ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, even if there is obscuration, the sense faculties and so on would be cognized, but that is not the case.

original: de bas na des bya ba khyad par de ltar shes par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bas na des bya ba khyad par de ltar shes par 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, one should understand that the function is of that kind.

original: de ltar sgra rtag pa rnams 'ga' zhig yod na yang phul du byung ba nyams pa med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar sgra rtag pa rnams 'ga' zhig yod na yang phul du byung ba nyams pa med par 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, even if there are some permanent sounds, their excellence is not impaired.

original: de bas na gal te de rnams shes pa bskyed pa'i rang bzhin yin na /
analyzed: de bas na gal te de rnams shes pa bskyed pa'i rang bzhin yin na /
translated: Therefore, if they are of the nature of producing cognition,

original: thams cad thams cad kyi tshe rang gi yul gyi shes pa thams cad cig car bskyed par 'gyur ba'am /
analyzed: thams cad thams cad kyi tshe rang gi yul gyi shes pa thams cad cig car bskyed par 'gyur ba'am /
translated: It is certain that either all cognitions of all objects would occur simultaneously,

original: 'ga' zhig 'ga' zhig gi che cung zhig kyang bskyed par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba de ni nges pa yin no //
analyzed: 'ga' zhig 'ga' zhig gi che cung zhig kyang bskyed par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba de ni nges pa yin no //
translated: or that some of the cognitions of some of the objects would never occur.

original: gal te lhan cig byed 'ga' dang // bral nyid phyir na mnyam pa med //
analyzed: gal te lhan cig byed 'ga' dang // bral nyid phyir na mnyam pa med //
translated: If there were no difference in the power of the causes, there would be no difference in the effects.

original: de ltar ni 'gyur na sgrib g-yogs las rtag tu sgra dag ma thos par ni ma yin mod kyi /
analyzed: de ltar ni 'gyur na sgrib g-yogs las rtag tu sgra dag ma thos par ni ma yin mod kyi /
translated: If it were so, then sound would not always be unheard when the ear is obstructed.

original: 'on kyang de dag rtogs pa las lhan cig byed pa nges pa cung zad ni yod do //
analyzed: 'on kyang de dag rtogs pa las lhan cig byed pa nges pa cung zad ni yod do //
translated: But there is a slight difference in the power of the causes in the production of the cognition.üîΩThat difference would occur sometimes, and sometimes it would not.

original: de ni 'ga' zhig gi tshe 'ga' zhig tu 'gyur ro zhes de dag 'ga' zhig gi tshe 'ga' zhig tu de byas pa thos pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de ni 'ga' zhig gi tshe 'ga' zhig tu 'gyur ro zhes de dag 'ga' zhig gi tshe 'ga' zhig tu de byas pa thos pa yin no zhe na /
translated: That is, sometimes the sound would be heard, and sometimes it would not.

original: de ltar gzhan ltos yin bla ste //
analyzed: de ltar gzhan ltos yin bla ste //
translated: That is acceptable if it is dependent on something else.

original: nges pa dag ni 'gal ba yin //
analyzed: nges pa dag ni 'gal ba yin //
translated: But the certainty is contradicted.

original: kho bo cag ni rgyu rnams ni lhan cig byed pa dag spong ba ma yin mod kyi /
analyzed: kho bo cag ni rgyu rnams ni lhan cig byed pa dag spong ba ma yin mod kyi /
translated: We do not deny that causes are co-operating causes.

original: 'on kyang rgyu rnams de'i skabs la phan 'dogs par byed la ltos pa kho na yin te /
analyzed: 'on kyang rgyu rnams de'i skabs la phan 'dogs par byed la ltos pa kho na yin te /
translated: But causes are only dependent on assisting at the time of the effect,

original: de las rnyed pa'i phul du byung ba'i 'bras bu la nye bar sbyor ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de las rnyed pa'i phul du byung ba'i 'bras bu la nye bar sbyor ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because they are connected to the effect that is obtained from them.

original: de ltar na gal te sgra dag kyang 'ga' zhig la ltos nas 'bras bu byed par 'gyur na byed la rag go //
analyzed: de ltar na gal te sgra dag kyang 'ga' zhig la ltos nas 'bras bu byed par 'gyur na byed la rag go //
translated: Thus, if sound also produces an effect in dependence on something, then it does so.

original: snga ma'i @337b rang bzhin nges pa zhes bya ba der mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: snga ma'i @337b rang bzhin nges pa zhes bya ba der mi 'gyur te /
translated: But it would not be called ‚Äúthe nature of the prior sound,‚Äù

original: de ni 'phos pa'i phyir dang / ltos par bya ba las rang bzhin gzhan thos pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni 'phos pa'i phyir dang / ltos par bya ba las rang bzhin gzhan thos pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it has changed and because the nature of the sound that is the object of dependence is different.

original: phan 'dogs pa ma yin pa ni ltos par bya bar 'gyur ba ma yin no zhes bya ba de ni bshad zin to //
analyzed: phan 'dogs pa ma yin pa ni ltos par bya bar 'gyur ba ma yin no zhes bya ba de ni bshad zin to //
translated: We have already explained that that which does not assist is not the object of dependence.

original: phan 'dogs par byed pa don gzhan nyid yin na /
analyzed: phan 'dogs par byed pa don gzhan nyid yin na /
translated: If the object of dependence is something else,

original: de'i zhes 'brel pa med pa la sogs pa yang bshad zin to //
analyzed: de'i zhes 'brel pa med pa la sogs pa yang bshad zin to //
translated: then we have already explained that it would be unrelated and so on.

original: de yang shes bya nyid ma yin te /
analyzed: de yang shes bya nyid ma yin te /
translated: Moreover, it is not an object of knowledge,

original: phan 'dogs pa nyid las shes pa skye ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: phan 'dogs pa nyid las shes pa skye ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because consciousness arises from the object of knowledge itself.

original: de bas na sgra de dag ni dbang po dang phrad pa dang / bdag nyid dang / gzhan rnam par shes pa skyed par byad pa'i rten rang gi shes pa skyed par byed pa 'ga' zhig la ltos pa med pa yin te /
analyzed: de bas na sgra de dag ni dbang po dang phrad pa dang / bdag nyid dang / gzhan rnam par shes pa skyed par byad pa'i rten rang gi shes pa skyed par byed pa 'ga' zhig la ltos pa med pa yin te /
translated: Therefore, those sounds are not dependent on any other basis that generates consciousness, such as contact with the sense faculty, itself, or the consciousness of another.üîΩ

original: de la thams cad cung zad kyang mi byed pa'i phyir ro //üîΩgzhan yang sgra de dag khyab par byed pa'am /
analyzed: de la thams cad cung zad kyang mi byed pa'i phyir ro // gzhan yang sgra de dag khyab par byed pa'am /
translated: Therefore, these sounds are not dependent on any object that is in contact with the sense faculty, that is itself, or that is the basis for the production of consciousness in another, because in that case, nothing would produce its own consciousness.

original: khyab par byed pa ma yin par 'gyur grang na /
analyzed: khyab par byed pa ma yin par 'gyur grang na /
translated: Moreover, these sounds would be either pervasive or nonpervasive.

original: gal te de dag khyab byed min //
analyzed: gal te de dag khyab byed min //
translated: If they are not pervasive,

original: thams cad du ni dmigs mi 'gyur //
analyzed: thams cad du ni dmigs mi 'gyur //
translated: they would not be perceived everywhere.

original: yul gcig la gnas pa des stong ba'i yul la gnas pas ji ltar dmigs par 'gyur /
analyzed: yul gcig la gnas pa des stong ba'i yul la gnas pas ji ltar dmigs par 'gyur /
translated: How could they be perceived in a place that is empty of them, since they remain in one place?

original: gal te ma phrad par 'dzin pa'i phyogs la skyon yod pa ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gal te ma phrad par 'dzin pa'i phyogs la skyon yod pa ma yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that there is no fault in the position that they are apprehended without contact,

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: that is not so.

original: de la yang rdo khab len la sogs pa dang 'dra bar yul rung ba nyid la gnas pa khyad par can la ltos pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de la yang rdo khab len la sogs pa dang 'dra bar yul rung ba nyid la gnas pa khyad par can la ltos pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Even in that case, they would be like a magnet, which depends on a special object that is suitable for it.

original: de ltar ma yin na thos pa gsal ba dang mi gsal ba'i khyad par du mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar ma yin na thos pa gsal ba dang mi gsal ba'i khyad par du mi 'gyur ro //
translated: If it were not so, there would be no difference between the clear and unclear hearing of sound.

original: dmigs pa'i rkyen yod na yang yul thams cad la 'dra bar dmigs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i rkyen yod na yang yul thams cad la 'dra bar dmigs par 'gyur ro //
translated: And if the objective condition exists, there would be the perception of all objects in the same way.

original: de bas na khyab par byed pa ma yin pa ma yin no //üîΩgal te khyab na thams cad kyis //
analyzed: de bas na khyab par byed pa ma yin pa ma yin no // gal te khyab na thams cad kyis //
translated: Therefore, it is not a universal.üîΩIf it were a universal,

original: cig car dmigs pa dag tu 'gyur //
analyzed: cig car dmigs pa dag tu 'gyur //
translated: all would be perceived simultaneously.

original: sgra 'ga' zhig la yang med pa ma yin pa'i phyir /üîΩthams cad yul thams cad na gnas pa dag gis cig car dmigs par 'gyur te /
analyzed: sgra 'ga' zhig la yang med pa ma yin pa'i phyir / thams cad yul thams cad na gnas pa dag gis cig car dmigs par 'gyur te /
translated: Because it is not nonexistent in any sound,

original: dbang po rung ba can nyid yin pa'i phyir dang / yul thag nye ba nyid kyi phyir dang / gegs byed pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dbang po rung ba can nyid yin pa'i phyir dang / yul thag nye ba nyid kyi phyir dang / gegs byed pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: all would perceive it simultaneously, because of the presence of the proper sense faculty, because of the proximity of the object, and because there is no obstruction.

original: 'dus byas dmigs pa yin na yang //
analyzed: 'dus byas dmigs pa yin na yang //
translated: Even if the conditioned is the object,

original: 'gyur med gang gis legs par byed //
analyzed: 'gyur med gang gis legs par byed //
translated: what is the use of that which is not perceived?

original: de ltar ni 'gyur na sgra thams cad yod du zin kyang /
analyzed: de ltar ni 'gyur na sgra thams cad yod du zin kyang /
translated: If it were so, even though all sounds exist,

original: dmigs par 'gyur ba ma yin te /
analyzed: dmigs par 'gyur ba ma yin te /
translated: they would not be perceived.

original: 'dus byas pa legs par byas pa kho nas dmigs pa'i phyir ro zhe na /üîΩde la 'dus byas pa @338a * //
analyzed: 'dus byas pa legs par byas pa kho nas dmigs pa'i phyir ro zhe na / de la 'dus byas pa @338a * //
translated: because the object is only well-formed.

original: ni dmigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: ni dmigs pa ma yin te /
translated: In this regard, the well-formed is not the object,

original: bsgyur bar bya ba ma yin pa can ni 'dus byas par mi rung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bsgyur bar bya ba ma yin pa can ni 'dus byas par mi rung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because that which is not to be transformed is not suitable as well-formed.

original: dbang po legs par byas gyur na //
analyzed: dbang po legs par byas gyur na //
translated: When the sense faculty is well-formed,

original: des kyang ma lus thos par gyur //
analyzed: des kyang ma lus thos par gyur //
translated: it hears sound in its entirety.

original: de la gal te legs par byas pas dmigs pa'i phyir dang po legs par ma byas pas dmigs par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de la gal te legs par byas pas dmigs pa'i phyir dang po legs par ma byas pas dmigs par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: If the object is well-formed, then the first is not well-formed and cannot be the object.

original: gang gis dbang po legs par byas pa des sgra rnam pa thams cad cig car thos par 'gyur ba de ltar na thal bar 'gyur ba nyid ma log pa yin no //üîΩgal te legs byas khyad par las //
analyzed: gang gis dbang po legs par byas pa des sgra rnam pa thams cad cig car thos par 'gyur ba de ltar na thal bar 'gyur ba nyid ma log pa yin no // gal te legs byas khyad par las //
translated: If the sense faculty is well-formed, then it hears sound in all its aspects simultaneously. Thus, the consequence is not averted.üîΩIf it is ascertained that the object is the same,

original: tha dad phyir don gcig nges yin //üîΩsgra yi 'dus pa sna tshogs pa'i //
analyzed: tha dad phyir don gcig nges yin // sgra yi 'dus pa sna tshogs pa'i //
translated: because of the difference in the well-formed,üîΩhow is the various collections of sound

original: ca co ji ltar thos par 'gyur //
analyzed: ca co ji ltar thos par 'gyur //
translated: heard as babble?

original: ci ste yang 'dus byas pa sgra dag la so sor nges par 'gyur ba yin te /
analyzed: ci ste yang 'dus byas pa sgra dag la so sor nges par 'gyur ba yin te /
translated: If, on the other hand, the well-formed is ascertained in individual sounds,

original: de la 'ga' zhig gis dbang po legs so legs par byas pa 'ga' zhig 'dzin par byed pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de la 'ga' zhig gis dbang po legs so legs par byas pa 'ga' zhig 'dzin par byed pa'i phyir /
translated: Some say: Because the sense faculty is well formed, it apprehends some sounds well and does not apprehend others.

original: sgra thams cad cig car thos pa ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: sgra thams cad cig car thos pa ma yin no zhe na /
translated: Therefore all sounds are not heard simultaneously.

original: legs par byas pa'i khyad par las dbang po rnams kyis thos pa nges pa yin na sgra'i tshogs pa'i ca co thos par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: legs par byas pa'i khyad par las dbang po rnams kyis thos pa nges pa yin na sgra'i tshogs pa'i ca co thos par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: If hearing is ascertained by the sense faculty due to its well formed nature, then the babble of a group of sounds would not be heard.

original: ca co zhes bya ba ni sgra gcig ma yin te /
analyzed: ca co zhes bya ba ni sgra gcig ma yin te /
translated: The term babble does not refer to a single sound,

original: rang bzhin tha dad pa can dag cig car thos pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rang bzhin tha dad pa can dag cig car thos pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is heard simultaneously with different natures.

original: tha dad pa rnam par gzhag pa yang rang bzhin tha dad pa la brten pa can nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //üîΩgal te 'jug pa myur ba'i phyir /
analyzed: tha dad pa rnam par gzhag pa yang rang bzhin tha dad pa la brten pa can nyid yin pa'i phyir ro // gal te 'jug pa myur ba'i phyir /
translated: And the establishment of difference is based on different natures.

original: cig car thos pa 'khrul pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: cig car thos pa 'khrul pa yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that it is mistaken to hear them simultaneously because their engagement is swift,

original: gling bu la sogs pa'i sgra'i rgyun go bar byed pa'i yan lag 'dus pa las 'dres par gyur pa rtogs pa 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gling bu la sogs pa'i sgra'i rgyun go bar byed pa'i yan lag 'dus pa las 'dres par gyur pa rtogs pa 'gyur ro //
translated: then the stream of flute sounds would be understood from the combination of the components that cause understanding.

original: 'di 'gog par byed pa la yang 'og nas 'chad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di 'gog par byed pa la yang 'og nas 'chad par 'gyur ro //
translated: The refutation of this will be explained later.

original: de bas na dbang po ni gcig rtogs par nus pa so sor nges pa yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de bas na dbang po ni gcig rtogs par nus pa so sor nges pa yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Therefore, since the sense faculty is able to cognize one thing, it is restricted.

original: ca co du ma'i bdag nyid can thos pa ma yin no //
analyzed: ca co du ma'i bdag nyid can thos pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, it does not hear the many aspects of the sound.

original: de la gal te sgra yan gar //
analyzed: de la gal te sgra yan gar //
translated: In this regard, if the sound

original: thos 'gyur rjod byed dag ma yin //üîΩca co la yi ge dang tshig dag ngag dag ni thos pa ma yin te /
analyzed: thos 'gyur rjod byed dag ma yin // ca co la yi ge dang tshig dag ngag dag ni thos pa ma yin te /
translated: is heard, it is not the expression.

original: sgra tsam yan gar ba dag thos pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sgra tsam yan gar ba dag thos pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The letters and words are not heard in the sound because the mere sound alone is heard.

original: rjod par byed pa la dbang po so sor nges pa'i nus pa can yod pa'i sgra tsam dag la ni ma yin /
analyzed: rjod par byed pa la dbang po so sor nges pa'i nus pa can yod pa'i sgra tsam dag la ni ma yin /
translated: The sense faculty has the ability to cognize the expression, but not the mere sound.üîΩIn this regard,

original: de la / sgra las tha dad yod do zhes //
analyzed: de la / sgra las tha dad yod do zhes //
translated: it is said that it exists separately from the sound.

original: 'di la shin tu ches dad bya //
analyzed: 'di la shin tu ches dad bya //
translated: This is a very strong belief.

original: kho bo cag gis ni sgra tsam dang rjod par byed @338b pa'i sgra'i ngo bo tha dad pa ma mthong ngo //
analyzed: kho bo cag gis ni sgra tsam dang rjod par byed @338b pa'i sgra'i ngo bo tha dad pa ma mthong ngo //
translated: We do not see the mere sound and the nature of the sound that expresses as separate.

original: dus gcig gi tshe yi ge'i go rims thos pa na sgra'i bdag nyid gcig kho nar nges so //
analyzed: dus gcig gi tshe yi ge'i go rims thos pa na sgra'i bdag nyid gcig kho nar nges so //
translated: When the order of the letters is heard at one time, it is ascertained as the nature of the sound alone.

original: de bas na nges pa sngon du song ba can gyi tha snyad yongs su gcad pa med par ji ltar 'jug par 'gyur /
analyzed: de bas na nges pa sngon du song ba can gyi tha snyad yongs su gcad pa med par ji ltar 'jug par 'gyur /
translated: Therefore, how can one engage in conventional activity without a determination that has preceded it?

original: de bas na sgra'i khyad par 'di nyid yi ge la sogs pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de bas na sgra'i khyad par 'di nyid yi ge la sogs pa zhes bya'o //
translated: Therefore, this very distinction of sound is called ‚Äúsyllable,‚Äù etc.üîΩMoreover,

original: gzhan yang / sgra gzhan dag ni gnas pa na //
analyzed: gzhan yang / sgra gzhan dag ni gnas pa na //
translated: When other sounds are present,

original: rjod byed ji ltar thos pa yin //
analyzed: rjod byed ji ltar thos pa yin //
translated: How can one hear the one that expresses?

original: 'di las sgra tsam tha dad pa'i ngo bo dang lhan cig gam tha dad pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di las sgra tsam tha dad pa'i ngo bo dang lhan cig gam tha dad pa ni ma yin no //
translated: Here, there is no difference in the nature of sound itself, whether it is simultaneous with or different from the other sounds.

original: mngon sum gyi don la gzhan gyis bstan pa chen por gyur pa ma yin no //
analyzed: mngon sum gyi don la gzhan gyis bstan pa chen por gyur pa ma yin no //
translated: The meaning of direct perception is not something that is taught by another.

original: de bas na 'dis smra ba po gzhan dag 'dug par gyur pa na /
analyzed: de bas na 'dis smra ba po gzhan dag 'dug par gyur pa na /
translated: Therefore, when other speakers are present,

original: sgra 'ga' zhig thos pa de'i dmigs pa'i rkyen dag de las gzhan pa sgrub pa la nus pa med pa nges par byed do //
analyzed: sgra 'ga' zhig thos pa de'i dmigs pa'i rkyen dag de las gzhan pa sgrub pa la nus pa med pa nges par byed do //
translated: One ascertains that the condition of the object of any sound that is heard is not capable of establishing anything else.

original: gal te nus pa dag tu 'gyur na de sgrub par byed pa de dmigs par 'gyur na /
analyzed: gal te nus pa dag tu 'gyur na de sgrub par byed pa de dmigs par 'gyur na /
translated: If it were capable, then that which establishes it would be its object.

original: de'i rang bzhin can nyid kyi rkyen dag gis ji ltar ca co don gzhan du gyur pa byed par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin can nyid kyi rkyen dag gis ji ltar ca co don gzhan du gyur pa byed par 'gyur te /
translated: How could the conditions that have the nature of that make a sound that is a different object?

original: rgyu tha dad pa med pa la 'bras bu'i tha dad pa rigs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rgyu tha dad pa med pa la 'bras bu'i tha dad pa rigs pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not logical for there to be a difference in effects when there is no difference in causes.

original: de ni rgyu med pa can nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro zhes bshad zin te /
analyzed: de ni rgyu med pa can nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro zhes bshad zin te /
translated: Because that would entail the absurd consequence that sound would be causeless.

original: ca co la rjod par byed pa ma thos pa ma yin te /
analyzed: ca co la rjod par byed pa ma thos pa ma yin te /
translated: It is not the case that the sound is not heard by one who speaks.

original: tshig dang ngag chod pa dag nye bar mtshon pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tshig dang ngag chod pa dag nye bar mtshon pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the sound that is the object of the ear consciousness is indicated.

original: yang na nus pa nges pa'i phyir //
analyzed: yang na nus pa nges pa'i phyir //
translated: Or, because the capacity is ascertained,

original: tha dad sgras rtogs ji ltar 'gyur //
analyzed: tha dad sgras rtogs ji ltar 'gyur //
translated: how could the understanding of the difference in sound occur?

original: dbang po nus so sor nges pa can de dag gis kyang sgra so so la nges pa'i sgra tsam ngo bo sna tshogs pa thos pa na sgra dag nyid ma yin te /
analyzed: dbang po nus so sor nges pa can de dag gis kyang sgra so so la nges pa'i sgra tsam ngo bo sna tshogs pa thos pa na sgra dag nyid ma yin te /
translated: Even though the sense faculties have a specific capacity, when one hears the mere sound that is the nature of a variety of different sounds, the sound is not the sound of a specific word.

original: de ltar na sgra dag la de dag gis rgyab kyis phyogs pa yin /
analyzed: de ltar na sgra dag la de dag gis rgyab kyis phyogs pa yin /
translated: In that case, the sense faculties would turn their backs on the sound.

original: rjod par byed pa dag las tha dad par sgra tsam dag grub pa med do zhes bshad pa gang yin pa ji ltar na mi 'grub ste /
analyzed: rjod par byed pa dag las tha dad par sgra tsam dag grub pa med do zhes bshad pa gang yin pa ji ltar na mi 'grub ste /
translated: But how is it not established?

original: tshig las don rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tshig las don rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the meaning is understood from the words.

original: sgra tsam gyi cha shin tu chung ba las ni don rtogs pa ma yin zhing de gzhan dang 'dres pa yang ma yin no //
analyzed: sgra tsam gyi cha shin tu chung ba las ni don rtogs pa ma yin zhing de gzhan dang 'dres pa yang ma yin no //
translated: The meaning is not understood from a mere sound that is a very small part of a word, nor is it from a word that is mixed with other words.

original: de bas na sgra tsam gyi ngo bo ma lus pa can gyis bsgrub par bya ba rtogs pa 'di ni /
analyzed: de bas na sgra tsam gyi ngo bo ma lus pa can gyis bsgrub par bya ba rtogs pa 'di ni /
translated: Therefore, the understanding of the object to be established from the entire nature of a mere sound

original: sgra tsam cha ma lus pa can ma yin pa dag yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: sgra tsam cha ma lus pa can ma yin pa dag yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir /
translated: is not from a mere sound that is not a part of the entire word,

original: sgra'i ngo bo go rims med pa can du yod pa can nyid grub pa dang sgra tsam gyi cha go rims dang ldan pa can grub pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: sgra'i ngo bo go rims med pa can du yod pa can nyid grub pa dang sgra tsam gyi cha go rims dang ldan pa can grub pa yin no zhe na /
translated: because it is established that the nature of a mere sound exists in a random order and it is established that a mere part of a sound exists in a sequential order.

original: de ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni ma yin te /
translated: That is not so.

original: go rims med pa can du ni yi ge go rims @339a * //
analyzed: go rims med pa can du ni yi ge go rims @339a * //
translated: The letters do not exist in a random order.

original: dang ldan pa las tha dad pa sngar bkag pa nyid kyi phyir dang / de ltar thal ches pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dang ldan pa las tha dad pa sngar bkag pa nyid kyi phyir dang / de ltar thal ches pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it has already been refuted that it is different from the possession of the parts, and because it is absurd to maintain that it is.

original: las kyi cha dag gi snga ma dang phyi ma la 'brel pa med pa'i phyir dang / cha gcig las rtogs par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir /
analyzed: las kyi cha dag gi snga ma dang phyi ma la 'brel pa med pa'i phyir dang / cha gcig las rtogs par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir /
translated: and because the prior and subsequent parts of the action are not related to it, and because the whole is not understood from a part.

original: de las tha dad pa can gyi lag pa'i brda la sogs pa dag las kyi bdag nyid kyi ngo bo ma lus pa yang go bar byed pa'i rgyur sgra dang 'dra bar khas blang bar bya ba yin par 'gyur ro //üîΩbdag nyid ji lta ba bzhin du byed pa'i sbyor ba la yi ge'i cha'am las kyi cha tha dad pa go rims bzhin du 'byung ba can nyid yin na /
analyzed: de las tha dad pa can gyi lag pa'i brda la sogs pa dag las kyi bdag nyid kyi ngo bo ma lus pa yang go bar byed pa'i rgyur sgra dang 'dra bar khas blang bar bya ba yin par 'gyur ro // bdag nyid ji lta ba bzhin du byed pa'i sbyor ba la yi ge'i cha'am las kyi cha tha dad pa go rims bzhin du 'byung ba can nyid yin na /
translated: Therefore, it would be necessary to accept that, like the word, the whole nature of the action is the cause of understanding, consisting of the different parts of the action, such as the hand gesture, etc.

original: go rims bzhin du rnam par rtog pa'i yul dag gis brda ji lta ba bzhin du don rtogs pa skyed do zhes bya ba ni rigs pa dang ldan pa yin no //
analyzed: go rims bzhin du rnam par rtog pa'i yul dag gis brda ji lta ba bzhin du don rtogs pa skyed do zhes bya ba ni rigs pa dang ldan pa yin no //
translated: If the application of the whole is just like that of the parts, then it is reasonable to maintain that the meaning is understood according to the convention, by means of the concepts in the proper order.

original: gzhan yang / nyes pa gang dang gang dag gis //üîΩrjod byed min de'ang sgra tsam 'dod //
analyzed: gzhan yang / nyes pa gang dang gang dag gis // rjod byed min de'ang sgra tsam 'dod //
translated: That which is not a means of expression due to any faultsüîΩIs also asserted to be mere sound.

original: sgra tsam dag gis gsal ba na //
analyzed: sgra tsam dag gis gsal ba na //
translated: If mere sound is the means of expression,

original: ji ltar rjod byed la de med //
analyzed: ji ltar rjod byed la de med //
translated: How is it not a means of expression in the absence of sound?

original: go rims su 'byung ba'i sgra tsam gyi cha dag gis gsal ba rjod par byed pas brjod pa yin no lo //
analyzed: go rims su 'byung ba'i sgra tsam gyi cha dag gis gsal ba rjod par byed pas brjod pa yin no lo //
translated: It is said that mere sound is the means of expression because it expresses the meaning through the parts of mere sound that occur in sequence.

original: de yang de dag gis cig car gsal bar byed pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de yang de dag gis cig car gsal bar byed pa ma yin te /
translated: Moreover, it does not express the meaning all at once through those parts.

original: go rims yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: go rims yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because there is a sequence.

original: cha gcig gis kyang ma yin te /
analyzed: cha gcig gis kyang ma yin te /
translated: It is also not through a single part.

original: de las gzhan pa don med par thal ba'i phyir dang / yi ge cha gcig gi dus na ngo bo ma lus pa nye bar rig pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de las gzhan pa don med par thal ba'i phyir dang / yi ge cha gcig gi dus na ngo bo ma lus pa nye bar rig pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it would follow that the others would be meaningless, and because at the time of a single part of a syllable, the entire entity is not cognized.

original: de bas na dmigs pa tshogs shing tshang ba can ma yin pa 'dis sgra tsam dang 'dra bar dmigs pa tshang bas bsgrub par bya ba'i don ji ltar bsgrub par 'gyur //
analyzed: de bas na dmigs pa tshogs shing tshang ba can ma yin pa 'dis sgra tsam dang 'dra bar dmigs pa tshang bas bsgrub par bya ba'i don ji ltar bsgrub par 'gyur //
translated: Therefore, just as with mere sound, how could the meaning to be established be established by the collection of observed objects that are not assembled?

original: shin tu dmigs su med pas yod pa dang med pa dag ni /
analyzed: shin tu dmigs su med pas yod pa dang med pa dag ni /
translated: Because it is utterly unobservable, existence and nonexistence

original: dmigs pas bsgrub par bya ba'i don dag la khyad par ci zhig yod //
analyzed: dmigs pas bsgrub par bya ba'i don dag la khyad par ci zhig yod //
translated: What is the difference between the objects to be accomplished by the object of reference?

original: thag nye ba tsam gyis sgrub par byed pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: thag nye ba tsam gyis sgrub par byed pa yang ma yin te /
translated: It is not established by mere proximity,

original: gsal ba la ltos pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gsal ba la ltos pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it depends on the manifest.

original: yod pa dang med pa'i go rims bzhin du 'byung ba'i dang tshul can de yang mtshungs pa nye bar sbyor ba'i phyir /
analyzed: yod pa dang med pa'i go rims bzhin du 'byung ba'i dang tshul can de yang mtshungs pa nye bar sbyor ba'i phyir /
translated: And that which has the nature of arising in the order of existence and non-existence is also applied equally,

original: sgra tsam dag gis bsgrub par nus pa ma yin na /
analyzed: sgra tsam dag gis bsgrub par nus pa ma yin na /
translated: and it cannot be established by mere words.

original: de la yang de ltar 'gyur ba de ltar na gzhan gyis ci zhig bya /
analyzed: de la yang de ltar 'gyur ba de ltar na gzhan gyis ci zhig bya /
translated: If it were so, what would be done by another in that case?

original: de bas na yi ge dang ngag ni skyes bu'i ma byas pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: de bas na yi ge dang ngag ni skyes bu'i ma byas pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, letters and speech are not uncreated by a person.

original: gal te yi ge'i rim pa dag / yig rnam tha dad med phyir @339b min //
analyzed: gal te yi ge'i rim pa dag / yig rnam tha dad med phyir @339b min //
translated: The order of letters is not due to the order of their arrangement,üîΩbecause there is no difference in the letters themselves.

original: gal te don gzhan du gyur pa'i sgra'i ngo bo nyid kyi ngag ni skyes bus ma byas pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gal te don gzhan du gyur pa'i sgra'i ngo bo nyid kyi ngag ni skyes bus ma byas pa ma yin no //
translated: If speech, which has the nature of sound that is a different object, is not uncreated by a person,

original: 'o na ci zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na /
translated: then what is it?

original: kho bo cag gi yi ge'i go rims kyi mtshan nyid can ni ngag yin te /
analyzed: kho bo cag gi yi ge'i go rims kyi mtshan nyid can ni ngag yin te /
translated: For us, speech has the characteristic of the order of letters.

original: de ni skyes bus ma byas pa nyid du bsgrub par bya ba yin zhe na /
analyzed: de ni skyes bus ma byas pa nyid du bsgrub par bya ba yin zhe na /
translated: If you say that it is to be established as not made by a person,

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: This is not so.üîΩüîΩ

original: yi ge rnams kyi go rims dag las tha dad pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yi ge rnams kyi go rims dag las tha dad pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is no order of letters apart from that.

original: 'di ni yi ge dag la don gzhan ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di ni yi ge dag la don gzhan ma yin te /
translated: This is not a different meaning in the letters,

original: snang ba tha dad par dmigs par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: snang ba tha dad par dmigs par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it would follow that a different appearance would be observed.

original: mi snang na ni de las rtogs pa med pa'i phyir dang rtags med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mi snang na ni de las rtogs pa med pa'i phyir dang rtags med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: If it does not appear, there is no understanding from it and there is no evidence.

original: go rims tha dad pa dang ldan pa yang med na ni thams cad du yi ge tsam lus pa'i phyir snga ma bzhin du thal bar 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: go rims tha dad pa dang ldan pa yang med na ni thams cad du yi ge tsam lus pa'i phyir snga ma bzhin du thal bar 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: If there is no order different from that, then as before, it would follow that everything would be reduced to mere letters.

original: de dag rnam par gzhag pa'ang med //
analyzed: de dag rnam par gzhag pa'ang med //
translated: And there is no arrangement of them.

original: go rims gzhan ni 'gal phyir ro //
analyzed: go rims gzhan ni 'gal phyir ro //
translated: Because another order is contradictory.

original: gal te yi ge rnams kyi go rims ma byas pa yin la /
analyzed: gal te yi ge rnams kyi go rims ma byas pa yin la /
translated: If the order of the letters is not made,

original: de dag rigs mtshungs pa mang po dag ma yin na /
analyzed: de dag rigs mtshungs pa mang po dag ma yin na /
translated: and if there are not many of the same type,

original: gang gis 'ga' zhig rnam par gnas pa'i go rims can du 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: gang gis 'ga' zhig rnam par gnas pa'i go rims can du 'gyur zhing /
translated: by what would some become an order with a fixed arrangement?

original: gzhan dag ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du 'gyur ba can du 'gyur /
analyzed: gzhan dag ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du 'gyur ba can du 'gyur /
translated: It would be subject to change according to the wishes of others.

original: 'on ci yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'on ci yin zhe na /
translated: What is it?

original: 'jig rten gsum na yi ge aa gcig nyid dang de bzhin du yi ge yang ngo //
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum na yi ge aa gcig nyid dang de bzhin du yi ge yang ngo //
translated: In the three worlds, the letter ‚Äúa‚Äù is the only one, and so is the letter ‚Äúga.‚Äù

original: de'i tshe aag ni zhes bya ba nyid du 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: de'i tshe aag ni zhes bya ba nyid du 'gyur gyi /
translated: At that time, it would be ‚Äúagani,‚Äù

original: ga gha na zhes bya ba ma yin te /
analyzed: ga gha na zhes bya ba ma yin te /
translated: not ‚Äúgagana.‚Äù

original: yi ge aa dang ga dag ni snga phyi'i ngo bor rnam par gnas pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: yi ge aa dang ga dag ni snga phyi'i ngo bor rnam par gnas pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because the letters ‚Äúa‚Äù and ‚Äúga‚Äù are established as having a sequence.

original: rgyu yongs su gyur pa las nges pa dang ldan pa'i byas pa dag gi yang go rims bzlog par bya bar nus pa ma yin te /
analyzed: rgyu yongs su gyur pa las nges pa dang ldan pa'i byas pa dag gi yang go rims bzlog par bya bar nus pa ma yin te /
translated: It is not possible to reverse the sequence of things that are produced from a transformation of causes,

original: dper na sa bon dang myu gu dang lo ma la sogs pa dang dus dang lo la sogs pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: dper na sa bon dang myu gu dang lo ma la sogs pa dang dus dang lo la sogs pa lta bu'o //
translated: like the seed, sprout, leaf, etc., and like the seasons, years, etc.

original: ma byas pa gnas skabs dang rang bzhin bskyod pa can rnam pa 'ga' zhig gis gnas pa dag kyang ci smos te /
analyzed: ma byas pa gnas skabs dang rang bzhin bskyod pa can rnam pa 'ga' zhig gis gnas pa dag kyang ci smos te /
translated: What need is there to mention that which is not produced, which remains in a state of nature, and which is not subject to change in any way?

original: snga ma'i gnas skabs dor ba med pa rnam pa gzhan du mi 'gyur ba mi rung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: snga ma'i gnas skabs dor ba med pa rnam pa gzhan du mi 'gyur ba mi rung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is not possible for the previous state to be without being abandoned and not to change into another form.

original: dor na yang 'jig par thal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dor na yang 'jig par thal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: And if it is abandoned, then it follows that it is destroyed.

original: khyad par du go rims rtag pa'i yang ngo //üîΩtshig so so yi ge gzhan nyid yin na snga na med pa 'byung ba'i phyir ram /
analyzed: khyad par du go rims rtag pa'i yang ngo // tshig so so yi ge gzhan nyid yin na snga na med pa 'byung ba'i phyir ram /
translated: And in particular, there is no order of sequence in time.

original: yi ge mang po nyid kyi phyir de dang der 'gyur na de yang 'dod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: yi ge mang po nyid kyi phyir de dang der 'gyur na de yang 'dod pa ma yin no //
translated: If the letters are different, then it follows that they are either non-existent before they are produced or that there are many letters, but that is unacceptable.üîΩMoreover,

original: gzhan yang / khyab dang rtag par brjod pa'i phyir //üîΩyul dang dus kyi go rims med //
analyzed: gzhan yang / khyab dang rtag par brjod pa'i phyir // yul dang dus kyi go rims med //
translated: Because they are said to pervade and to be permanent,üîΩThere is no order of sequence in place or time.

original: yi ge rnams kyi go rims de yang yul gyis byas @340a * //
analyzed: yi ge rnams kyi go rims de yang yul gyis byas @340a * //
translated: The order of sequence of the letters is not made by place,

original: pa ste / dper na grog mo dag rgyu ba lta bu'o //
analyzed: pa ste / dper na grog mo dag rgyu ba lta bu'o //
translated: like the movement of ants.

original: dus kyis byas pa ste /
analyzed: dus kyis byas pa ste /
translated: Nor is it made by time,

original: dper na sa bon dang myu gu la sogs par 'gyur grang na /
analyzed: dper na sa bon dang myu gu la sogs par 'gyur grang na /
translated: like a seed, sprout, and so on.

original: yi ge rnams la de rnam pa gnyi ga yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: yi ge rnams la de rnam pa gnyi ga yod pa ma yin te /
translated: Those two kinds do not exist for the letters.

original: khyab pa'i phyir dang rtag pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: khyab pa'i phyir dang rtag pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because they are said to pervade and to be permanent.

original: yul phan tshun spangs pas 'jug pa ni yul gyi snga phyir 'gyur ba yin na /
analyzed: yul phan tshun spangs pas 'jug pa ni yul gyi snga phyir 'gyur ba yin na /
translated: If the object is engaged in by mutually excluding one from the other, then it would be the case that the object is sequential.

original: thams cad thams cad la mtshungs pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: thams cad thams cad la mtshungs pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: But since all are the same for all,

original: de ni yi ge rnams la yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni yi ge rnams la yod pa ma yin te /
translated: this is not the case for letters.

original: rlung dang nyin mo bzhin dang bdag la sogs pa bzhin no //
analyzed: rlung dang nyin mo bzhin dang bdag la sogs pa bzhin no //
translated: It is like wind and day, and like self, etc.

original: de bzhin du dus phan tshun spangs nas 'jug pa ni dus kyi snga phyir 'gyur ba yin te /
analyzed: de bzhin du dus phan tshun spangs nas 'jug pa ni dus kyi snga phyir 'gyur ba yin te /
translated: In the same way, if time is engaged in by mutually excluding one from the other, then it would be the case that time is sequential,

original: gang gi tshe gcig med pa de'i tshe gzhan yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gang gi tshe gcig med pa de'i tshe gzhan yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because when one does not exist, the other exists.

original: de yang rtag pa la sogs pa la ma yin te /
analyzed: de yang rtag pa la sogs pa la ma yin te /
translated: But this is not the case for permanence, etc.,

original: thams cad kyi tshe thams cad yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thams cad kyi tshe thams cad yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because all exist at all times.

original: rnam pa gzhan yod pa yang ma yin na yi ge'i snga phyir gyur pa'i ngag yin pa de ji ltar skyes bus ma byas par sgrub /
analyzed: rnam pa gzhan yod pa yang ma yin na yi ge'i snga phyir gyur pa'i ngag yin pa de ji ltar skyes bus ma byas par sgrub /
translated: And if there is no other way, then how do you establish that speech is sequential in letters, and that it is not produced by a person?

original: mi rtag khyab byed ma yin pa'i //
analyzed: mi rtag khyab byed ma yin pa'i //
translated: Impermanence is not a universal,

original: skyon yang sngar ni brjod pa yin //
analyzed: skyon yang sngar ni brjod pa yin //
translated: and the fault has been stated earlier.

original: ci ste nyes pa der ma gyur cig snyam pas yi ge mi rtag pa dang khyab par byed pa ma yin par 'dod na /
analyzed: ci ste nyes pa der ma gyur cig snyam pas yi ge mi rtag pa dang khyab par byed pa ma yin par 'dod na /
translated: If you think that the fault does not arise in that way, and you maintain that the letters are impermanent and that they are not pervasive,

original: phyogs de yang sngar gsal ba'i phyir lan ma yin no //
analyzed: phyogs de yang sngar gsal ba'i phyir lan ma yin no //
translated: then that position is not a response, because it has already been illuminated.

original: gsal ba'i go rims kyang ngag min //
analyzed: gsal ba'i go rims kyang ngag min //
translated: The order of the manifestation is not speech.

original: rtag pa'i gsal ba gsal phyir ro //
analyzed: rtag pa'i gsal ba gsal phyir ro //
translated: Because the manifestation of the permanent is manifested.

original: yi ge'i ngo bo'i go rims ni ngag ma yin no //
analyzed: yi ge'i ngo bo'i go rims ni ngag ma yin no //
translated: The order of the nature of the letters is not speech.

original: 'o na ci yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci yin zhe na /
translated: What is it, then?

original: de dag gi gsal ba yin no //
analyzed: de dag gi gsal ba yin no //
translated: It is the manifestation of those.

original: de ni bdag nyid ji lta ba bzhin du yi ge mngon par gsal ba'i rkyen gyi go rims las 'byung ba'i go rims dang ldan pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni bdag nyid ji lta ba bzhin du yi ge mngon par gsal ba'i rkyen gyi go rims las 'byung ba'i go rims dang ldan pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: That is because it has the order that arises from the order of the condition that manifests the letters just as they are.

original: de'i go rims ngag yin no zhes bya ba yang log pa yin te /
analyzed: de'i go rims ngag yin no zhes bya ba yang log pa yin te /
translated: The statement ‚ÄúIts order is speech‚Äù is also wrong,

original: rtag pa dag gi de rbas shes pa skyed par byed pa 'bras bu khyad par can nyid gsal ngar bkag pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: rtag pa dag gi de rbas shes pa skyed par byed pa 'bras bu khyad par can nyid gsal ngar bkag pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because the manifestation of those permanent ones, which produces the cognition, has already been refuted.

original: mngon sum du nus pa nye bas shes pa skyed par byed pa 'bras bu khyad par can nyid gsal ba yin no zhes de bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: mngon sum du nus pa nye bas shes pa skyed par byed pa 'bras bu khyad par can nyid gsal ba yin no zhes de bshad pa yin no //
translated: The effect is the very manifestation of the production of the cognition, because the capacity is proximate.

original: byed pa rnams kyi bya nyid las //üîΩde grub phyir na 'bras nyid yin //
analyzed: byed pa rnams kyi bya nyid las // de grub phyir na 'bras nyid yin //
translated: The effect is established from the activity of the agent.üîΩThe effect is established from the activity of the agent, because the effect is established from the activity of the agent.

original: gang kho na las ngo bo dmigs pa gang yin pa de la dmigs pa med na mi 'byung ba dmigs pa la brten nas 'jig rten pa dag 'bras bu nyid tha snyad 'dogs par byed do //
analyzed: gang kho na las ngo bo dmigs pa gang yin pa de la dmigs pa med na mi 'byung ba dmigs pa la brten nas 'jig rten pa dag 'bras bu nyid tha snyad 'dogs par byed do //
translated: The world designates something as an effect when it is observed that something else does not occur without it.

original: de ni yi ge dag la yang yod de /üîΩde nyid kyang gzhan dag gi yang de'i rten yin par khyad par yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de ni yi ge dag la yang yod de / de nyid kyang gzhan dag gi yang de'i rten yin par khyad par yod pa ma yin no //
translated: This is also the case with letters.üîΩThe letters are the basis of the word, and the word is the basis of the meaning.

original: de bas @340b na khas len pa'i rgyu mtshungs pa yin na ji ltar na yi ge 'bras bu dag ma yin /
analyzed: de bas @340b na khas len pa'i rgyu mtshungs pa yin na ji ltar na yi ge 'bras bu dag ma yin /
translated: Therefore, if the cause is the same, why are the letters not the effect?

original: de dmigs pa'i rten can 'bras bu nyid kyi tha snyad ma yin no //
analyzed: de dmigs pa'i rten can 'bras bu nyid kyi tha snyad ma yin no //
translated: The letters are not designated as the effect on the basis of the observation of the word.

original: 'on ci yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'on ci yin zhe na /
translated: What then?

original: gang yod na 'gyur ba de ltar na yod pa nyid kyi rten can yin no //
analyzed: gang yod na 'gyur ba de ltar na yod pa nyid kyi rten can yin no //
translated: If it exists, then it is the basis of existence.

original: yod pa nyid de gang las grub na gang gis 'bras bu nyid du grub par 'gyur /
analyzed: yod pa nyid de gang las grub na gang gis 'bras bu nyid du grub par 'gyur /
translated: But how is existence established? By what is it established as an effect?

original: 'di ma grub pa ni de ltar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di ma grub pa ni de ltar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: If it is not established, then it is not so.

original: de bas na yod pa nyid du grub na de grub par byed pa yin la de yang dmigs pa kho na yin no //
analyzed: de bas na yod pa nyid du grub na de grub par byed pa yin la de yang dmigs pa kho na yin no //
translated: Therefore, if existence is established, it is the establisher, and that is only the object.

original: de ltar ni bden na gal te de ni sngar yod pa nyid du grub par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: de ltar ni bden na gal te de ni sngar yod pa nyid du grub par mi 'gyur te /
translated: If it is true, then it is not previously established as existence.

original: yod pa nyid du grub pa gang yin pa de ni ma grub pa sngon du song ba can yin no //
analyzed: yod pa nyid du grub pa gang yin pa de ni ma grub pa sngon du song ba can yin no //
translated: For that which is established as existence has non-establishment as a prior condition.

original: de lta bur gyur pa'i rnam par shes pa mchod pas nye bar sbyor ba can gyi ngo bo gang yin pa de ma grub pa'i nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: de lta bur gyur pa'i rnam par shes pa mchod pas nye bar sbyor ba can gyi ngo bo gang yin pa de ma grub pa'i nyid ma yin nam /
translated: Is not the nature of consciousness, which is thus, the object of worship, non-established?

original: gal te de ni grub pa nyid yin mod kyi gzhan dang bral bas nye bar sbyor ba ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gal te de ni grub pa nyid yin mod kyi gzhan dang bral bas nye bar sbyor ba ma yin no zhe na /
translated: If it is indeed established, but not applied due to being devoid of another,

original: da ni nye bar sbyor ba dang nye bar sbyor ba ma yin pa'i gnas skabs dag la ji ltar na tha dad pa med /
analyzed: da ni nye bar sbyor ba dang nye bar sbyor ba ma yin pa'i gnas skabs dag la ji ltar na tha dad pa med /
translated: Now, how can there be no difference between the states of application and non-application?

original: khyad par ni rang bzhin la mi rig pa'i ngang tshul can yang ma yin te /
analyzed: khyad par ni rang bzhin la mi rig pa'i ngang tshul can yang ma yin te /
translated: And the difference is not in the nature of the thing, because it is not in the nature of the thing to be applied to excellence.

original: phul du byung ba de nyid la nye bar sbyor ba grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: phul du byung ba de nyid la nye bar sbyor ba grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the application to that very excellence is established.

original: de ni rgyu med pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni rgyu med pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it would follow, absurdly, that it would be causeless.

original: gang kho na yod na bsgrub byar rgyur ba de ni de la nye bar sbyor ba can du rigs pa yin no //
analyzed: gang kho na yod na bsgrub byar rgyur ba de ni de la nye bar sbyor ba can du rigs pa yin no //
translated: It is only when it is present that it is applied to the probandum, and it is only then that it is reasonable to call it an application.

original: phul du byung ba de nye bar sbyor ba na yang 'di ni de dang 'dra ba'i thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: phul du byung ba de nye bar sbyor ba na yang 'di ni de dang 'dra ba'i thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: And when it is applied to that excellence, the same absurd consequence would follow.

original: nus pa bar du ma chod pas nye bar sbyor ba can gyi gnas skabs las tha dad pas de las gzhan pa nyid khyad par du byed do //
analyzed: nus pa bar du ma chod pas nye bar sbyor ba can gyi gnas skabs las tha dad pas de las gzhan pa nyid khyad par du byed do //
translated: The state of application is distinguished from the state of non-application by the fact that the capacity is unobstructed.

original: phul du dbyung du med pa can gyi ltos pa yang sngar bkag zin to //
analyzed: phul du dbyung du med pa can gyi ltos pa yang sngar bkag zin to //
translated: And the dependence of that which cannot be made excellent has already been refuted earlier.

original: de yang byed pa'i bya ba nyid las grub pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de yang byed pa'i bya ba nyid las grub pa'i phyir /
translated: Because the action of the agent is established,

original: 'bras bu thams cad dang chos mtshungs pa nyid can no //
analyzed: 'bras bu thams cad dang chos mtshungs pa nyid can no //
translated: all effects are similar to it.

original: de 'dra ba de gsal ba yin na thams cad gsal bya'am /
analyzed: de 'dra ba de gsal ba yin na thams cad gsal bya'am /
translated: If that were the case, then either everything would be manifest,

original: cung zhig kyang ma yin te khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: cung zhig kyang ma yin te khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: or nothing would be manifest, because there would be no difference.

original: de ltar na ni /üîΩgrub pa'i don la rang shes pas //
analyzed: de ltar na ni / grub pa'i don la rang shes pas //
translated: In that case,üîΩthe world would not perceive itself,

original: gzhan blo'i rgyu ni gsal byed 'dod //
analyzed: gzhan blo'i rgyu ni gsal byed 'dod //
translated: and the cause of the cognition of another would be manifest.

original: dper na sgron bzhin gzhan du yang //
analyzed: dper na sgron bzhin gzhan du yang //
translated: Just like a lamp,

original: byed po las 'di khyad par ci //
analyzed: byed po las 'di khyad par ci //
translated: what is the difference between the agent and this action?

original: bdag nyid rtogs pa'i sgo nas gzhan rtogs pa'i rgyu 'jig rten la sgron ma la sogs pa dang 'dra bar gsal byed du grags pa yin no //
analyzed: bdag nyid rtogs pa'i sgo nas gzhan rtogs pa'i rgyu 'jig rten la sgron ma la sogs pa dang 'dra bar gsal byed du grags pa yin no //
translated: The world knows that the cause of the cognition of another is manifest, like a lamp, through the medium of the cognition of itself.

original: gal te de sngar grub par 'gyur te /üîΩrigs mthun pa'i nye bar len pa'i skad cig ma @341a * //
analyzed: gal te de sngar grub par 'gyur te / rigs mthun pa'i nye bar len pa'i skad cig ma @341a * //
translated: If that were the case, it would be established prior to them,

original: grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the moment of the homogeneous prior appropriation is established.

original: phul du byung ba de nyid kyi shes pa'i rgyu ni de'i tshogs pa'i rkyen can nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: phul du byung ba de nyid kyi shes pa'i rgyu ni de'i tshogs pa'i rkyen can nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The cause of the cognition of the excellent is the condition of its collection.

original: ma grub pa dmigs pa gang yin pa de dag kyang byed pa po yin te /
analyzed: ma grub pa dmigs pa gang yin pa de dag kyang byed pa po yin te /
translated: Those which are the objects of nonestablished cognition are also the agents.

original: bum pa la sogs pa'i rdza mkhan la sogs pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: bum pa la sogs pa'i rdza mkhan la sogs pa lta bu'o //
translated: They are like the potter, etc. of the pot, etc.

original: ngo shes pa la sogs pa'i grub pa'i rgyu dag gis kyang rgyu'i mtshan nyid gso bar byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: ngo shes pa la sogs pa'i grub pa'i rgyu dag gis kyang rgyu'i mtshan nyid gso bar byed pa ma yin no //
translated: The causes of the establishment of recognition, etc. do not establish the characteristic of the cause.

original: gang cung zad phyis yi ge aa rtogs pa ni snga ma dang tha dad pa med pa yul can yin te /
analyzed: gang cung zad phyis yi ge aa rtogs pa ni snga ma dang tha dad pa med pa yul can yin te /
translated: Whatever is the cognition of the letter a later on is the subject of nondifference from the former,

original: yi ge aa rtogs pa'i phyir de 'dra'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: yi ge aa rtogs pa'i phyir de 'dra'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa lta bu'o //
translated: because of the cognition of the letter a, like the statement ‚Äúit is like that,‚Äù etc.

original: des kyang rang gi mtshan nyid tha dad pa med par sgrub par nus pa ma yin te /
analyzed: des kyang rang gi mtshan nyid tha dad pa med par sgrub par nus pa ma yin te /
translated: That also is not able to establish the nondifference of the intrinsic identity,

original: de'i rang bzhin ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because its intrinsic reality is not established.

original: spyi brjod na tha dad pa med pa'i yul can la yang 'gal ba med do //
analyzed: spyi brjod na tha dad pa med pa'i yul can la yang 'gal ba med do //
translated: When the universal is stated, there is no contradiction in the subject of nondifference.

original: yul gcig rtogs pa yang snga ma dang phyi ma'i ngo bo mi rung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yul gcig rtogs pa yang snga ma dang phyi ma'i ngo bo mi rung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is not possible for the nature of the prior and subsequent [moments] to be the same with respect to the realization of a single object.

original: rgyu thag nye ba can dang rgyu thag nye ba can ma yin pa nyid kyis bskyed pa dang mi bskyed pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: rgyu thag nye ba can dang rgyu thag nye ba can ma yin pa nyid kyis bskyed pa dang mi bskyed pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because of the difference in the proximity of the cause, and because of the difference in the production and non-production.

original: thag nye ba yin du zin kyang mi skye ba ni de'i rgyu can ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: thag nye ba yin du zin kyang mi skye ba ni de'i rgyu can ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Even if it is proximate, it does not produce, because it is not the cause of that.

original: de dag ni rgyu ma lus pa tha dad pa can nyid yin no //
analyzed: de dag ni rgyu ma lus pa tha dad pa can nyid yin no //
translated: They have a different cause in every respect.

original: de la gcig tha dad pa med du zin kyang nus pa na ltos pa med pa'i phyir //
analyzed: de la gcig tha dad pa med du zin kyang nus pa na ltos pa med pa'i phyir //
translated: Even if one is not different, because of the absence of dependence on the capacity,

original: snga phyi'i rtogs pa dag ni yul gcig pa nyid du rigs pa dang 'gal lo //
analyzed: snga phyi'i rtogs pa dag ni yul gcig pa nyid du rigs pa dang 'gal lo //
translated: the prior and subsequent realizations are contradictory to the principle of being the same object.

original: rtogs pa'i snang ba dang rang bzhin tha dad pa yang mi mtshungs pa'i phyir yul gcig pa ma yin te /
analyzed: rtogs pa'i snang ba dang rang bzhin tha dad pa yang mi mtshungs pa'i phyir yul gcig pa ma yin te /
translated: The difference in the appearance of realization and the nature is also not the same, so it is not the same object.

original: bum pa la sogs pa dag la yang bral bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bum pa la sogs pa dag la yang bral bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it would also be the case for pots and so forth.

original: gal te de las mthong ba dang 'gal ba'i phyir sgrub par byed pa nyid ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gal te de las mthong ba dang 'gal ba'i phyir sgrub par byed pa nyid ma yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that it is not a proof because it contradicts what is seen,

original: 'di la yang 'gal ba med pa gang gis grub /
analyzed: 'di la yang 'gal ba med pa gang gis grub /
translated: then how is it that there is no contradiction in this case?

original: ji srid de skad du brjod pa don tha dad pa med pas khyab par ma bsgrubs pa de srid du ldog pa la the tshom za ba yin no //
analyzed: ji srid de skad du brjod pa don tha dad pa med pas khyab par ma bsgrubs pa de srid du ldog pa la the tshom za ba yin no //
translated: As long as it is not established that the expression is necessarily not different in meaning, there is doubt about the difference.

original: gang gi tshe byed pa so so tha dad pas kyang sgra tha dad pa'i rang bzhin can mnyan pa la snang ba na gcig sgrub par byed na ci'i phyir bum pa la sogs pa ma yin /
analyzed: gang gi tshe byed pa so so tha dad pas kyang sgra tha dad pa'i rang bzhin can mnyan pa la snang ba na gcig sgrub par byed na ci'i phyir bum pa la sogs pa ma yin /
translated: When the hearer perceives a difference in sound due to a difference in the individual actions, why is it that only one is established and not a pot, etc.?

original: de la yang gsal byed tha dad pa las snang ba tha dad do zhes lan btab bar nus pa kho na yin na //üîΩgzhan yang / byed pa rnams kyi tshogs pa yi //
analyzed: de la yang gsal byed tha dad pa las snang ba tha dad do zhes lan btab bar nus pa kho na yin na // gzhan yang / byed pa rnams kyi tshogs pa yi //
translated: In that case, it can be answered that the difference in appearance is due to the difference in the manifestor.üîΩMoreover,üîΩThe ascertainment of the action

original: bya ba yis ni nges pa yang //
analyzed: bya ba yis ni nges pa yang //
translated: By the collection of the actions

original: dmigs phyir 'bras bu nyid yin te //
analyzed: dmigs phyir 'bras bu nyid yin te //
translated: Is due to the observation of the effect,

original: @341b gsal byed de la mi srid phyir //
analyzed: @341b gsal byed de la mi srid phyir //
translated: Because the manifestor is not possible there.

original: 'ga' zhig gi tshe yang byed pa'i bya ba rnams la sgra ma dmigs pa ni yod pa yin /
analyzed: 'ga' zhig gi tshe yang byed pa'i bya ba rnams la sgra ma dmigs pa ni yod pa yin /
translated: In some cases, the non-apprehension of sound is present even when the activity of the agent is present.

original: gdon mi za bar gsal byed kyi bya bas don la dmigs par byed pa dag ma yin te /
analyzed: gdon mi za bar gsal byed kyi bya bas don la dmigs par byed pa dag ma yin te /
translated: But it is not necessarily the case that the activity of the manifestor causes the apprehension of the object.

original: 'ga' zhig na gsal byed yod du zin kyang bum pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir //
analyzed: 'ga' zhig na gsal byed yod du zin kyang bum pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir //
translated: Because in some cases, even though the manifestor is present, the pot is not apprehended.

original: de'i bya ba las sgra nges par dmigs pa des de byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i bya ba las sgra nges par dmigs pa des de byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: The sound is necessarily apprehended by the activity of that [manifestor], and from that, it arises.

original: byed pa po ma yin pa'i bya ba de yod na yang de grub pa mi rung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: byed pa po ma yin pa'i bya ba de yod na yang de grub pa mi rung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is not possible for that activity of the non-agent to be established.

original: gal te khyab pa dang rtag pa nyid kyi phyir dmigs pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gal te khyab pa dang rtag pa nyid kyi phyir dmigs pa yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say it is apprehended because of pervasion and permanence,

original: da ni bum pa la sogs pa dag la nges pa ci yod /
analyzed: da ni bum pa la sogs pa dag la nges pa ci yod /
translated: then what certainty is there now regarding pots and so on?

original: gal te de dag de ltar mi 'dod do zhe na /
analyzed: gal te de dag de ltar mi 'dod do zhe na /
translated: If you say they are not accepted in that way,

original: de dang chos mthun pa nyid can gyi sgra ci'i phyir 'dod //
analyzed: de dang chos mthun pa nyid can gyi sgra ci'i phyir 'dod //
translated: then why accept a sound that has the same properties as that?

original: 'di la phul du byung ba cung zhig kyang med do zhes bshad zin to //
analyzed: 'di la phul du byung ba cung zhig kyang med do zhes bshad zin to //
translated: It has already been explained that there is not the slightest excellence in this.

original: khyab par byed pa dang rtag pa nyid kyang bkag zin to //üîΩbum pa la sogs pa dag la gsal byed kyi khyad par yod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: khyab par byed pa dang rtag pa nyid kyang bkag zin to // bum pa la sogs pa dag la gsal byed kyi khyad par yod pa'i phyir /
translated: And the pervader and permanence have already been refuted.

original: skyon yod pa ma yin te /üîΩde dag gi gsal byed grags pa dang / rdza mkhan la sogs pa dag gsal byed nyid yin na /
analyzed: skyon yod pa ma yin te / de dag gi gsal byed grags pa dang / rdza mkhan la sogs pa dag gsal byed nyid yin na /
translated: It is not the case that there is a fault in the case of such things as pots, because they have a particular manifestor.üîΩIf the manifestor is the well-known potter, etc.,

original: de 'dra ba nyid du 'gyur ba na khyad par du byas par 'gyur ba gsal byed kyi khyab par de las byed pa po yin te /
analyzed: de 'dra ba nyid du 'gyur ba na khyad par du byas par 'gyur ba gsal byed kyi khyab par de las byed pa po yin te /
translated: then it is the manifestor that is the agent, since it is the manifestor that is the pervader of those.

original: phan 'dogs pa byed pa la rnam pa gzhan med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: phan 'dogs pa byed pa la rnam pa gzhan med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because there is no other way to benefit.

original: de dang de ni sgra dag la yang mtshungs so //
analyzed: de dang de ni sgra dag la yang mtshungs so //
translated: This is similar in the case of sounds.

original: de la yang dbang po dang yul rung ba la sogs pa dag las byed pa rnams phul du byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de la yang dbang po dang yul rung ba la sogs pa dag las byed pa rnams phul du byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: In that case, the agents are the best among the sense faculties, objects, and so on.

original: byed pa dag la yang bum pa la sogs pa'i byed pa po'i chos kyang mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: byed pa dag la yang bum pa la sogs pa'i byed pa po'i chos kyang mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: And in the case of agents, the quality of being an agent of a pot, etc., is also seen.

original: sgron ma la sogs pa de nyid dang yul gzhan 'ga' zhig la gsal byed gzhan med pa'i phyir de dag gi rgyu dag kyang de dag gsal byed du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sgron ma la sogs pa de nyid dang yul gzhan 'ga' zhig la gsal byed gzhan med pa'i phyir de dag gi rgyu dag kyang de dag gsal byed du 'gyur ro //
translated: Because there is no other illuminator of those lamps, etc., and of some other object, therefore their causes would be illuminators of them.

original: de bas na sgra gsal ba ma yin no //
analyzed: de bas na sgra gsal ba ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, sound is not an illuminator.

original: 'gyur na yang byed pa dag las sgra phul du byung ba dang ldan pa'am /
analyzed: 'gyur na yang byed pa dag las sgra phul du byung ba dang ldan pa'am /
translated: Even if it were, sound would be endowed with excellence from the agents,

original: sgrib par byed pa dang bral ba'am /
analyzed: sgrib par byed pa dang bral ba'am /
translated: or it would be free from that which obscures,

original: rnam par shes pa gsal ba yin te /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa gsal ba yin te /
translated: or it would be the clear consciousness,

original: rnam pa gzhan med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam pa gzhan med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is no other possibility.

original: de la phul du byung ba bskyed pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de la phul du byung ba bskyed pa ni ma yin te /
translated: Excellence is not produced in it,

original: mi rtag pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mi rtag pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it would follow that it is impermanent.

original: de ni ngo bo snga ma dang phyi ma nyams pa dang skye ba'i mtshan nyid can yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni ngo bo snga ma dang phyi ma nyams pa dang skye ba'i mtshan nyid can yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: That is because it has the characteristic of the deterioration of the former nature and the production of the latter.

original: ci ste / gal te khyed kyi de ngo bo'i //
analyzed: ci ste / gal te khyed kyi de ngo bo'i //
