original: rnam par shes pa la rang gi ngo bo ma yin pa dang 'dres pa med par snang ba gang yin pa de ni shes pa cung zhig kyang ma yin no //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa la rang gi ngo bo ma yin pa dang 'dres pa med par snang ba gang yin pa de ni shes pa cung zhig kyang ma yin no //
translated: But that which appears in consciousness without mixing in anything that is not its own nature is not a cognition of anything at all.

original: @347b de med pa'i phyir don gyi ngo bo brjod par bya ba ma yin pa'i mtshan nyid grub pa ma yin no //
analyzed: @347b de med pa'i phyir don gyi ngo bo brjod par bya ba ma yin pa'i mtshan nyid grub pa ma yin no //
translated: Because that does not exist, the definition of the inexpressible nature of an object is not established.

original: de bas na don dam par yod pa nyid kyis de nyid gzhan nyid la brten par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bas na don dam par yod pa nyid kyis de nyid gzhan nyid la brten par 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, because of existing ultimately, it would be dependent on being different from itself.

original: gang gi dngos po 'jig pa'i dang tshul can ni cir yang mi 'gyur ba des ni /
analyzed: gang gi dngos po 'jig pa'i dang tshul can ni cir yang mi 'gyur ba des ni /
translated: That which has the mode of cessation of an entity does not become anything at all.

original: med par 'gyur zhes brjod pa na /
analyzed: med par 'gyur zhes brjod pa na /
translated: When it is said, ‚ÄúIt becomes nonexistent,‚Äù

original: dngos 'gyur min zhes bya ba yin //
analyzed: dngos 'gyur min zhes bya ba yin //
translated: it is said, ‚ÄúIt does not become an entity.‚Äù

original: gal te 'dis dngos po med par 'gyur ro //üîΩzhes brjod pa de ltar na yang dngos por mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te 'dis dngos po med par 'gyur ro // zhes brjod pa de ltar na yang dngos por mi 'gyur ro //
translated: If it is said, ‚ÄúBy this, it becomes nonexistent,‚Äù

original: zhes bya ba bstan par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba bstan par 'gyur ro //
translated: then it is shown that ‚ÄúIt does not become an entity.‚Äù

original: de ltar na de log par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de ltar na de log par 'gyur te /
translated: In that case, that is incorrect,

original: dgag pa sgrub pa mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dgag pa sgrub pa mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is impossible to establish a negation.

original: de nyid kyi phyir 'di 'jig pa la rgyu cung zad yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir 'di 'jig pa la rgyu cung zad yod pa ma yin no //
translated: For that very reason, there is not the slightest cause for its cessation.

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /
translated: Thus,üîΩif there were the slightest action,

original: gal te bya ba cung zad cig / yod na gzhan la ltos 'gyur na //
analyzed: gal te bya ba cung zad cig / yod na gzhan la ltos 'gyur na //
translated: it would depend on another.

original: dngos gang cung zhig mi byed la //
analyzed: dngos gang cung zhig mi byed la //
translated: But an entity that does not perform the slightest action

original: ci phyir 'ga' zhig gis ltos 'gyur //
analyzed: ci phyir 'ga' zhig gis ltos 'gyur //
translated: Why? Because it is dependent on something.

original: bya ba yod na byed par 'gyur te /
analyzed: bya ba yod na byed par 'gyur te /
translated: If there were an action, then there would be an agent.

original: dngos po 'jig pa'i ngang tshul can la bya ba cung zad kyang med do zhes bshad zin to //
analyzed: dngos po 'jig pa'i ngang tshul can la bya ba cung zad kyang med do zhes bshad zin to //
translated: But it has been explained that an entity that is subject to destruction has no action whatsoever.

original: de bas na 'jig pa'i rgyu zhes bya ba de ni dngos po la cung zhig kyang mi byed pa de ltar na cung zhig mi byed pa la ltos par bya ba ma yin no //
analyzed: de bas na 'jig pa'i rgyu zhes bya ba de ni dngos po la cung zhig kyang mi byed pa de ltar na cung zhig mi byed pa la ltos par bya ba ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, that which is called the cause of destruction does not do anything to the entity. Thus, it is not dependent on something that does not do anything.

original: de ni dngos po phul du byung ba skye ba med pa can de'i gnas skabs can nyid ji ltar na 'jig pa zhes bya /
analyzed: de ni dngos po phul du byung ba skye ba med pa can de'i gnas skabs can nyid ji ltar na 'jig pa zhes bya /
translated: How can that which is the state of an entity that is not subject to destruction and is not produced be called ‚Äúdestruction‚Äù?

original: phul du byung ba skye ba yin na yang de nyid de'i phul du byung ba skye ba zhes bya ba ma yin nam /
analyzed: phul du byung ba skye ba yin na yang de nyid de'i phul du byung ba skye ba zhes bya ba ma yin nam /
translated: Even if it were the production of an entity that is excellent, wouldn‚Äôt that be called ‚Äúthe production of that which is excellent‚Äù?

original: de ji ltar na 'jig pa zhes bya /
analyzed: de ji ltar na 'jig pa zhes bya /
translated: How can that be called ‚Äúdestruction‚Äù?

original: des na de'i gnas skabs can 'di 'jig pa zhes bya ba ma yin no //
analyzed: des na de'i gnas skabs can 'di 'jig pa zhes bya ba ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, that which is its state is not called ‚Äúdestruction.‚Äù

original: gang gis bdag nyid med par 'gyur ba des 'jig pa yin gyi /
analyzed: gang gis bdag nyid med par 'gyur ba des 'jig pa yin gyi /
translated: That by which it becomes nonexistent is destruction.

original: don gzhan skye ba las ni ma yin no zhes ba shad cin to //
analyzed: don gzhan skye ba las ni ma yin no zhes ba shad cin to //
translated: not from the arising of another thing.

original: phul du byung ba bskyed pas bdag nyid 'jig pa zhes bya ba ni ma yin no //
analyzed: phul du byung ba bskyed pas bdag nyid 'jig pa zhes bya ba ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not that the self is destroyed by the production of something else.

original: med pa ni phul du byung ba nye bar brjod pa thams cad log pa'i sgo nas dngos po'i chos thams cad kyis dben pa'i mtshan nyid can yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: med pa ni phul du byung ba nye bar brjod pa thams cad log pa'i sgo nas dngos po'i chos thams cad kyis dben pa'i mtshan nyid can yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Nonexistence is the characteristic of the absence of all positive entities, by reason of the cessation of all verbal expressions.

original: dngos po ni skye ba dang 'brel pa'i mtshan nyid can nyid can nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dngos po ni skye ba dang 'brel pa'i mtshan nyid can nyid can nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Existence is the characteristic of the connection with production of all positive entities.

original: de bas na med pa la yod pa gzhan 'ga' zhig dgod par bya ba ma yin no //
analyzed: de bas na med pa la yod pa gzhan 'ga' zhig dgod par bya ba ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, nonexistence is not to be established as another existence.

original: de ni rgyu med can nyid yang //
analyzed: de ni rgyu med can nyid yang //
translated: That is causelessness.

original: ma byung nyid nas 'jig yod phyir //
analyzed: ma byung nyid nas 'jig yod phyir //
translated: Because of the existence of destruction in what has not yet arisen,

original: yod pa nyid dang 'jig nyid skyon //
analyzed: yod pa nyid dang 'jig nyid skyon //
translated: the fault of existence and destruction

original: thal bar 'gyur ba bsal ba yin //
analyzed: thal bar 'gyur ba bsal ba yin //
translated: is refuted by the reductio.

original: gang yang 'jig pa rgyu med pa can yin na yang ma byung ba nyid na 'di yod pa'i phyir yod pa nyid dang mi rtag pa nyid bzlog par dka' zhing ma byung @348a * //
analyzed: gang yang 'jig pa rgyu med pa can yin na yang ma byung ba nyid na 'di yod pa'i phyir yod pa nyid dang mi rtag pa nyid bzlog par dka' zhing ma byung @348a * //
translated: If you think that even if destruction is causeless, it is difficult to refute its existence and impermanence because it exists when it has not yet occurred,

original: ba nyid na 'gyur ba dang / rgyu med par byung ba yang 'gal ba yin no snyam du sems na /
analyzed: ba nyid na 'gyur ba dang / rgyu med par byung ba yang 'gal ba yin no snyam du sems na /
translated: and that it is contradictory for something to occur without a cause when it has not yet occurred,

original: de yang 'di nyid kyis bsal ba yin te /
analyzed: de yang 'di nyid kyis bsal ba yin te /
translated: that is also refuted by this,

original: dngos po 'ga' zhig khas ma blangs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dngos po 'ga' zhig khas ma blangs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because we do not accept that anything exists.

original: ji ltar skye ba can 'ga' zhig / thogs pa nyid 'dod de bzhin du //
analyzed: ji ltar skye ba can 'ga' zhig / thogs pa nyid 'dod de bzhin du //
translated: Just as you assert that something that arisesüîΩis also obstructed,

original: gal te dngos rnams 'jig rang bzhin //
analyzed: gal te dngos rnams 'jig rang bzhin //
translated: if things are essentially perishable,

original: yin gyi skye ldan min ma yin //
analyzed: yin gyi skye ldan min ma yin //
translated: they would not be things that arise.

original: ci ste dngos po rnams kyi skad cig mar gnas pa'i chos can gang yin pa de ni de'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ba bla ste /
analyzed: ci ste dngos po rnams kyi skad cig mar gnas pa'i chos can gang yin pa de ni de'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ba bla ste /
translated: If the state of momentary endurance of things is their essence, that is acceptable.

original: de ni skye ba dang ldan pa nyid kyis 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: de ni skye ba dang ldan pa nyid kyis 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: But that is not their essence because they are things that arise.

original: rang gi ngo bo yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Because it is their essence.

original: thams cad thams cad kyi rang gi ngo bor ni 'gyur ba ni ma yin te /
analyzed: thams cad thams cad kyi rang gi ngo bor ni 'gyur ba ni ma yin te /
translated: But it is not that everything is the nature of everything,

original: thogs par byed pa'i bdag nyid bzhin no //
analyzed: thogs par byed pa'i bdag nyid bzhin no //
translated: like the nature of an obstruction.

original: de ni bden na de lta na'ang //
analyzed: de ni bden na de lta na'ang //
translated: That is true, but still,

original: rgyu yi rang bzhin nges pa las //
analyzed: rgyu yi rang bzhin nges pa las //
translated: from the restriction of the nature of the cause,

original: 'bras bu'i rang bzhin nges yin gyi //
analyzed: 'bras bu'i rang bzhin nges yin gyi //
translated: the restriction of the nature of the effect follows.

original: tha dad byed rnams med nyid phyir //
analyzed: tha dad byed rnams med nyid phyir //
translated: Because the differences are not real.

original: mi rtag ngo bo tha dad med //
analyzed: mi rtag ngo bo tha dad med //
translated: Impermanence does not have a different nature.

original: thogs par byed pa'am gzhan glo bur ba'i ngo bo ni so so nges pa dang ldan pa ma yin no //
analyzed: thogs par byed pa'am gzhan glo bur ba'i ngo bo ni so so nges pa dang ldan pa ma yin no //
translated: An obstruction or another adventitious nature does not have a restriction of its own.

original: rang gi rgyu'i nus pa'i gnas pa ci 'dra ba de 'dra ba'i 'bras bur gyur pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rang gi rgyu'i nus pa'i gnas pa ci 'dra ba de 'dra ba'i 'bras bur gyur pa'i phyir /
translated: Because the effect is just like the nature of the power of its cause.

original: rgyu'i rang bzhin des na nges pa las 'bras bu'i rang bzhin nges pa yin gyi /
analyzed: rgyu'i rang bzhin des na nges pa las 'bras bu'i rang bzhin nges pa yin gyi /
translated: Therefore, from the restriction of the nature of the cause, the restriction of the nature of the effect follows.

original: 'di glo bur ba nyid yin pa'i phyir yang bshad zin to //
analyzed: 'di glo bur ba nyid yin pa'i phyir yang bshad zin to //
translated: And it has already been explained that this is not adventitious.

original: thogs par byed pa'i bdag nyid can rgyu'i tshogs pa'i rang bzhin nges pa bzhin du 'jig pa skyed par byed pa'i rang bzhin can dngos po mthong na /
analyzed: thogs par byed pa'i bdag nyid can rgyu'i tshogs pa'i rang bzhin nges pa bzhin du 'jig pa skyed par byed pa'i rang bzhin can dngos po mthong na /
translated: Just as the nature of the collection of causes that has the nature of impeding is ascertained, so too the nature of that which generates the disintegration of things is seen.

original: gang gis de las skye ba dang ldan pa de ltar 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: gang gis de las skye ba dang ldan pa de ltar 'gyur gyi /
translated: That which is generated from that will be like that.

original: gzhan ni ma yin te /
analyzed: gzhan ni ma yin te /
translated: But not any other,

original: rnam pa thams cad pa las skye ba can dag gi 'jig pa mthong ba'i phyir ro //üîΩtshogs pa thams cad las skye ba dang ldan pa dag 'jig par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba 'di yang de dag ma lus pa mthong ba med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad pa las skye ba can dag gi 'jig pa mthong ba'i phyir ro // tshogs pa thams cad las skye ba dang ldan pa dag 'jig par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba 'di yang de dag ma lus pa mthong ba med pa'i phyir /
translated: because the disintegration of that which is generated from everything is seen.

original: nges pa med pa nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: nges pa med pa nyid ma yin nam /
translated: And this statement ‚ÄúThat which is generated from the entire collection disintegrates‚Äù is not indeterminate, because the entire collection is not seen.

original: tshogs pa nus pa sna tshogs pa mthong bar 'gyur ba de las 'ga' zhig 'gyur na yang /
analyzed: tshogs pa nus pa sna tshogs pa mthong bar 'gyur ba de las 'ga' zhig 'gyur na yang /
translated: When some of the various capacities of the collection are seen,

original: gang gis 'jig pa'i ngang tshul can ma yin pa'i bdag nyid bskyed par 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: gang gis 'jig pa'i ngang tshul can ma yin pa'i bdag nyid bskyed par 'gyur zhe na /
translated: how could that which is not essentially subject to disintegration be generated?

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: No, it could not,

original: shes bya'i skabs yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: shes bya'i skabs yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because this is a discussion of objects of knowledge.

original: 'ga' zhig gi tshe 'ga' zhig tu 'ga' zhig gis shes par mi 'gyur ba gang yin pa de dag ni yod pa nyid dang rjes su 'brel pa can gyi 'jig pa zhes brjod do //
analyzed: 'ga' zhig gi tshe 'ga' zhig tu 'ga' zhig gis shes par mi 'gyur ba gang yin pa de dag ni yod pa nyid dang rjes su 'brel pa can gyi 'jig pa zhes brjod do //
translated: Those that are not known by some at some time are said to be related to existence and destruction.

original: de dag nyid byas pa nyid kyis mi rtag pa nyid du @348b bsgrub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de dag nyid byas pa nyid kyis mi rtag pa nyid du @348b bsgrub par 'gyur ro //
translated: They are established as impermanent by their being produced.

original: gang zhig skyed par byed pa'i rang bzhin can de dag 'jig pa med pa can yin pas na yang bskyed par mi 'gyur ba'am /
analyzed: gang zhig skyed par byed pa'i rang bzhin can de dag 'jig pa med pa can yin pas na yang bskyed par mi 'gyur ba'am /
translated: It is not possible that those that have the nature of producing would be without destruction, and so would not be produced again,

original: gzhan la ltos par 'gyur ba srid pa yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gzhan la ltos par 'gyur ba srid pa yod pa ma yin te /
translated: or would depend on another.

original: de'i skyed par byed pa'i rang bzhin ni grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i skyed par byed pa'i rang bzhin ni grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because their nature of producing is established.

original: ltos pa med pa can de dag 'ga' zhig gi tshe yang 'ga' zhig gi shes pa 'ga' zhig kyang ldog pa ma yin no //
analyzed: ltos pa med pa can de dag 'ga' zhig gi tshe yang 'ga' zhig gi shes pa 'ga' zhig kyang ldog pa ma yin no //
translated: Those that are without dependence are not stopped from being known by some at some time.

original: de lta bur gyur pa cung zhig kyang yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de lta bur gyur pa cung zhig kyang yod pa ma yin te /
translated: There is not even the slightest that is like that,

original: thams cad 'ga' zhig gi tshe 'ga' zhig gis shes pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thams cad 'ga' zhig gi tshe 'ga' zhig gis shes pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because everything is known by some at some time.

original: shes pa tsam gyi don byed pa'i nus pa med na yang dngos po nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: shes pa tsam gyi don byed pa'i nus pa med na yang dngos po nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
translated: If consciousness alone were not capable of causal efficiency, it would not be a real entity.

original: de ltar na de'i mtshan nyid can dngos po yin no zhes 'chad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar na de'i mtshan nyid can dngos po yin no zhes 'chad par 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, it is said that it is a real entity that has that characteristic.

original: de yang 'jig par 'khrul pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de yang 'jig par 'khrul pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: And that is because its destruction is not erroneous.

original: de yod pa nyid dang 'brel pa can yin no //
analyzed: de yod pa nyid dang 'brel pa can yin no //
translated: And that is related to existence.

original: de phyir de rnams 'brel pa yang //
analyzed: de phyir de rnams 'brel pa yang //
translated: Therefore, its relation is also

original: rtag pa nyid ni bsal bya yin //
analyzed: rtag pa nyid ni bsal bya yin //
translated: to be refuted, as is its permanence.

original: 'jig pa ni ji skad du bshad pa'i dngos po tsam dang 'brel pa yin pa de nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: 'jig pa ni ji skad du bshad pa'i dngos po tsam dang 'brel pa yin pa de nyid kyi phyir /
translated: Because destruction is related to a real entity that is just as it has been explained,

original: sgra dang 'dra bar 'brel pa rtag pa nyid kyang bsal bar bya ba yin no //
analyzed: sgra dang 'dra bar 'brel pa rtag pa nyid kyang bsal bar bya ba yin no //
translated: its relation, like that of sound, is also to be refuted as permanent.

original: rgyal dpog pa dag gis sgra'i nus pa rung ba nyid ces bya ba'i don rtogs pa'i rten na brjod pa gang yin pa de ni don gzhan nyid du 'gyur ba ma yin no //
analyzed: rgyal dpog pa dag gis sgra'i nus pa rung ba nyid ces bya ba'i don rtogs pa'i rten na brjod pa gang yin pa de ni don gzhan nyid du 'gyur ba ma yin no //
translated: The Vai≈õe·π£ikas say that the object called the capacity of sound, which is the basis for the understanding of meaning, is not a different object.

original: de ltar na rung ba nyid ces bya ba dngos po rnams kyi ngo bo'i phul du byung ba nyid yin no zhes sngar brjod zin to //
analyzed: de ltar na rung ba nyid ces bya ba dngos po rnams kyi ngo bo'i phul du byung ba nyid yin no zhes sngar brjod zin to //
translated: Thus, what is called ‚Äúsuitability‚Äù is the excellence of the nature of things.

original: de gzhan yin pa yang bla ste /
analyzed: de gzhan yin pa yang bla ste /
translated: It is also possible that the connection is different.

original: de ltar na yang 'brel pa'i sngar bshad skyon rnams kyi /
analyzed: de ltar na yang 'brel pa'i sngar bshad skyon rnams kyi /
translated: But even so, the previously explained faults apply.

original: sgra yi nus pa bsal ba yin //
analyzed: sgra yi nus pa bsal ba yin //
translated: The capacity of words is refuted.

original: 'brel pa don du gyur pa yin par smra ba la skyon rnam pa du ma bshad zin pa de nyid kyis sgra'i nus pa de sun phyung ba nyid kyis phyir yang mi brjod do //
analyzed: 'brel pa don du gyur pa yin par smra ba la skyon rnam pa du ma bshad zin pa de nyid kyis sgra'i nus pa de sun phyung ba nyid kyis phyir yang mi brjod do //
translated: The faults that have been explained in many ways for the one who advocates that the connection is the meaning are also the refutation of the capacity of words. Therefore, they will not be mentioned again.

original: gzhan yang / skyes bus ma byas shes bya nyid //
analyzed: gzhan yang / skyes bus ma byas shes bya nyid //
translated: Moreover: It is known that it is not made by a person.

original: ji bzhin don shes sgrub byed min //
analyzed: ji bzhin don shes sgrub byed min //
translated: It is not established as the knower of reality.

original: skyes bu'i nyes pas skyon med pa'i //
analyzed: skyes bu'i nyes pas skyon med pa'i //
translated: It is not faulty due to the faults of a person.

original: me sogs rnam pa gzhan du'ang mthong //
analyzed: me sogs rnam pa gzhan du'ang mthong //
translated: Fire and so on are seen in another way.

original: rig byed pa'i sgra skyes bus ma byas pa yin pa yang bla ste /
analyzed: rig byed pa'i sgra skyes bus ma byas pa yin pa yang bla ste /
translated: It is also possible that the words of the Vedas are not made by a person.

original: de ltar na yang de dag don ji lta ba bzhin ma yin pa'i shes pa'i rgyu nyid yin par bsam par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: de ltar na yang de dag don ji lta ba bzhin ma yin pa'i shes pa'i rgyu nyid yin par bsam par bya ba yin no //
translated: Nevertheless, they are to be considered as the cause of knowledge that is not in accordance with the fact.

original: skyes bu'i skyon gyis nye bar bsgyur ba nyid don dag las shes pa 'khrul pa ma yin te /
analyzed: skyes bu'i skyon gyis nye bar bsgyur ba nyid don dag las shes pa 'khrul pa ma yin te /
translated: The error of knowledge is not due to the defect of the person, but rather to the defect of the object.

original: de dang bral ba'i sgron ma la sogs pa dag gis kyang autpala sogs pa dag la log pa'i rnam par shes pa bskyed pa'i phyir ro //üîΩde bas na 'dus @349a * //
analyzed: de dang bral ba'i sgron ma la sogs pa dag gis kyang autpala sogs pa dag la log pa'i rnam par shes pa bskyed pa'i phyir ro // de bas na 'dus @349a * //
translated: For, even when they are free from the person, the lamp, etc., produce a false knowledge of the lotus, etc.

original: byas pa la ltos pa med pa'i sgra 'di dag ni ngo bo nyid kyis don rnams la slob pa'i rgyur 'gyur te /
analyzed: byas pa la ltos pa med pa'i sgra 'di dag ni ngo bo nyid kyis don rnams la slob pa'i rgyur 'gyur te /
translated: Therefore, these sounds, which do not depend on the compounded, are the cause of the teaching of the facts by their intrinsic nature,

original: rang bzhin gyi khyad par yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rang bzhin gyi khyad par yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because they are distinguished by their intrinsic nature.

original: log par bsal ba can dag kyang nges par 'gyur te /
analyzed: log par bsal ba can dag kyang nges par 'gyur te /
translated: And they are ascertained, because they are distinguished by the absence of error.

original: me la sogs pa bzhin no //üîΩgal te nges pa'i rgyu med pa'i phyir mi rigs sa zhi na /
analyzed: me la sogs pa bzhin no // gal te nges pa'i rgyu med pa'i phyir mi rigs sa zhi na /
translated: Like fire, etc.üîΩIf you say that it is not reasonable because there is no cause for the ascertainment,

original: phyin ci ma log pa bsal ba can gyi nges pa la rgyu ci zhig yod /
analyzed: phyin ci ma log pa bsal ba can gyi nges pa la rgyu ci zhig yod /
translated: what is the cause of the ascertainment of the absence of error?

original: de bas na ngo bo nyid kyis don ji lta ba bzhin du bsal ba'i nges ba bzhin du don ji lta ba bzhin du ma yin pa'i bsal ba'i nges pa ci'i phyir mi rtogs /
analyzed: de bas na ngo bo nyid kyis don ji lta ba bzhin du bsal ba'i nges ba bzhin du don ji lta ba bzhin du ma yin pa'i bsal ba'i nges pa ci'i phyir mi rtogs /
translated: Therefore, why don‚Äôt you understand that just as there is ascertainment of the object as it is, there is also ascertainment of the object as it is not?

original: yang na me la sogs pa dang 'dra bar don dag gnyi ga'i shes pa'i rgyu nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yang na me la sogs pa dang 'dra bar don dag gnyi ga'i shes pa'i rgyu nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: Or, like fire and so on, they would be the cause of the cognition of both.

original: me la sogs pa skyes bus ma byas pa yin du zin kyang gcig don ji lta ba bzhin du shes pa'i rgyu yin na yang thams cad la de ltar 'gyur ba ma yin no //
analyzed: me la sogs pa skyes bus ma byas pa yin du zin kyang gcig don ji lta ba bzhin du shes pa'i rgyu yin na yang thams cad la de ltar 'gyur ba ma yin no //
translated: Even if fire and so on are not produced by a person, if one is the cause of the cognition of the object as it is, then all would be such.

original: de ltar na sgra rnams kyang skyes bus ma byas pa nyid yin na yang gnyi gar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar na sgra rnams kyang skyes bus ma byas pa nyid yin na yang gnyi gar 'gyur ro //
translated: In that case, even though sounds are not produced by a person, they would be both.

original: me la sogs pa dag ni byas pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: me la sogs pa dag ni byas pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: Because fire and so on are produced,

original: rkyen ji lta ba bzhin du gzhan la rnam pa gzhan nyid yin pa bla ste /
analyzed: rkyen ji lta ba bzhin du gzhan la rnam pa gzhan nyid yin pa bla ste /
translated: it is possible that they are different for others according to the conditions,

original: sgra rtag pa dag la yang de yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: sgra rtag pa dag la yang de yod pa ma yin no //
translated: but that is not the case for permanent sounds.

original: de lta bu'i rnam pa'i chos de la yang yod pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: de lta bu'i rnam pa'i chos de la yang yod pa ma yin nam /
translated: Is it not the case that such a phenomenon exists?

original: de dag kyang brda'i stobs las rnam pa gzhan du 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dag kyang brda'i stobs las rnam pa gzhan du 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
translated: And they are not, because they are engaged in other forms by the power of convention.

original: 'bras bu bskyed pa'i rang bzhin du gnas pa yin yang de dag brda la sogs pa yang ltos par bya ba med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: 'bras bu bskyed pa'i rang bzhin du gnas pa yin yang de dag brda la sogs pa yang ltos par bya ba med pa'i phyir /
translated: Even though they exist as the nature of the production of effects, they are not, because they do not depend on convention, etc.

original: de las thams cad kyis thams cad kyi tshe don rnams rtogs par 'gyur na yod pa yang ma yin no //
analyzed: de las thams cad kyis thams cad kyi tshe don rnams rtogs par 'gyur na yod pa yang ma yin no //
translated: If they were, then everyone would understand the meaning at all times, but that is not the case.

original: de bas na sgra rnams ni gnas pa'i rang bzhin ma yin no //
analyzed: de bas na sgra rnams ni gnas pa'i rang bzhin ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, sounds are not the nature of the abiding.

original: gzhan yang de na ma byas par 'dod na /
analyzed: gzhan yang de na ma byas par 'dod na /
translated: Moreover, if you assert that they are not produced,

original: shes pa nyid kyi rgyur 'gyur //
analyzed: shes pa nyid kyi rgyur 'gyur //
translated: they would be the cause of consciousness.

original: rtag pa dag las dngos nus pas //
analyzed: rtag pa dag las dngos nus pas //
translated: From permanent things,

original: 'ga' yang skye ba yod ma yin //
analyzed: 'ga' yang skye ba yod ma yin //
translated: no effect arises at all.

original: gal te sgra ma byas pa yin na de las don shes pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te sgra ma byas pa yin na de las don shes pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
translated: If sounds are not produced, then consciousness of the meaning would not arise from them.

original: shes pa skye ba dang cig shos kyi dus dag tu ngo bor mtshungs pa'i shes pa bskyed pa la nus pa yod pa mi rung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: shes pa skye ba dang cig shos kyi dus dag tu ngo bor mtshungs pa'i shes pa bskyed pa la nus pa yod pa mi rung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is not possible that they have the ability to produce consciousness at the time of the arising of consciousness and at other times, since they are the same in nature.

original: de ltar na 'di skyed par byed pa yin la de ltar na ni ma yin no zhes ngo bo'i khyad par rnam par phye bar bya ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ltar na 'di skyed par byed pa yin la de ltar na ni ma yin no zhes ngo bo'i khyad par rnam par phye bar bya ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Thus, it is not possible to distinguish the specific nature of something by saying, ‚ÄúThis is a producer, but that is not.‚Äù

original: 'di'i skyed par byed pa ma yin pa ci 'dra ba de 'dra ba nyid ni skyed par byed par rigs pa ma yin zhing gzhan la ltos pa yang bkag pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: 'di'i skyed par byed pa ma yin pa ci 'dra ba de 'dra ba nyid ni skyed par byed par rigs pa ma yin zhing gzhan la ltos pa yang bkag pa nyid yin no //
translated: And it is not reasonable that something that is not a producer of something else is a producer of that.

original: de bas na rtag @349b pa dag ni 'ga' zhig tu yang shes pa bskyed par nus pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de bas na rtag @349b pa dag ni 'ga' zhig tu yang shes pa bskyed par nus pa ma yin te /
translated: Therefore, permanent things are never able to produce cognition,

original: 'ga' zhig gi tshe mi skyed na rtag tu mi bskyed par thal ba'i phyir dang / 'bras bu rtag tu ma mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'ga' zhig gi tshe mi skyed na rtag tu mi bskyed par thal ba'i phyir dang / 'bras bu rtag tu ma mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because if they do not produce it at one time, it follows that they never produce it, and because the effect is never seen.

original: de dag rnam pa 'ga' zhig gis kyang byed pa po ma yin no zhes mang du bshad zin to //
analyzed: de dag rnam pa 'ga' zhig gis kyang byed pa po ma yin no zhes mang du bshad zin to //
translated: And it has been explained many times that they are not agents in any way.

original: de dag gi nam mkha' la sogs pa rtag pa dag tu 'dod pa dag gi rtog pa gang yin pa de yang de'i rang bzhin can du 'gyur ba ma yin no //
analyzed: de dag gi nam mkha' la sogs pa rtag pa dag tu 'dod pa dag gi rtog pa gang yin pa de yang de'i rang bzhin can du 'gyur ba ma yin no //
translated: And the conception of those who assert that space and so on are permanent is not of something that has that nature.

original: de ltar na /üîΩkun rtog bag chags las byung ba'i //
analyzed: de ltar na / kun rtog bag chags las byung ba'i //
translated: Thus,üîΩThe conceptual consciousness that arises from latent potentialities

original: sgro btags spyod yul can blo dag /'ga' zhig de las skye 'gyur gyi //
analyzed: sgro btags spyod yul can blo dag /'ga' zhig de las skye 'gyur gyi //
translated: Is a consciousness that has a superimposed object.

original: don de spyod yul can ma yin //
analyzed: don de spyod yul can ma yin //
translated: It is not a consciousness that has a real object.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid kyi yul can gyi blo ni nges par de'i rung ba nyid du nye ba'i rjes su byed pa'i ngang tshul can yin pas na /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid kyi yul can gyi blo ni nges par de'i rung ba nyid du nye ba'i rjes su byed pa'i ngang tshul can yin pas na /
translated: A consciousness that has a real object as its object is necessarily a consciousness that is in the nature of a reflection of that real object.

original: 'di'i rgyu rung ba de la yod na de 'gyur ba nyid yin no //
analyzed: 'di'i rgyu rung ba de la yod na de 'gyur ba nyid yin no //
translated: If the real object exists, then it is the cause of that consciousness.

original: de ltar na de gal te dngos po rtag pa rnams kyi rang gi mtshan nyid la 'ga' zhig gi shes pa 'gyur na thams cad thams cad kyi tshe 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar na de gal te dngos po rtag pa rnams kyi rang gi mtshan nyid la 'ga' zhig gi shes pa 'gyur na thams cad thams cad kyi tshe 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, if the consciousness that has the real object as its object were to arise in regard to the real object, then it would arise in regard to all real objects at all times.

original: 'bras bu khyad par du byas pa'i bsal ba can dag ni rnam pa 'ga' zhig gis 'ga' zhig la nye bar sbyar ba na /
analyzed: 'bras bu khyad par du byas pa'i bsal ba can dag ni rnam pa 'ga' zhig gis 'ga' zhig la nye bar sbyar ba na /
translated: When a real object that is qualified by a result is applied to a particular real object in some way,

original: de bskyed par rung ba'i phul du byung ba thob pa'i rgyu'i dngos po'i khyad par du ltos pa zhes bya ba ni rigs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de bskyed par rung ba'i phul du byung ba thob pa'i rgyu'i dngos po'i khyad par du ltos pa zhes bya ba ni rigs pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not reasonable to say that the special nature of the cause is the reason for obtaining the supreme attainment that is suitable to be generated.

original: de ltar na 'bras bu'i khyad par can ma yin pa rtag pa'i dngos po de'i rgyu las ltos pa can 'ga' zhig gis gzung bar 'gyur na /
analyzed: de ltar na 'bras bu'i khyad par can ma yin pa rtag pa'i dngos po de'i rgyu las ltos pa can 'ga' zhig gis gzung bar 'gyur na /
translated: If that were so, then the special effect would be apprehended by something that is dependent on the cause of that permanent thing that does not have a special effect.

original: gal te 'di'i 'dzin pa bskyed par 'gyur na de nyid kyis gzung ba gang yin pa de rigs pa yin no //
analyzed: gal te 'di'i 'dzin pa bskyed par 'gyur na de nyid kyis gzung ba gang yin pa de rigs pa yin no //
translated: If it were to generate the apprehension of that, then it would be reasonable for it to be apprehended by that.

original: de yang srid pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de yang srid pa ma yin te /
translated: But that is not possible.

original: brtan pa'i rang bzhin nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //üîΩde ltar na thams cad kyis cig car gzung bar 'gyur ba'am /
analyzed: brtan pa'i rang bzhin nyid yin pa'i phyir ro // de ltar na thams cad kyis cig car gzung bar 'gyur ba'am /
translated: Because it has a stable nature.üîΩIn that case, it would be apprehended by all simultaneously,

original: 'ga' zhig gis kyang ma yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: 'ga' zhig gis kyang ma yin pa'i phyir /
translated: or it would not be apprehended by anyone at all.

original: 'ga' zhig yod pa mthong na /
analyzed: 'ga' zhig yod pa mthong na /
translated: If it were seen to exist for some,

original: rtag pa 'ga' zhig kyang dbang po las 'das par 'gyur ba ma yin na /
analyzed: rtag pa 'ga' zhig kyang dbang po las 'das par 'gyur ba ma yin na /
translated: then some permanent thing would not be beyond the senses.

original: de yang yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de yang yod pa ma yin no //
translated: But that does not exist.

original: de bas na nam mkha' la sogs pa la thams cad kyi 'khrul pa nyid don gyi nus pa la ltos pa med pa sgro btags pa'i spyod yul can nga gi nye bar len pa rnam par rtog pa'i bag chags sad pa la brten nas phyi rol gyi don
analyzed: de bas na nam mkha' la sogs pa la thams cad kyi 'khrul pa nyid don gyi nus pa la ltos pa med pa sgro btags pa'i spyod yul can nga gi nye bar len pa rnam par rtog pa'i bag chags sad pa la brten nas phyi rol gyi don
translated: Therefore, in space and so on, all error is based on the power of the object, the domain of reification, and arises in dependence on the activation of the latent propensities of conceptual thought that are appropriated by the self.

original: gyis stong ba dag skye bar 'gyur ro //üîΩde bas na sgra ni gzhan du 'gyur ba ma yin pa'i @350a * //
analyzed: gyis stong ba dag skye bar 'gyur ro // de bas na sgra ni gzhan du 'gyur ba ma yin pa'i @350a * //
translated: They are empty of external objects.

original: chos can ma yin no //
analyzed: chos can ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, sound is not a phenomenon that does not change into something else.

original: de nyid yin na yang don phyin ci ma log par rtogs pa can nyid ces bya ba de gang las yin /
analyzed: de nyid yin na yang don phyin ci ma log par rtogs pa can nyid ces bya ba de gang las yin /
translated: If it were that way, then what is the basis of the statement, ‚ÄúIt is that, and it correctly understands the object‚Äù?

original: me ni kha ba'i gnyen po yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa la me ni grang ba 'joms par nus pa 'jig rten la grags pa bstan pas thams cad de ltar 'gyur na ma yin no //
analyzed: me ni kha ba'i gnyen po yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa la me ni grang ba 'joms par nus pa 'jig rten la grags pa bstan pas thams cad de ltar 'gyur na ma yin no //
translated: In the statement, ‚ÄúFire is the antidote to cold,‚Äù fire is taught to be the antidote to cold, but not everything is like that.

original: 'jig rten ni rang gi 'dod pas byas pa'i brda'i rjes su tha snyad 'dogs pa'i phyir /
analyzed: 'jig rten ni rang gi 'dod pas byas pa'i brda'i rjes su tha snyad 'dogs pa'i phyir /
translated: The world makes conventions in accordance with its own desires.

original: 'jig rten 'dir rang gi brda'i rjes su byed pas ci de ltar rtogs sam /
analyzed: 'jig rten 'dir rang gi brda'i rjes su byed pas ci de ltar rtogs sam /
translated: In the world, one understands in accordance with the conventions of symbols.üîΩ

original: 'on te rang bzhin gnas pa las yin zhes the tshom za ba nyid yin no //
analyzed: 'on te rang bzhin gnas pa las yin zhes the tshom za ba nyid yin no //
translated: In this world, one doubts whether one understands things in this way because of the influence of one‚Äôs own signs, or whether it is due to the nature of things.

original: 'jig rten gyi 'dod pas sgra dag gzhan du gyur pa yin na yang gzhan la yang rnam pa gzhan du snang ba'i phyir /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi 'dod pas sgra dag gzhan du gyur pa yin na yang gzhan la yang rnam pa gzhan du snang ba'i phyir /
translated: Even though sounds are transformed by the desires of the world, they appear in another form to another person.

original: 'jig rten gyi grags pa'i rjes su byed pa la yang de dag rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ba nyid srid do //
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi grags pa'i rjes su byed pa la yang de dag rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ba nyid srid do //
translated: Even when one follows the conventions of the world, it is possible that they will be transformed in another way.

original: de bas na 'ga' zhig phyin ci ma log par mthong du zin kyang thams cad de dag de lta bu'i ngo bor grub pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de bas na 'ga' zhig phyin ci ma log par mthong du zin kyang thams cad de dag de lta bu'i ngo bor grub pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, even though some see things without error, it is not the case that everything is established as having that nature.

original: de dag ma byas pa'i rang bzhin can yin na yang 'ga' zhig log pa nyid du nges pas kyang 'gyur ba'i phyir /
analyzed: de dag ma byas pa'i rang bzhin can yin na yang 'ga' zhig log pa nyid du nges pas kyang 'gyur ba'i phyir /
translated: Even though they are not created, some are ascertained as false.

original: rang bzhin yongs su shes pa med pa las thams cad la the tshom du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rang bzhin yongs su shes pa med pa las thams cad la the tshom du 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, doubt arises with regard to everything because of the absence of a complete understanding of their nature.

original: gal te byas pa log pa nyid /
analyzed: gal te byas pa log pa nyid /
translated: If what is created is false,

original: mthong ba nyid kyi phyir na tshig / ma byas bden don can yin te //
analyzed: mthong ba nyid kyi phyir na tshig / ma byas bden don can yin te //
translated: Because of being seen, the word is not unproduced, because of having a true meaning.

original: ldog pas 'gal ba khyab phyir ro //
analyzed: ldog pas 'gal ba khyab phyir ro //
translated: Because of the pervasion of the contradiction by the contrapositive.

original: ci ste log pa'i don can gyi tshig gang yin pa de ma lus pa'i byas pa yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: ci ste log pa'i don can gyi tshig gang yin pa de ma lus pa'i byas pa yin pa'i phyir /
translated: If the word that has a false meaning is unproduced because of being completely produced,

original: gtan tshigs ldog pas bsgrub par bya ba log pa la khyab pa'i phyir gzhan la mi srid pas na /
analyzed: gtan tshigs ldog pas bsgrub par bya ba log pa la khyab pa'i phyir gzhan la mi srid pas na /
translated: then the reason, the contrapositive, pervades the probandum, the false, because it is impossible for it to be otherwise.

original: ma byas pa ni bden pa'i don can yin no zhes bya bar rjes su 'gro ba med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ma byas pa ni bden pa'i don can yin no zhes bya bar rjes su 'gro ba med par 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, the unproduced has a true meaning.

original: gang la gang gis ma khyab na /
analyzed: gang la gang gis ma khyab na /
translated: If something does not pervade another,

original: de la 'dogs par bya ba na /
analyzed: de la 'dogs par bya ba na /
translated: then when it is designated,

original: 'gal ba dag ni gcig la yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'gal ba dag ni gcig la yod pa ma yin no //
translated: the contradiction does not exist in one.

original: med na yang rigs mi mthun pa la rnam pa gzhan med pas 'dod pa'i don grub pa'i phyir dang / de sgrub pa'i byed pa nyid yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: med na yang rigs mi mthun pa la rnam pa gzhan med pas 'dod pa'i don grub pa'i phyir dang / de sgrub pa'i byed pa nyid yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Even if it does not exist, because of the establishment of the intended meaning by the absence of another aspect in the dissimilar class, and because of the activity of establishing that,

original: rtags kyi rjes su 'gro ba bstan pa don med pa yin te /
analyzed: rtags kyi rjes su 'gro ba bstan pa don med pa yin te /
translated: the teaching of the positive concomitance of the reason is pointless.

original: ldog pa tsam nyid kyis grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ldog pa tsam nyid kyis grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because it is established by the contrapositive alone.

original: de ni bden te gal te gtan tshigs bsgrub par bya ba'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs la khyab par bya ba dang / khyab par byed pa'i ngo bo grub par 'gyur na de yang grub pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de ni bden te gal te gtan tshigs bsgrub par bya ba'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs la khyab par bya ba dang / khyab par byed pa'i ngo bo grub par 'gyur na de yang grub pa ma yin no //
translated: That is true, but if the pervasion of the reason by the predicate of the probandum were established in the discordant side, then that would be established, but it is not.üîΩThus:

original: 'di ltar / med @350b phyir gtan tshigs ma bstan na'ang //
analyzed: 'di ltar / med @350b phyir gtan tshigs ma bstan na'ang //
translated: Even if the reason is not stated because it does not exist,

original: de ni yod par dogs 'gyur te //üîΩdngos po 'gal ba dag la yang //
analyzed: de ni yod par dogs 'gyur te // dngos po 'gal ba dag la yang //
translated: there is doubt that it exists.

original: khyab par byed pa mthong phyir ro //
analyzed: khyab par byed pa mthong phyir ro //
translated: Because the pervader is seen even in things that are contradictory.

original: gal te gtan tshigs bsgrub par bya ba mi mthun pa'i phyogs la med par 'grub par 'gyur na /
analyzed: gal te gtan tshigs bsgrub par bya ba mi mthun pa'i phyogs la med par 'grub par 'gyur na /
translated: If the reason were established as not existing in the discordant side of the predicate of the probandum,

original: bsgrub par bya ba log pa la gtan tshigs ldog pas khyab par 'gyur na /
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba log pa la gtan tshigs ldog pas khyab par 'gyur na /
translated: then the reversal of the predicate of the probandum would pervade the reversal of the reason.

original: de la de med pa la tshad ma yang ma mthong ngo //
analyzed: de la de med pa la tshad ma yang ma mthong ngo //
translated: But we do not see a valid cognition of that nonexistence.

original: mi 'gal ba bsgrub par bya ba la yang dgag pa sgrub par byed pa rigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: mi 'gal ba bsgrub par bya ba la yang dgag pa sgrub par byed pa rigs pa ma yin te /
translated: And it is not logical to prove a noncontradictory probandum with a negation,

original: thal ches pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thal ches pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because that is too broad.

original: tha dad pa'i 'gal ba dang lhan cig 'byung ba can dag kyang mthong ba'i phyir /
analyzed: tha dad pa'i 'gal ba dang lhan cig 'byung ba can dag kyang mthong ba'i phyir /
translated: Because we see that things that are contradictory in the sense of being mutually exclusive can also occur together.

original: gcig la mthong ba yang gzhan la med pa nyid ma yin te /
analyzed: gcig la mthong ba yang gzhan la med pa nyid ma yin te /
translated: And just because something is seen in one thing does not mean that it is not seen in another.

original: brtsal ma thag tu 'byung ba nyid dang cig shos dag la mi rtag pa nyid bzhin no //
analyzed: brtsal ma thag tu 'byung ba nyid dang cig shos dag la mi rtag pa nyid bzhin no //
translated: For example, impermanence is seen in things that are produced by effort and in things that are not.

original: de lta bu'i rnam pa yang mthong ba med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de lta bu'i rnam pa yang mthong ba med pa'i phyir /
translated: And because we do not see such a nature,

original: med pa nyid kho na ma yin no //
analyzed: med pa nyid kho na ma yin no //
translated: it is not the case that it does not exist.üîΩAs it is said:

original: 'di ltar / thams cad du ni mi dmigs phyir /
analyzed: 'di ltar / thams cad du ni mi dmigs phyir /
translated: Because it is not observed everywhere,

original: med nyid mi 'grub ces ni bshad //
analyzed: med nyid mi 'grub ces ni bshad //
translated: nonexistence is not established.

original: med pa nyid ni mi 'grub na //
analyzed: med pa nyid ni mi 'grub na //
translated: If nonexistence is not established,

original: ldog pa nyid la the tshom za //
analyzed: ldog pa nyid la the tshom za //
translated: then there is doubt about cessation.

original: skyes bu tsam 'dis ni thams cad mthong bar nus pa ma yin na gang gis na 'di'i mthong ba ldog pas de ltar mi 'gyur /
analyzed: skyes bu tsam 'dis ni thams cad mthong bar nus pa ma yin na gang gis na 'di'i mthong ba ldog pas de ltar mi 'gyur /
translated: If this person is not able to see everything, then how could his seeing be stopped?

original: gang gi ye shes shes bya yod pa nyid la 'khrul pa med pa de nyid kyis gzigs pa'i phyir med do //
analyzed: gang gi ye shes shes bya yod pa nyid la 'khrul pa med pa de nyid kyis gzigs pa'i phyir med do //
translated: Because it is seen by the one whose knowledge is not mistaken about the existence of objects of knowledge, it is not the case that it does not exist.

original: zhes gsungs pa mdzes par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zhes gsungs pa mdzes par 'gyur ro //
translated: This statement would be beautiful.

original: de bas na rang bzhin dang dus dang yul gyi bskal bas 'di yod du zin kyang rigs par 'gyur ba ma yin no //
analyzed: de bas na rang bzhin dang dus dang yul gyi bskal bas 'di yod du zin kyang rigs par 'gyur ba ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, even if it exists, it is not reasonable that it is the cause of the cognition, because of the difference of nature, time, and place.

original: de ltar na thams cad mthong ba'i ngang tshul can ma yin pa gang gis ma byas pa'am /
analyzed: de ltar na thams cad mthong ba'i ngang tshul can ma yin pa gang gis ma byas pa'am /
translated: Thus, it is not the case that everyone has the same experience.

original: cig shos kyi tshig ni shin tu lkog tu gyur pa'i don la mi slu ba'am cig shos la nges par nus /
analyzed: cig shos kyi tshig ni shin tu lkog tu gyur pa'i don la mi slu ba'am cig shos la nges par nus /
translated: The statement of the other party is not conclusive with regard to the meaning that is very obscure, or with regard to the other party.

original: la la na de ltar mthong ba'i don rnams kyang rnam pa 'ga' zhig gis gzhan du 'gyur te /
analyzed: la la na de ltar mthong ba'i don rnams kyang rnam pa 'ga' zhig gis gzhan du 'gyur te /
translated: Some say that even the objects that are seen in that way are different in some way.

original: dper na yul la lar 'du bya ba'i khyad par las ni nim pa'i 'bras bu dang / skyu ru ra'i 'bras bu mngar mor chags par 'gyur la /
analyzed: dper na yul la lar 'du bya ba'i khyad par las ni nim pa'i 'bras bu dang / skyu ru ra'i 'bras bu mngar mor chags par 'gyur la /
translated: For example, in some places, due to the particular conditions of the place, the fruit of the neem tree becomes sweet like the fruit of the emblic myrobalan.

original: da ltar ni de ma mthong ba nyid kyis de dag ni spang bar bya ba ma yin pa lta bu'o zhes bya bas bstan zin to //
analyzed: da ltar ni de ma mthong ba nyid kyis de dag ni spang bar bya ba ma yin pa lta bu'o zhes bya bas bstan zin to //
translated: But now, because we do not see that, we should not abandon those.

original: de bas na ma byas pa dang log pa'i don can du 'gyur ba zhes bya ba 'gal ba ma mthong ngo //
analyzed: de bas na ma byas pa dang log pa'i don can du 'gyur ba zhes bya ba 'gal ba ma mthong ngo //
translated: Thus, it is not seen that there is a contradiction in saying that it is not the cause and that it has a false meaning.

original: mi dmigs pa 'di ni snang ba'i bdag nyid can dag gi sgrub par byed pa ma yin no zhes bshad zin to //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa 'di ni snang ba'i bdag nyid can dag gi sgrub par byed pa ma yin no zhes bshad zin to //
translated: This non-observation is not a proof for those who have the nature of appearances.

original: de bas na cung zhig log pa'i @351a * //
analyzed: de bas na cung zhig log pa'i @351a * //
translated: Therefore, whatever has a meaning that is partially reversed

original: don can gang yin pa de thams cad ni skyes bus byas pa yin no zhes bya bar nges pa med pa'i phyir khyab ba med do //
analyzed: don can gang yin pa de thams cad ni skyes bus byas pa yin no zhes bya bar nges pa med pa'i phyir khyab ba med do //
translated: is not necessarily a proof of what is created by a person.

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /
translated: Thus,

original: gal te rjes 'gro ldog pa'am //
analyzed: gal te rjes 'gro ldog pa'am //
translated: If there is a pervasion of the probandum

original: bsgrub bya'i chos can la yod nyid //üîΩde nges 'bras can shes pa yis //
analyzed: bsgrub bya'i chos can la yod nyid // de nges 'bras can shes pa yis //
translated: by the property of the subject,üîΩthen the proof is established

original: grub par 'gyur ba sgrub byed yin //
analyzed: grub par 'gyur ba sgrub byed yin //
translated: by the cognition that definitely has that result.

original: de skad du yang brjod pa gang zhig gnyi ga la nges pa de kho na sgrub par byed pa'am sun 'byin par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: de skad du yang brjod pa gang zhig gnyi ga la nges pa de kho na sgrub par byed pa'am sun 'byin par byed pa yin no //
translated: In that way, whatever expression is ascertained in both [the proof and the probandum] is a proof or a refutation.

original: brjod pa gang yang rung ba la grags pa dang the tshom za ba ni ma yin te /
analyzed: brjod pa gang yang rung ba la grags pa dang the tshom za ba ni ma yin te /
translated: An expression that is either renowned or doubted is not [a proof or a refutation],

original: yang sgrub par byed pa la ltos pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: yang sgrub par byed pa la ltos pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because it would depend on another proof.

original: zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes gsungs so //
translated: Thus it is said.

original: 'di la 'gal ba ma mthong ba can yod pa gang gis spong bar byed /
analyzed: 'di la 'gal ba ma mthong ba can yod pa gang gis spong bar byed /
translated: What person, who does not see a contradiction here, would reject it?

original: de bas na ldog pa 'di ni the tshom za ba'i phyir sgrub par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de bas na ldog pa 'di ni the tshom za ba'i phyir sgrub par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, this reversal is not a proof, because it is doubtful.üîΩMoreover,

original: gzhan yang / gang la bsgrub bya'i mi mthun phyogs //
analyzed: gzhan yang / gang la bsgrub bya'i mi mthun phyogs //
translated: The very reversal of the probandum

original: bzlog pa nyid brjod de nyid ni //üîΩ'di yi phyogs mthun 'gyur de'i phyir //
analyzed: bzlog pa nyid brjod de nyid ni // 'di yi phyogs mthun 'gyur de'i phyir //
translated: in the discordant side is the same asüîΩthe concordant side of this [reversal].

original: gtan tshigs thams cad rjes 'gro can //
analyzed: gtan tshigs thams cad rjes 'gro can //
translated: Therefore, all reasons are pervasives.

original: cung zhig log pa'i don can gang yin pa de thams cad ni skyes bus byas pa yin pa de ltar na /
analyzed: cung zhig log pa'i don can gang yin pa de thams cad ni skyes bus byas pa yin pa de ltar na /
translated: Whatever has a slightly reversed meaning is all created by a person.

original: gtan tshigs kyi mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyis bsgrub par bya ba'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs la khyab pa de med na med pa grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gtan tshigs kyi mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyis bsgrub par bya ba'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs la khyab pa de med na med pa grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, when the discordant side of the reason pervades the discordant side of the probandum, the non-existence without [the reason] is established.

original: de med par yod na ni des khyab pa mi rung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de med par yod na ni des khyab pa mi rung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because if it existed without [the probandum], it would not be pervaded by it.

original: rigs mi mthun pa ldog pa grub pa gang yin pa de nyid rjes su 'gro ba grub pa yin te /
analyzed: rigs mi mthun pa ldog pa grub pa gang yin pa de nyid rjes su 'gro ba grub pa yin te /
translated: Whatever establishment of the reversal in a dissimilar type is the establishment of the pervasion.

original: bsgrub par bya ba'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs rnam par gcod pa'i mtshan nyid can yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs rnam par gcod pa'i mtshan nyid can yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the definition of a negative is the elimination of the object of negation.

original: dgag pa nyid kyis kyang bya ba 'grub pa'i phyir /
analyzed: dgag pa nyid kyis kyang bya ba 'grub pa'i phyir /
translated: And because the activity of a negative is accomplished by the negative itself,

original: rjes su 'gro ba med par ldog pa'i khyab par 'grub pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba med par ldog pa'i khyab par 'grub pa ma yin no //
translated: the pervasion of a negative by the absence of positive concomitance is not established.

original: de bas na gtan tshigs 'ga' zhig kyang rjes su 'gro ba med pa can zhes bya ba ma yin te /
analyzed: de bas na gtan tshigs 'ga' zhig kyang rjes su 'gro ba med pa can zhes bya ba ma yin te /
translated: Therefore, no reason is called ‚Äúwithout positive concomitance,‚Äù

original: gcig rnam par gcod pa ni de'i rigs mi mthun pa grub pa med na mi 'byung ba nyid yin pa'i phyir ro /üîΩ// / bam po bcu pa /
analyzed: gcig rnam par gcod pa ni de'i rigs mi mthun pa grub pa med na mi 'byung ba nyid yin pa'i phyir ro / // / bam po bcu pa /
translated: because the elimination of one thing is the non-existence of that thing‚Äôs type.

original: mi rtag pa dang bdag med pa nyid la sogs pa rnam par gcod pa na yang de ltar 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: mi rtag pa dang bdag med pa nyid la sogs pa rnam par gcod pa na yang de ltar 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: If you say that the same is true of impermanence and selflessness,

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: no, it is not.

original: ldog pa rnam par gcod pa ni dngos po'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ldog pa rnam par gcod pa ni dngos po'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the elimination of a negative is the nature of a thing.

original: dngos po'i ngo bo rnam par gcod pa na dngos po 'phen bar byed pa ma yin zhing med pa rnam par gcod pas kyang nges par dngos po nye bar 'jog pa yin te /
analyzed: dngos po'i ngo bo rnam par gcod pa na dngos po 'phen bar byed pa ma yin zhing med pa rnam par gcod pas kyang nges par dngos po nye bar 'jog pa yin te /
translated: When the nature of an entity is eliminated, the entity is not projected, and when non-entity is eliminated, the entity is definitely posited,

original: dngos po dang dngos po med pa dag @351b ni phan tshun dpen pa'i ngo bo yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dngos po dang dngos po med pa dag @351b ni phan tshun dpen pa'i ngo bo yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because entity and non-entity are mutually exclusive natures.

original: ldog pa gang yin pa de dngos po med pa'i ngo bo can ldog par gyur pas /
analyzed: ldog pa gang yin pa de dngos po med pa'i ngo bo can ldog par gyur pas /
translated: That which is the exclusion is the nature of non-entity, and it becomes the exclusion.

original: dngos po nye bar 'jog par byed pa de ltar bdag med pa la sogs pa ni ma yin no /
analyzed: dngos po nye bar 'jog par byed pa de ltar bdag med pa la sogs pa ni ma yin no /
translated: Thus, the entity is posited, but not so for selflessness, etc.

original: rang bzhin gyi khyad par yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rang bzhin gyi khyad par yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because they are different in nature.

original: bya ba dang longs spyod pa dag bdag gir byed pa la rang dbang ma yin pa'i bdag nyid ni bdag med pa'o //
analyzed: bya ba dang longs spyod pa dag bdag gir byed pa la rang dbang ma yin pa'i bdag nyid ni bdag med pa'o //
translated: The absence of self is the absence of independence in the appropriation of action and enjoyment.

original: de la rang dbang gi mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir bdag yin no //
analyzed: de la rang dbang gi mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir bdag yin no //
translated: It is the self because it has the characteristic of independence.

original: de bas na ngo bo bdag med pa yin gyi bdag ldog pa tsam ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de bas na ngo bo bdag med pa yin gyi bdag ldog pa tsam ni ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, the nature is selfless, but it is not merely the exclusion of self.

original: de lta ma yin na nye bar brjod pa med pa la byas pa nyid la sogs pa mi rung ba'i phyir /
analyzed: de lta ma yin na nye bar brjod pa med pa la byas pa nyid la sogs pa mi rung ba'i phyir /
translated: Otherwise, if it were not so, then it would be impossible to say that the self is not, etc.

original: de las bdag med pa 'grub par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de las bdag med pa 'grub par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, selflessness would not be established.

original: gal te bdag rnam par gcad nas bdag med pa'i ngo bo rjod par byed pa'i phyir skyon yod pa ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gal te bdag rnam par gcad nas bdag med pa'i ngo bo rjod par byed pa'i phyir skyon yod pa ma yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that there is no fault because the nature of selflessness is expressed by the exclusion of self,

original: ma yin pas dngos po la reg pa'i phyir /
analyzed: ma yin pas dngos po la reg pa'i phyir /
translated: then it is not so, because it would touch upon an existent thing.

original: dngos po'i ngo bo de nyid bdag med pa thob po //
analyzed: dngos po'i ngo bo de nyid bdag med pa thob po //
translated: The nature of an existent thing is obtained as selflessness.

original: gang gi rnam par bcad pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo ma yin gyi de'i rnam par gcod pa dngos po'i ngo bo yin na yang dngos po grub par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir /
analyzed: gang gi rnam par bcad pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo ma yin gyi de'i rnam par gcod pa dngos po'i ngo bo yin na yang dngos po grub par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir /
translated: If the exclusion of that is not the nature of a non-existent thing, but the exclusion of that is the nature of an existent thing, then an existent thing would not be established.

original: rjes su 'gro ba 'phangs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba 'phangs pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, the entailment is not established.

original: de ltar na bdag med pa yin na yang dngos por 'grub par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: de ltar na bdag med pa yin na yang dngos por 'grub par mi 'gyur te /
translated: Thus, even if it is selflessness, it would not be established as an existent thing.

original: dper na gson po'i lus 'di ni bdag med pa ma yin te /
analyzed: dper na gson po'i lus 'di ni bdag med pa ma yin te /
translated: For example, this living body is not selfless,

original: srog la sogs pa dang ldan pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: srog la sogs pa dang ldan pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because it possesses life, etc.

original: mi mthun pa'i phyogs dag gi khyab par bya ba dang khyab par byed pa dpyod pa na srog la sogs pa dang mi ldan pa nyid la bdag med pa nyid mthong ba dang de med na med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: mi mthun pa'i phyogs dag gi khyab par bya ba dang khyab par byed pa dpyod pa na srog la sogs pa dang mi ldan pa nyid la bdag med pa nyid mthong ba dang de med na med pa'i phyir /
translated: When the pervasion and the pervaded are examined, the self is seen to be nonexistent in the absence of life, etc., and in the absence of the self, life, etc., are also seen to be nonexistent.

original: bdag med pa dag nyid med du zin kyang /
analyzed: bdag med pa dag nyid med du zin kyang /
translated: Therefore, even though the self and life, etc., are nonexistent,

original: srog la sogs pa dag ni bdag la grub par 'jog par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: srog la sogs pa dag ni bdag la grub par 'jog par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: life, etc., are not established as the self.

original: de ltar na bsgrub par bya ba la yang srog la sogs pa dag gis 'ba' zhig bsal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar na bsgrub par bya ba la yang srog la sogs pa dag gis 'ba' zhig bsal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, the probandum is also refuted by life, etc.

original: bdag med pa nyid la med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: bdag med pa nyid la med pa'i phyir /
translated: because they are nonexistent in the absence of selflessness.

original: srog la sogs pas de bsal ba yin gyi bdag nye bar 'jog pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: srog la sogs pas de bsal ba yin gyi bdag nye bar 'jog pa ni ma yin te /
translated: Life, etc., refute that, but they do not establish the self,

original: de la yod pa ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de la yod pa ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because their existence is not established.

original: bdag med pa la log pas kyang bdag grub pa ma yin te /
analyzed: bdag med pa la log pas kyang bdag grub pa ma yin te /
translated: The self is not established by the negation of selflessness,

original: mi mthun phyogs la ldog pa mthong ba na yang mthun pa'i phyogs la yang thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mi mthun phyogs la ldog pa mthong ba na yang mthun pa'i phyogs la yang thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because if the negation of the counter-correlate is seen, then the presence of the correlate is entailed.

original: de bas na ldog pa ma grub pa na @352a * //
analyzed: de bas na ldog pa ma grub pa na @352a * //
translated: Therefore, when the contradistinction is not established,

original: bzlog pa'i khyab pa yod pa ma yin te /üîΩde grub pa nyid kyis kyang rjes su 'gro ba grub pa'am /
analyzed: bzlog pa'i khyab pa yod pa ma yin te / de grub pa nyid kyis kyang rjes su 'gro ba grub pa'am /
translated: the pervasion of the contradistinction does not exist.üîΩEven if it were established, the pervasion would be established;

original: ma grub pa ni ldog pa bzlog pa grub tu zin kyang de ma grub pa'i phyir bsgrub par bya ba la yang thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ma grub pa ni ldog pa bzlog pa grub tu zin kyang de ma grub pa'i phyir bsgrub par bya ba la yang thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: or, if it were not established, then even if the contradistinction of the contradistinction were established, because it would not be established, it would follow that the probandum would not be established.

original: de bas na ldog pa'i khyab pa la rjes su 'gro ba med pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de bas na ldog pa'i khyab pa la rjes su 'gro ba med pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, the pervasion of the contradistinction is not non-existent.

original: log pa'i don can dag ni skyes bus byas pa nyid kyis khyab pas skyes bus ma byas pa las log pa yin du zin kyang /
analyzed: log pa'i don can dag ni skyes bus byas pa nyid kyis khyab pas skyes bus ma byas pa las log pa yin du zin kyang /
translated: Since the meaning of ‚Äúfalse‚Äù is pervaded by being produced by a person, it is the contradistinction of not being produced by a person.

original: bden pa'i don can nyid ma yin te /
analyzed: bden pa'i don can nyid ma yin te /
translated: But it is not the contradistinction of having the meaning of truth,

original: rnam pa gzhan yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam pa gzhan yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is another aspect.

original: sgra rnams la phung po gnyis yod na ni de ltar 'gyur te /
analyzed: sgra rnams la phung po gnyis yod na ni de ltar 'gyur te /
translated: If there were two classes of words, it would be so,

original: gcig log pa na rnam pa gzhan med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gcig log pa na rnam pa gzhan med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because when one is contradistinguished, the other aspect does not exist.

original: de dag don med pa can du 'gyur ba de ltar na 'dod pa'i don grub pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de dag don med pa can du 'gyur ba de ltar na 'dod pa'i don grub pa ma yin no //
translated: If they were to become meaningless, then the desired meaning would not be established.

original: gal te don rtogs pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gal te don rtogs pa'i phyir /
translated: If you say that it is in order to understand the meaning,üîΩ

original: don med pa can ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: don med pa can ma yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that words are not meaningless because they cause one to understand the meaning,

original: de dag gi skyes bu'i bya bas 'gyur te /
analyzed: de dag gi skyes bu'i bya bas 'gyur te /
translated: we reply that this is due to the activity of a person.

original: don gzhan la rnam par rtog pa bzhin no //
analyzed: don gzhan la rnam par rtog pa bzhin no //
translated: It is like the case of a concept having a different meaning.

original: dper na bha ra ta la sogs pa'i lugs la sogs pa ni de'i don can ma yin du zin kyang don gzhan dag gi rnam pa gzhan du bshad pa de'i rjes su 'brangs nas gzhan gyis kyang de ltar rtogs par 'gyur ba lta bu'o //üîΩskyes bus bstan pa la rag las pa'i phyir /
analyzed: dper na bha ra ta la sogs pa'i lugs la sogs pa ni de'i don can ma yin du zin kyang don gzhan dag gi rnam pa gzhan du bshad pa de'i rjes su 'brangs nas gzhan gyis kyang de ltar rtogs par 'gyur ba lta bu'o // skyes bus bstan pa la rag las pa'i phyir /
translated: For example, in the case of the Bharata and so on, even though the words do not have that meaning, other meanings are explained in other ways, and others understand them in that way following that explanation.

original: don med pa can dag la don du rnam par rtog pa 'di ni skyes bus byas byas par 'gyur ba yin gyi /
analyzed: don med pa can dag la don du rnam par rtog pa 'di ni skyes bus byas byas par 'gyur ba yin gyi /
translated: This concept of meaning in meaningless words is due to the activity of a person,

original: sgra'i rang bzhin gyis byas pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: sgra'i rang bzhin gyis byas pa ni ma yin te /
translated: not due to the nature of the words themselves.

original: don gzhan nyid bzhin no //
analyzed: don gzhan nyid bzhin no //
translated: It is like the case of a different meaning.

original: ngo bo nyid kyis me la sogs pa gsal bar byed pa de la ltos pa ma yin te /
analyzed: ngo bo nyid kyis me la sogs pa gsal bar byed pa de la ltos pa ma yin te /
translated: It is not dependent on a person to illuminate fire and so on by nature.

original: skyes bus bdag nyid kyi brda'i bya ba brjod pa na ston par byed pa zhes bya ba ni rigs pa yin no //
analyzed: skyes bus bdag nyid kyi brda'i bya ba brjod pa na ston par byed pa zhes bya ba ni rigs pa yin no //
translated: It is reasonable to say that when a person expresses the activity of a sign, he is teaching.

original: skyes bus brdar byas pa dang ngo bo nyid kyis grub pa'i don dag ni bstan pa la rag lus par khyad par med pa'i phyir dang / khyad par gzhan med pa'i phyir gcig ni ngo bo nyid kyis grub pa yin la /
analyzed: skyes bus brdar byas pa dang ngo bo nyid kyis grub pa'i don dag ni bstan pa la rag lus par khyad par med pa'i phyir dang / khyad par gzhan med pa'i phyir gcig ni ngo bo nyid kyis grub pa yin la /
translated: Since there is no difference in the need for teaching in the case of objects that are established by nature and those that are established by convention, and since there is no other difference, one is established by nature and the other is established by convention.

original: gzhan ni skyes bus byas ba yin no zhes nges par dka' ba yin no //
analyzed: gzhan ni skyes bus byas ba yin no zhes nges par dka' ba yin no //
translated: It is difficult to ascertain which is which.

original: gal te tshad mas mi slu ba'i bye brag yod do zhe na /
analyzed: gal te tshad mas mi slu ba'i bye brag yod do zhe na /
translated: If you say that there is a difference in the validity of the two,

original: de ni 'og nas shin tu lkog tu gyur pa'i don la tshad ma gzhan 'jug pa med do zhes bya bas 'gog par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ni 'og nas shin tu lkog tu gyur pa'i don la tshad ma gzhan 'jug pa med do zhes bya bas 'gog par 'gyur ro //
translated: then this will be refuted later when it says, ‚ÄúThere is no other valid cognition that engages a completely hidden object.‚ÄùüîΩIf you assert that the only difference between objects that are similar in being objects of valid cognition is that one is nondeceptive and the other is deceptive,

original: chos mthun pa can gyi don dag las tshad mas mi slu ba tsam @352b gyi khyad par gcig la skyes bus ma byas pa nyid du 'dod na /
analyzed: chos mthun pa can gyi don dag las tshad mas mi slu ba tsam @352b gyi khyad par gcig la skyes bus ma byas pa nyid du 'dod na /
translated: and that the only difference between objects that are similar in being nondeceptive is that one is produced by a person and the other is not produced by a person,

original: da ni ches shin tu mang po skyes bus byas pa ma yin pa de ltar na /
analyzed: da ni ches shin tu mang po skyes bus byas pa ma yin pa de ltar na /
translated: Now, if a very great many are not created by a person,

original: skyes bus byas pa'i dag 'ga' zhig kyang de lta bu'i rnam pa yin pa'i phyir de dag la yang thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: skyes bus byas pa'i dag 'ga' zhig kyang de lta bu'i rnam pa yin pa'i phyir de dag la yang thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: then some created by a person would also be like that, and so the absurd consequence would follow for them as well.

original: de dang 'dra bar de dag gi mngon bar 'dod pa'i don dang ldan pa nyid kyang skyes bus byas pa dang tshad ma'i rjes su byed pa can du yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de dang 'dra bar de dag gi mngon bar 'dod pa'i don dang ldan pa nyid kyang skyes bus byas pa dang tshad ma'i rjes su byed pa can du yang 'gyur ro //
translated: And the mere fact that they have the desired effect would also be created by a person and would follow from a valid cognition, just like that.

original: gzhan yang sngags dang skyes bus byas pa ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di la gnod pa yang mthong ngo //
analyzed: gzhan yang sngags dang skyes bus byas pa ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di la gnod pa yang mthong ngo //
translated: Moreover, we see that the mantra is not created by a person.

original: de ltar ni /üîΩla la brdar byas nyid yin na //
analyzed: de ltar ni / la la brdar byas nyid yin na //
translated: In that case,üîΩsome are just created by convention.

original: sngags rnams 'bras bu sgrub byed yin par rigs so //
analyzed: sngags rnams 'bras bu sgrub byed yin par rigs so //
translated: It is reasonable that the mantra accomplishes the effect.

original: gal te sngags de dag 'di ltar kho bos mngon par 'dod pa'i rgyu can gyi ngag byas pa de nyid la de ltar sbyar bar byed pa na don 'dis sbyar bar bya'o snyam pas gzhan gyi don gtso bor gyur pa'i ngor byas pa'am /
analyzed: gal te sngags de dag 'di ltar kho bos mngon par 'dod pa'i rgyu can gyi ngag byas pa de nyid la de ltar sbyar bar byed pa na don 'dis sbyar bar bya'o snyam pas gzhan gyi don gtso bor gyur pa'i ngor byas pa'am /
translated: If the mantra is applied to the very speech that is the cause of what is desired by the one who recites it, and if the mantra is applied with the thought ‚ÄúThis meaning is applied,‚Äù then it is applied with the intention of benefiting others.

original: gzhan 'ga' zhig gis la lar brdar byas par 'gyur ba de'i tshe sngags kyi sbyor ba las 'ga' zhig gi tshe don grub par rigs pa yin te /
analyzed: gzhan 'ga' zhig gis la lar brdar byas par 'gyur ba de'i tshe sngags kyi sbyor ba las 'ga' zhig gi tshe don grub par rigs pa yin te /
translated: Or if the mantra is applied by some other person to some other person, then it is reasonable that the meaning is accomplished at some time through the application of the mantra.

original: 'don par byed pa dag gi snyan dngags mkhan gyi brda byas pa las don grub pa bzhin no //
analyzed: 'don par byed pa dag gi snyan dngags mkhan gyi brda byas pa las don grub pa bzhin no //
translated: This is just like the meaning that is accomplished through the application of the poet‚Äôs mantra by those who recite it.

original: ci ste'ang dngos po'i nus yin na //
analyzed: ci ste'ang dngos po'i nus yin na //
translated: But if the mantra is the power of things,

original: khyad par med phyir gzhan la'ang 'gyur //
analyzed: khyad par med phyir gzhan la'ang 'gyur //
translated: then it would apply to others, because it would be without distinction.

original: skyes bu'i brda las sngags rnams kyis don grub pa ma yin no //
analyzed: skyes bu'i brda las sngags rnams kyis don grub pa ma yin no //
translated: Mantras do not accomplish their purpose through the application of the poet‚Äôs mantra by a person.

original: 'o na ci zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na /
translated: What then?

original: 'di rnam pa 'ga' zhig ltar nges par sbyar ba na /
analyzed: 'di rnam pa 'ga' zhig ltar nges par sbyar ba na /
translated: If the mantra is applied in some way,

original: 'bras bu 'byin pa gang yin pa de dag ni dngos po'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: 'bras bu 'byin pa gang yin pa de dag ni dngos po'i rang bzhin no //
translated: The nature of things is to produce their effects.

original: 'o na ni yi ge rnams kyi ngo bo de thams cad khyad par med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: 'o na ni yi ge rnams kyi ngo bo de thams cad khyad par med pa'i phyir /
translated: But since the nature of the letters is the same in all cases,

original: ji ltar rnam pa 'ga' zhig ltar sbyar ba las kyang 'bras bur 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ji ltar rnam pa 'ga' zhig ltar sbyar ba las kyang 'bras bur 'gyur ro //
translated: why is it that the effect is produced only when the letters are arranged in a certain way and not when they are arranged in some other way?

original: yi ge kho na sngags yin gyi gzhan cung zad kyang yod pa ma yin no //üîΩgal te de'i bkod pa yang sngags yin no zhe na /
analyzed: yi ge kho na sngags yin gyi gzhan cung zad kyang yod pa ma yin no // gal te de'i bkod pa yang sngags yin no zhe na /
translated: The letters themselves are the mantra, and nothing else.üîΩIf the arrangement of the letters is the mantra,

original: don gzhan nyid du gyur pa yi //
analyzed: don gzhan nyid du gyur pa yi //
translated: then the mantra would be something different from the letters.

original: bkod pa'ang sngar ni bsal ba yin //
analyzed: bkod pa'ang sngar ni bsal ba yin //
translated: But this has already been refuted.

original: yi ge dag las tha dad pa pa bkod pa gzhan ni med do zhes de bstan zin to //
analyzed: yi ge dag las tha dad pa pa bkod pa gzhan ni med do zhes de bstan zin to //
translated: There is no arrangement of the letters that is different from the letters.üîΩThis has already been demonstrated.

original: tha dad pa med na yang yi ge nyid sngags yin la /
analyzed: tha dad pa med na yang yi ge nyid sngags yin la /
translated: If the arrangement is not different from the letters, then the letters themselves are the mantra.

original: de dag kyang thams cad du khyad par med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de dag kyang thams cad du khyad par med pa'i phyir /
translated: And since the letters are the same in all cases,

original: thams cad kyi tshe 'bras bu 'byin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: thams cad kyi tshe 'bras bu 'byin par 'gyur ro //
translated: the effect should be produced in all cases.

original: bkod pa ces chung ba yang nyams pa las 'khrul pa yang mthong ngo//
analyzed: bkod pa ces chung ba yang nyams pa las 'khrul pa yang mthong ngo//
translated: But we also see that the effect is produced when the letters are arranged in a certain way and not when they are arranged in some other way.

original: @353a * // 'ga' zhig nan tan du byas pa las lha nyid thag nye ba'i phyir dang / tshogs pa med pas mnyes par ma byas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: @353a * // 'ga' zhig nan tan du byas pa las lha nyid thag nye ba'i phyir dang / tshogs pa med pas mnyes par ma byas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Some are not effective because they are far from the deity, and some are not effective because they are not propitiated due to the absence of a gathering.

original: thams cad nyams na ni brda 'ga' zhig kyang nan tan tu byas pa med pas thag nye ba na med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: thams cad nyams na ni brda 'ga' zhig kyang nan tan tu byas pa med pas thag nye ba na med pa'i phyir /
translated: If all are ineffective, then even some are not effective because they are far from the deity due to the absence of effort.

original: don dang don med pa ma yin no //
analyzed: don dang don med pa ma yin no //
translated: Thus, it is not the case that there is no meaning or purpose.

original: gzhan yang bkod pa don gzhan nyid dam don gzhan nyid ma yin na sngags yi ge'i bdag nyid can nam /
analyzed: gzhan yang bkod pa don gzhan nyid dam don gzhan nyid ma yin na sngags yi ge'i bdag nyid can nam /
translated: Moreover, if the arrangement is different or not different from the meaning, then the mantra, which is the nature of syllables,

original: de'i bkod pa'i bdag nyid can don can gyi rgyu rtag pa ni ma byas pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: de'i bkod pa'i bdag nyid can don can gyi rgyu rtag pa ni ma byas pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: or the nature of its arrangement, is a permanent cause of meaning, because it is not produced.üîΩThus, it is always present.

original: rtag tu nye ba yin pa de ltar na /
analyzed: rtag tu nye ba yin pa de ltar na /
translated: In that case,

original: rtag tu de las don grub 'gyur //
analyzed: rtag tu de las don grub 'gyur //
translated: the meaning would always be accomplished.

original: gang gi phyir dngos po'i nus pa las 'bras bu bskyed na /
analyzed: gang gi phyir dngos po'i nus pa las 'bras bu bskyed na /
translated: Because if an entity's potency generates an effect,

original: de ma tshang ba med pa'i phyir 'bras bu dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ma tshang ba med pa'i phyir 'bras bu dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: then since it is not incomplete, the effect would not be absent.

original: rgyu'i tshogs pa yod na 'bras bu dang bral ba mi rigs te /
analyzed: rgyu'i tshogs pa yod na 'bras bu dang bral ba mi rigs te /
translated: If the assemblage of causes exists, it is not reasonable for the effect to be absent.

original: rgyu nyid ma yin par thal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rgyu nyid ma yin par thal ba'i phyir ro //
