translated: because it would follow that the cause itself would not be a cause.

original: gal te sngags kyi sbyor ba yan 'gar ba las 'dod pa grub pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gal te sngags kyi sbyor ba yan 'gar ba las 'dod pa grub pa ma yin te /
translated: If you say that the desired result is not established by the power of the mantra,

original: de ni cho ga la ltos pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: de ni cho ga la ltos pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhe na /
translated: because it depends on the ritual,

original: ltos pa yin na don med 'gyur //
analyzed: ltos pa yin na don med 'gyur //
translated: then it is pointless to depend on it.

original: gal te sngags kyi cho ga las sam /
analyzed: gal te sngags kyi cho ga las sam /
translated: If the result were established by the power of the mantra ritual,

original: gzhan las rang bzhin phul du byung ba 'ga' zhig thob par 'gyur na de la de'i nus pa la ltos par 'gyur te /
analyzed: gzhan las rang bzhin phul du byung ba 'ga' zhig thob par 'gyur na de la de'i nus pa la ltos par 'gyur te /
translated: or if some special nature were obtained from another, then it would depend on the power of that.

original: rtag pa la de yod pa ma yin no zhes bshad zin to //
analyzed: rtag pa la de yod pa ma yin no zhes bshad zin to //
translated: But it has already been explained that this is not possible for the permanent.

original: de bas na nus pa med pa 'di la ci phyir ltos par 'gyur /üîΩde ltar na ltos pa med pa rtag tu byed pa'am /
analyzed: de bas na nus pa med pa 'di la ci phyir ltos par 'gyur / de ltar na ltos pa med pa rtag tu byed pa'am /
translated: Therefore, why would it depend on this powerless [ritual]?üîΩThus, if it does not depend on anything, it would always be active,

original: cung zhig kyang byed par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: cung zhig kyang byed par mi 'gyur te /
translated: or it would not be active at all,

original: khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there would be no difference.

original: gal te dngos nus de 'dra na //
analyzed: gal te dngos nus de 'dra na //
translated: If the result were established by the power of the mantra ritual,

original: de dag kun gyi sgrub byed 'gyur //üîΩlegs byas min ni byed pa po'i //
analyzed: de dag kun gyi sgrub byed 'gyur // legs byas min ni byed pa po'i //
translated: then it would establish everything.üîΩBut it is not reasonable to depend on the special power of the agent

original: khyad par la ni ltos mi rung //
analyzed: khyad par la ni ltos mi rung //
translated: for the non-virtuous [ritual].

original: gal te dngos po nus pa nyid kyi sngags rnams kyis grub pa ster bar 'gyur na /üîΩde dag gis mchod sbyin byed pa'am /
analyzed: gal te dngos po nus pa nyid kyi sngags rnams kyis grub pa ster bar 'gyur na / de dag gis mchod sbyin byed pa'am /
translated: If things were to grant accomplishment through the power of mantras,üîΩthen they would not be abandoned by those who perform sacrifices,

original: gzhan 'ga' zhig kyang spang bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzhan 'ga' zhig kyang spang bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: or by anyone else.

original: gzhan la ni rang bzhin gyi de'i ngo bo can ma yin par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: gzhan la ni rang bzhin gyi de'i ngo bo can ma yin par mi 'gyur te /
translated: And it is not the case that something that is not essentially that would become that,

original: des de smad pa med pa'i phyir dang / gzhan gyis bstod pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: des de smad pa med pa'i phyir dang / gzhan gyis bstod pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it would not be censured by that, and because it would not be praised by others.

original: 'ga' zhig kyang lhan cig rgyu dang 'bras bu ngo bor mi rung ba'i phyir dang / nye ba dang bskal pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'ga' zhig kyang lhan cig rgyu dang 'bras bu ngo bor mi rung ba'i phyir dang / nye ba dang bskal pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: And it is not possible for anything to be a cause and effect simultaneously, because they are not related as near and distant.

original: de nyid kyi phyir 'di legs par byas pa nyid ma yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir 'di legs par byas pa nyid ma yin pa'i phyir /
translated: For that very reason, because it is not well done,

original: sbyor ba po yang yod pa ma yin na /
analyzed: sbyor ba po yang yod pa ma yin na /
translated: if the performer does not exist,

original: gang las sbyor ba pos @353b 'bras bu thob par 'gyur /üîΩdngos po 'dus byas pa yi yang //
analyzed: gang las sbyor ba pos @353b 'bras bu thob par 'gyur / dngos po 'dus byas pa yi yang //
translated: from what would the performer obtain the result?üîΩThe conditioned thing

original: dngos po'i tha dad tha dad byed //
analyzed: dngos po'i tha dad tha dad byed //
translated: is differentiated by the differentiation of things.

original: sbyor ba'i khyab par la nges pa //
analyzed: sbyor ba'i khyab par la nges pa //
translated: The determination of the pervasion of application

original: nus la ma yin brda la 'gyur //
analyzed: nus la ma yin brda la 'gyur //
translated: is not possible for the powerful, but it is for the symbolic.

original: dngos po mi rtag pa bya ba'i khyad par can dag ni de'i rgyu las rang bzhin tha dad pa yin na //
analyzed: dngos po mi rtag pa bya ba'i khyad par can dag ni de'i rgyu las rang bzhin tha dad pa yin na //
translated: If impermanent things that are qualified by action were essentially different from their cause,

original: de las phul du byung ba thob pa nyid kyi phyir /üîΩgzhan du rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur la /
analyzed: de las phul du byung ba thob pa nyid kyi phyir / gzhan du rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur la /
translated: then they would attain excellence from that cause.üîΩBut they would not be different in other ways.

original: tha dad pa med na ma yin te /
analyzed: tha dad pa med na ma yin te /
translated: If they were not essentially different, then they would not be different in other ways.

original: rgyu'i khyad par med na 'bras bu'i khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rgyu'i khyad par med na 'bras bu'i khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because if there were no difference in the cause, there would be no difference in the effect.üîΩIf there were a difference, it would follow that it would be causeless.

original: khyad par yod na ni rgyu med pa can du thal ba'i phyir ro zhes mang du bshad zin to /
analyzed: khyad par yod na ni rgyu med pa can du thal ba'i phyir ro zhes mang du bshad zin to /
translated: We have already explained this at length.

original: // / de bas na rang bzhin phul du byang ba'i phyir /
analyzed: // / de bas na rang bzhin phul du byang ba'i phyir /
translated: Therefore, because of the excellence of its nature,

original: 'bras bu 'byin pa'i sngags 'di 'bras bu yin du zin kyang /
analyzed: 'bras bu 'byin pa'i sngags 'di 'bras bu yin du zin kyang /
translated: this mantra that produces an effect is an effect.

original: dmangs rigs la sogs pa'i sbyor ba la yang rnam pa gzhan du mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: dmangs rigs la sogs pa'i sbyor ba la yang rnam pa gzhan du mi 'gyur te /
translated: But even if it were applied by a person of low caste, it would not be different in other ways.

original: dmangs rigs dang bram ze zhes bya ba'i skyes bu dag gi rang bzhin tha dad pa ni med pa'i phyir ro//
analyzed: dmangs rigs dang bram ze zhes bya ba'i skyes bu dag gi rang bzhin tha dad pa ni med pa'i phyir ro//
translated: This is because there is no difference in the nature of a person called a Brahmin and a person called a Shudra.

original: skyes bu'i 'dod pa'i rjes su byed pa can gyi ming dang tha snyad kyi khyad par las rang bzhin gyi khyad par dang 'brel pa can gyi don rnams gzhan nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: skyes bu'i 'dod pa'i rjes su byed pa can gyi ming dang tha snyad kyi khyad par las rang bzhin gyi khyad par dang 'brel pa can gyi don rnams gzhan nyid ma yin no //
translated: The meaning of the particularities of names and conventions that follow the desires of people is not different from that which is connected to the particularities of intrinsic reality.

original: gal te de dag gi rigs kyi bye brag yod do //
analyzed: gal te de dag gi rigs kyi bye brag yod do //
translated: If you say that the particularities of their type exist,

original: zhe na / de ni dbyibs dang yon tan dang nus pa'i khyad par la mthong ste /
analyzed: zhe na / de ni dbyibs dang yon tan dang nus pa'i khyad par la mthong ste /
translated: that is seen in the particularities of shape, quality, and ability.

original: ba lang dang rta bzhin no //
analyzed: ba lang dang rta bzhin no //
translated: It is like the difference between cows and horses.

original: de dag ni 'jig rten gyis bstan pa med par rtogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de dag ni 'jig rten gyis bstan pa med par rtogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: The world understands those without being taught.

original: de dang 'dra ba 'di dag la yon tan rnam par nges pa cung zhig kyang ma mthong ngo //
analyzed: de dang 'dra ba 'di dag la yon tan rnam par nges pa cung zhig kyang ma mthong ngo //
translated: We do not see even the slightest quality that is definite in those that are similar to that.

original: ma mthong ba yang ji ltar khyad par rtogs par 'gyur /
analyzed: ma mthong ba yang ji ltar khyad par rtogs par 'gyur /
translated: How can one understand a particularity that is not seen?

original: 'jig rten gyi rtogs pa'i khyad par ming tha dad pa'i rjes su 'gro ba can gang yin pa de yang rigs kyi khyad par med du zin kyang bya ba'i khyad par nan tan du byed pa'i phyir dang rjes su 'gro ba'i phyir 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi rtogs pa'i khyad par ming tha dad pa'i rjes su 'gro ba can gang yin pa de yang rigs kyi khyad par med du zin kyang bya ba'i khyad par nan tan du byed pa'i phyir dang rjes su 'gro ba'i phyir 'gyur te /
translated: And even though there is no difference in the type of worldly understanding that is the basis for the use of different names, still, because of the difference in the function of the words, and because of the difference in the object that is the basis for the use of the words, the words are used.

original: 'tsho byed dang tshong ba'i tha snyad la sogs pa bzhin no //
analyzed: 'tsho byed dang tshong ba'i tha snyad la sogs pa bzhin no //
translated: For example, the words ‚Äúdoctor‚Äù and ‚Äúmerchant‚Äù are used.

original: de bas na sngags 'di khyad par med par sbyar bar 'gyur na /
analyzed: de bas na sngags 'di khyad par med par sbyar bar 'gyur na /
translated: Therefore, if the mantra is used without distinction,

original: de las khyad par med pa'i rang bzhin nyid sgrub par byed do //
analyzed: de las khyad par med pa'i rang bzhin nyid sgrub par byed do //
translated: then it would establish the absence of distinction in its nature.

original: des na khyad par med pa kho nar 'bras bu 'byin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des na khyad par med pa kho nar 'bras bu 'byin par 'gyur ro //
translated: And so, without distinction, it would produce its effect.

original: gang gi tshe brda las de dag gi 'bras bu 'byin pa de'i tshe skyon 'di yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gang gi tshe brda las de dag gi 'bras bu 'byin pa de'i tshe skyon 'di yod pa ma yin te /
translated: But when the effect is produced from the convention, then this error does not arise,

original: brda byed pa'i 'dod pa las 'bras bu skye bar nges pa'i phyir ro //üîΩdngos po rang bzhin gyis gnas pa @354a * //
analyzed: brda byed pa'i 'dod pa las 'bras bu skye bar nges pa'i phyir ro //üîΩdngos po rang bzhin gyis gnas pa @354a * //
translated: because the effect is definitely produced from the desire of the one who uses the convention.üîΩThe effect is produced from the mantraüîΩwhen the convention is made.

original: can dag ni de'i sgo nas thal bar rigs pa yin gyi /
analyzed: can dag ni de'i sgo nas thal bar rigs pa yin gyi /
translated: It is correct that those who possess the view of the transitory collection are said to be nihilistic in this way.üîΩ

original: skyes bu'i 'dod pas gnas pa can dag ma yin te /
analyzed: skyes bu'i 'dod pas gnas pa can dag ma yin te /
translated: But it is not tenable that they are established by the desire of a person,

original: de dag ni rnam pa 'ga' zhig gis 'jug pa'i phyir ro //üîΩgang yang sbyor ba pos 'bras bu thob po zhes bya ba 'dod pa'i don la rung ba skyed par byed pa'am /
analyzed: de dag ni rnam pa 'ga' zhig gis 'jug pa'i phyir ro // gang yang sbyor ba pos 'bras bu thob po zhes bya ba 'dod pa'i don la rung ba skyed par byed pa'am /
translated: because they are engaged in some way.

original: rgyu yongs su 'gyur ba'i sbyor ba mthong ngo //
analyzed: rgyu yongs su 'gyur ba'i sbyor ba mthong ngo //
translated: Moreover, when the agent is said to obtain the effect, we see that the agent produces a suitable effect or a transformation of the cause.

original: de gnyi ga'i khyad par bskyed pa na 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de gnyi ga'i khyad par bskyed pa na 'gyur ro //
translated: The effect is produced by the transformation of both.

original: de ltar ma yin na /
analyzed: de ltar ma yin na /
translated: If that were not so,

original: khyad par byar med can yin na //
analyzed: khyad par byar med can yin na //
translated: then, if it were not a transformation,

original: sbyor ba pos ni ci zhig byed //
analyzed: sbyor ba pos ni ci zhig byed //
translated: what would the agent do?

original: gang gis de las las 'bras bu //
analyzed: gang gis de las las 'bras bu //
translated: The effect is obtained from that,

original: thob kyi gzhan gyis ni ma yin //
analyzed: thob kyi gzhan gyis ni ma yin //
translated: not from another.

original: gal te sbyor ba mngon gsal yin //
analyzed: gal te sbyor ba mngon gsal yin //
translated: If the agent is manifest,

original: de ni gong du bsal zin to //
analyzed: de ni gong du bsal zin to //
translated: that has already been refuted above.

original: rtag pa rnams 'ga' zhig kyang mngon par gsal ba ma yin no zhes bshad zin to //
analyzed: rtag pa rnams 'ga' zhig kyang mngon par gsal ba ma yin no zhes bshad zin to //
translated: It has already been explained that nothing permanent is manifest.

original: gang gi phyir mngon bar gsal bar byed pa ni sbyor ba por 'gyur /
analyzed: gang gi phyir mngon bar gsal bar byed pa ni sbyor ba por 'gyur /
translated: And why would the manifestor be the agent?

original: gang las blo de gsal yin te //
analyzed: gang las blo de gsal yin te //
translated: How can the cognition be clear if it is not clear?

original: de ni 'bras la'ang gal te sbyor //
analyzed: de ni 'bras la'ang gal te sbyor //
translated: If it is clear, then it is connected to the result.

original: smra ba po gsal rgyu yin bas //
analyzed: smra ba po gsal rgyu yin bas //
translated: If the speaker is the cause of the clarity,

original: nyan pa po yi 'bras 'brel 'gyur //
analyzed: nyan pa po yi 'bras 'brel 'gyur //
translated: then the hearer would be connected to the result.

original: sgra ni gzhan las rang gi ngo bor 'gyur ba dang / sgrib par byed pa la bral ba gsal ba ma yin gyi /
analyzed: sgra ni gzhan las rang gi ngo bor 'gyur ba dang / sgrib par byed pa la bral ba gsal ba ma yin gyi /
translated: The sound does not become clear by becoming its own nature or by being free from obscuration.

original: 'on kyang de'i yul can gyi shes pa yin te /
analyzed: 'on kyang de'i yul can gyi shes pa yin te /
translated: Rather, it is the cognition that has it as its object.

original: thos pa med par gsal ba brjod pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thos pa med par gsal ba brjod pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because without hearing, there is no expression of clarity.

original: de la gal te smra ba po blo'i rgyur 'gyur na /
analyzed: de la gal te smra ba po blo'i rgyur 'gyur na /
translated: If the speaker were the cause of the cognition,

original: de ni nyan pa po la mtshungs pa'i phyir de'i 'bras bu yang smra ba po dang 'dra bar thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ni nyan pa po la mtshungs pa'i phyir de'i 'bras bu yang smra ba po dang 'dra bar thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: then because it would be the same for the hearer, the result would be obtained in the same way as for the speaker.

original: de'i blo'i rgyu nyid las gzhan du smra ba po de'i ngo bo gzhan 'ga' zhig kyang yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i blo'i rgyu nyid las gzhan du smra ba po de'i ngo bo gzhan 'ga' zhig kyang yod pa ma yin no //
translated: Apart from being the cause of the cognition, there is no other nature of the speaker.

original: gal te nyan pa po'i blo ni gzhan gyi khyad par can yin gyi smra ba po ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i khyad par yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gal te nyan pa po'i blo ni gzhan gyi khyad par can yin gyi smra ba po ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i khyad par yin no zhe na /
translated: If it is argued that the difference is that the hearer's cognition has a different object than the speaker's,

original: nyan pa po la smra ba po'i nye bar sbyor ba yang ci zhig yod na gang gis na khyad par 'dod /
analyzed: nyan pa po la smra ba po'i nye bar sbyor ba yang ci zhig yod na gang gis na khyad par 'dod /
translated: What is the connection between the speaker and the hearer that you want to make a distinction between them?

original: gal te de las sgra thos pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gal te de las sgra thos pa yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that the hearer hears the sound,

original: ji ltar na de las shes /
analyzed: ji ltar na de las shes /
translated: how do you know that?

original: de nyid brgal zhing brtag pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: de nyid brgal zhing brtag pa ma yin nam /
translated: Isn‚Äôt that the same question?

original: 'brel pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'brel pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because there is no connection.

original: yul nye bar 'jog pa las 'di 'di'i thos par byed pa por 'gyur na /
analyzed: yul nye bar 'jog pa las 'di 'di'i thos par byed pa por 'gyur na /
translated: If the hearer is the one who is in contact with the object,

original: de yang nus pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de yang nus pa ma yin te /
translated: then that is not possible,

original: rtag pa de yang rnam pa 'ga' zhig tu'ang 'gyur ba med phyir ro //
analyzed: rtag pa de yang rnam pa 'ga' zhig tu'ang 'gyur ba med phyir ro //
translated: because the permanent self does not change in any way.

original: dbang po legs par byas pa la sogs pa yang bshad zin to //
analyzed: dbang po legs par byas pa la sogs pa yang bshad zin to //
translated: We have already explained that the faculties are not well formed.

original: @354b gal te bdag mnyan par bya /
analyzed: @354b gal te bdag mnyan par bya /
translated: If you say that the self hears,

original: bdag gis nyan du bcug go zhes bya ba de dag gi shes pa las smra ba po dang nyan pa po tha dad pa yin no //
analyzed: bdag gis nyan du bcug go zhes bya ba de dag gi shes pa las smra ba po dang nyan pa po tha dad pa yin no //
translated: then the speaker and the hearer are different consciousnesses.

original: zhe na / 'khrul pa tsam phan gdags par bya ba dang / phan 'dogs par byed pa med pa can yin pa'i phyir de'i ngo bo ni shin tu thal bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: zhe na / 'khrul pa tsam phan gdags par bya ba dang / phan 'dogs par byed pa med pa can yin pa'i phyir de'i ngo bo ni shin tu thal bar 'gyur te /
translated: If you say that, then the nature of that [consciousness] would be utterly absurd, because there is no one to be benefited and no one to benefit, since it is a mere error.

original: 'khrul pas gzhan dag la yang shes pa mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'khrul pas gzhan dag la yang shes pa mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: And because of error, consciousness is seen by others.

original: rnam pa thams cad du phan 'dogs pa med pa la yang de lta bu'i shes pa rigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad du phan 'dogs pa med pa la yang de lta bu'i shes pa rigs pa ma yin te /
translated: And it is not reasonable for such a consciousness to exist without any benefit whatsoever,

original: thams cad dag phan tshun de ltar thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thams cad dag phan tshun de ltar thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because in that case, everything would be like that for everyone.

original: 'khrul pa yang 'ga' zhig las phan btags pa yod cing 'ga' zhig nye bas gzhan du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'khrul pa yang 'ga' zhig las phan btags pa yod cing 'ga' zhig nye bas gzhan du 'gyur ro //
translated: And error is sometimes beneficial to some and sometimes not, because it is different.

original: de yang brgyud pas phan btags pa med na mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de yang brgyud pas phan btags pa med na mi 'gyur ro //
translated: And that [error] would not occur without a benefit that is indirect.

original: de bas na smra ba po dang nyan pa po gsal ba'i rgyu nyid du khyad par med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de bas na smra ba po dang nyan pa po gsal ba'i rgyu nyid du khyad par med pa'i phyir /
translated: Therefore, because there is no difference between the speaker and the hearer as causes of the manifestation,

original: 'bras bu dang ldan par mtshungs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'bras bu dang ldan par mtshungs par 'gyur ro //
translated: they would be equal in possessing the result.

original: gzhan yang / sgra ni rna ba'i yul yin na //
analyzed: gzhan yang / sgra ni rna ba'i yul yin na //
translated: Moreover, sound is the object of the ear,

original: mngon par gsal min sgra dag ni //üîΩbyed rnams dgos pa'am yid bzlas pa //
analyzed: mngon par gsal min sgra dag ni // byed rnams dgos pa'am yid bzlas pa //
translated: The sound that is not manifestüîΩis useless for the reciter,

original: don med 'gyur /
analyzed: don med 'gyur /
translated: whether it be the purpose or mental recitation.

original: rna ba'i gzung ba'i mtshan nyid can gyi sgra de las 'das na thal ches pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rna ba'i gzung ba'i mtshan nyid can gyi sgra de las 'das na thal ches pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the sound that is the object of hearing is beyond that.

original: de ltar na spyi la yang thal bar 'gyur ba ma yin nam /üîΩsgra kho na zhes ni mi smra'i /
analyzed: de ltar na spyi la yang thal bar 'gyur ba ma yin nam / sgra kho na zhes ni mi smra'i /
translated: But is it not the case that the same consequence applies to a universal?üîΩWe do not say that sound alone is the mantra.

original: sgra ni gdon mi za bar de'i mtshan nyid can yin te /
analyzed: sgra ni gdon mi za bar de'i mtshan nyid can yin te /
translated: But sound is certainly its characteristic,

original: de la mtshan nyid gzhan med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de la mtshan nyid gzhan med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is no other characteristic.

original: de la gal te sbyor ba po'i sgra'i bdag nyid can gyi sngags dag gsal ba'i rgyu yin na /
analyzed: de la gal te sbyor ba po'i sgra'i bdag nyid can gyi sngags dag gsal ba'i rgyu yin na /
translated: If the mantras, which are of the nature of sound, are the cause of manifestation for the reciter,

original: mngon bar gsal ba ma yin pa'i thos pa'i yul can gyi sbyor ba po rnams kyi bzlas pa'am /
analyzed: mngon bar gsal ba ma yin pa'i thos pa'i yul can gyi sbyor ba po rnams kyi bzlas pa'am /
translated: then the reciter who hears the sound that is not manifest

original: yid kyi bzlas pa sngags kyi 'bras bu dang ldan pa ma yin te /
analyzed: yid kyi bzlas pa sngags kyi 'bras bu dang ldan pa ma yin te /
translated: will not have the fruit of the mantra, whether it be mental recitation or recitation.

original: de'i tshe rna bas don cung zad kyang nges par byas pa med do //
analyzed: de'i tshe rna bas don cung zad kyang nges par byas pa med do //
translated: At that time, the ear does not ascertain anything at all.

original: sgra'i bdag nyid can ma yin pa yang sngags ma yin no //
analyzed: sgra'i bdag nyid can ma yin pa yang sngags ma yin no //
translated: And that which is not of the nature of sound is not mantra.

original: brgyud pas de las skyes nyid phyir //
analyzed: brgyud pas de las skyes nyid phyir //
translated: Because it is produced from that, in a series.

original: gal te de blo de'i gsal yin //
analyzed: gal te de blo de'i gsal yin //
translated: If the idea is clear with regard to that,

original: yid kyis bsams su zin kyang thos pa med pas sngags snang ba can gyi blo ni med do //
analyzed: yid kyis bsams su zin kyang thos pa med pas sngags snang ba can gyi blo ni med do //
translated: Even though it is thought by the mind, there is no idea of mantra, because there is no hearing.

original: de bas na sgra las byung ba nyid yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de bas na sgra las byung ba nyid yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Therefore, because it arises from sound,

original: de yang sgra'i gsal ba nyid yin no //
analyzed: de yang sgra'i gsal ba nyid yin no //
translated: it is clear with regard to sound.

original: de ltar na thug pa med par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de ltar na thug pa med par 'gyur te /
translated: In that case, there is an infinite regress,

original: sgra'i don gyi rnam par rtog pa dag kyang brgyud pas bskyed pa yod pa'i @355a * //
analyzed: sgra'i don gyi rnam par rtog pa dag kyang brgyud pas bskyed pa yod pa'i @355a * //
translated: because ideas of the meaning of words are also produced in a series.

original: phyir / de yang de ltar 'gyur /
analyzed: phyir / de yang de ltar 'gyur /
translated: And that is also like that.

original: gal te don can yin mi 'grub //
analyzed: gal te don can yin mi 'grub //
translated: If it is not established that it has a meaning,

original: rtog pa'i rjes su 'gro phyir ro //
analyzed: rtog pa'i rjes su 'gro phyir ro //
translated: because it is in conformity with the idea.

original: sgra las byung ba can gyi blo thams cad ni de'i gsal ba yin no zhes mi smra'i /
analyzed: sgra las byung ba can gyi blo thams cad ni de'i gsal ba yin no zhes mi smra'i /
translated: We do not say that all ideas that arise from sound are clear with regard to it.

original: de'i yul can gang yin pa de da'i gsal ba yin no //
analyzed: de'i yul can gang yin pa de da'i gsal ba yin no //
translated: But that which is its object is clear with regard to it.

original: yid kyi rnam par rtog pa ni de'i yul can nyid du grub pa ma yin te /
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par rtog pa ni de'i yul can nyid du grub pa ma yin te /
translated: It is not established that the mental idea is its object,üîΩbecause it is in conformity with the idea.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid la ni rnam par rtog pa rnams mi 'jug go zhes ston par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid la ni rnam par rtog pa rnams mi 'jug go zhes ston par 'gyur ro //
translated: The author of the treatise shows that conceptual thoughts do not engage with intrinsic identity.

original: de dag ni phyi rol gyi don nye ba la ltos pa med pa can bdag nyid ji lta ba bzhin du rang gi rnam par rtog pa'i bag chags sad pa las 'gyur te /
analyzed: de dag ni phyi rol gyi don nye ba la ltos pa med pa can bdag nyid ji lta ba bzhin du rang gi rnam par rtog pa'i bag chags sad pa las 'gyur te /
translated: They arise from the awakening of the habitual tendencies of one‚Äôs own conceptual thoughts, without depending on the presence of external objects.

original: phyi rol 'gags shing ma 'ongs su zin kyang yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: phyi rol 'gags shing ma 'ongs su zin kyang yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Even though external objects have ceased and are not present, they exist.

original: gang zhig gang yod pa nyid nye ba la ltos pa med pa de ni de'i rgyu ma yin zhing rgyu ma yin pa yang ji ltar na yul yin /
analyzed: gang zhig gang yod pa nyid nye ba la ltos pa med pa de ni de'i rgyu ma yin zhing rgyu ma yin pa yang ji ltar na yul yin /
translated: If something is not dependent on the presence of something else, it is not the cause of that, and how can something that is not a cause be an object?

original: de bas na yid kyi rnam par rtog pa sgra'i gsal ba ma yin na gang las de dang ldan pa sbyor ba por 'gyur /
analyzed: de bas na yid kyi rnam par rtog pa sgra'i gsal ba ma yin na gang las de dang ldan pa sbyor ba por 'gyur /
translated: Therefore, if mental conceptual thoughts are not the manifestation of sound, how can they be the appropriator that possesses it?

original: de las byung ba de'i yul can gyi blo de'i gsal ba yin zhing /
analyzed: de las byung ba de'i yul can gyi blo de'i gsal ba yin zhing /
translated: The cognition that arises from that is the manifestation of that, and

original: de'i rten sbyor ba po yin no zhes bya ba 'di yang nyan pa la yang thal bar 'gyur ro zhes bya bas bshad zin to //
analyzed: de'i rten sbyor ba po yin no zhes bya ba 'di yang nyan pa la yang thal bar 'gyur ro zhes bya bas bshad zin to //
translated: the basis of that is the appropriator. This has already been explained in the statement that it would follow that the listener would also be the appropriator.

original: de'i shes pa la sbyor ba yin na yang skyes bu la sgra byed pa yin te /
analyzed: de'i shes pa la sbyor ba yin na yang skyes bu la sgra byed pa yin te /
translated: If it is the cognition of that which is applied, then it is the sound that is applied to the person,

original: de'i shes pa bskyed pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de'i shes pa bskyed pa'i phyir /
translated: because it is the producer of that cognition.

original: sgra la skyes bus ma yin pas /
analyzed: sgra la skyes bus ma yin pas /
translated: Sound is not applied to the person,

original: de'i bdag nyid can la phan gdags par byar med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i bdag nyid can la phan gdags par byar med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is not possible to benefit that which has the nature of that.

original: de ltar na sgra rnams kyi sbyor ba po ni skyes bus yin no zhes bya ba'i tha snyad 'di ni 'jig rten las 'das pa yin no //
analyzed: de ltar na sgra rnams kyi sbyor ba po ni skyes bus yin no zhes bya ba'i tha snyad 'di ni 'jig rten las 'das pa yin no //
translated: Thus, the conventional expression ‚ÄúThe person is the one who applies the sounds‚Äù is transcendent.

original: rnam pa thams cad du sgra'i rang bzhin can gyi sngags dag gi sbyor ba las 'bras bu thob pa yin na ni /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad du sgra'i rang bzhin can gyi sngags dag gi sbyor ba las 'bras bu thob pa yin na ni /
translated: If the result is obtained from the application of the mantras, which are by nature sound, in every way,

original: yid kyi bzlas pa don med pa can yin te /
analyzed: yid kyi bzlas pa don med pa can yin te /
translated: then mental recitation is pointless,üîΩbecause thought does not touch the nature of sound.

original: rnam par rtog pa ni sgra'i ngo bo la reg pa med pa'i phyir ro //üîΩrang dang spyi ni rang bzhin rnams /
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa ni sgra'i ngo bo la reg pa med pa'i phyir ro // rang dang spyi ni rang bzhin rnams /
translated: The Particularists say:üîΩThe nature of the self and the general nature of the elements

original: ngo bo gcig tu brjod 'dod pas //
analyzed: ngo bo gcig tu brjod 'dod pas //
translated: are asserted to be the same entity.

original: brda byed rnams kyis brjod pa'i phyir //
analyzed: brda byed rnams kyis brjod pa'i phyir //
translated: Because they are expressed by the words that create the conventions,

original: 'gal med dngos la ma yin no //
analyzed: 'gal med dngos la ma yin no //
translated: they are not contradictory in reality.

original: brda byed pa dag ni rang gi mtshan nyid dbang po'i yul dang / spyi'i mtshan nyid rnam par rtog pa'i snang ba'i brda ji lta ba bzhin du kun rdzob tu gcig tu byas na /
analyzed: brda byed pa dag ni rang gi mtshan nyid dbang po'i yul dang / spyi'i mtshan nyid rnam par rtog pa'i snang ba'i brda ji lta ba bzhin du kun rdzob tu gcig tu byas na /
translated: The signifiers are the particular characteristics, the objects of the sense faculties, and the general characteristics, the appearances of conceptualization.üîΩIf one makes the conventional sign just as it is, then the meaning will be accomplished just as the sign is.

original: brda ji lta ba bzhin du don sgrub par 'gyur @355b ro zhes brda gsal bar byed pa de ltar na yid kyi bzlas pa la sogs pa la skyon yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: brda ji lta ba bzhin du don sgrub par 'gyur @355b ro zhes brda gsal bar byed pa de ltar na yid kyi bzlas pa la sogs pa la skyon yod pa ma yin no //
translated: Thus, there is no fault in mental recitation and so on.

original: dngos po'i rang bzhin las 'bras bu thob pa yin na yang de'i rang bzhin can la rig pa med par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dngos po'i rang bzhin las 'bras bu thob pa yin na yang de'i rang bzhin can la rig pa med par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Even if one obtains a result from the nature of things, it is not that one who has that nature is not aware.

original: yi ge dag las gzhan pa'i go rims yod pa ma yin no zhes bshad pa gang yin pa de la /
analyzed: yi ge dag las gzhan pa'i go rims yod pa ma yin no zhes bshad pa gang yin pa de la /
translated: It was explained that there is no order other than the letters.

original: gal te go rims med na ni //
analyzed: gal te go rims med na ni //
translated: If there is no order,

original: ro dang mtsho zhes thos pa la //
analyzed: ro dang mtsho zhes thos pa la //
translated: then in hearing ‚Äúro‚Äù and ‚Äúta,‚Äù

original: 'bras bu tha dad zhes mi 'gyur //
analyzed: 'bras bu tha dad zhes mi 'gyur //
translated: the result would not be different.

original: ro dang mtsho zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig dag la yi ge khyad par ni cung zhig kyang med na /
analyzed: ro dang mtsho zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig dag la yi ge khyad par ni cung zhig kyang med na /
translated: In the words ‚Äúro‚Äù and ‚Äúta,‚Äù there is not the slightest difference in the letters.

original: yi ge las tha dad pa gzhan med na gang las 'bras bu tha dad 'gyur /
analyzed: yi ge las tha dad pa gzhan med na gang las 'bras bu tha dad 'gyur /
translated: If there is nothing other than the letters, how could the effects be different?

original: de dag gi spobs pa yang tha dad pa dang / go rims kyang mi 'dra bar mthong na /
analyzed: de dag gi spobs pa yang tha dad pa dang / go rims kyang mi 'dra bar mthong na /
translated: And if their eloquence is different and their order is seen to be different,

original: rgyu tha dad pa med par 'bras bu tha dad par rigs pa ma yin ni //
analyzed: rgyu tha dad pa med par 'bras bu tha dad par rigs pa ma yin ni //
translated: it is not reasonable for the effects to be different without different causes.

original: de bas na tha dad pa dang ldan pa yod pa de gang las rtogs pa tha dad pa 'dir 'gyur /
analyzed: de bas na tha dad pa dang ldan pa yod pa de gang las rtogs pa tha dad pa 'dir 'gyur /
translated: Therefore, how could this difference in understanding occur if there were no difference in the existent that possesses the letters?

original: bden te / de ni skyes bu'i rten can yod //
analyzed: bden te / de ni skyes bu'i rten can yod //
translated: It is true, but it exists in dependence on a person.üîΩThus,

original: de ltar / yi ge kun slong shes pa las //üîΩskyes pa shes pas sgra gang skye //
analyzed: de ltar / yi ge kun slong shes pa las // skyes pa shes pas sgra gang skye //
translated: from the understanding of all the letters,üîΩthe understanding of what is produced arises from a sound.

original: shes des bskyed pa'i shes pa can //
analyzed: shes des bskyed pa'i shes pa can //
translated: The one who possesses the understanding produced by that

original: de yi khyad par can de ni //üîΩrna bas nges par 'gyur ba yin //
analyzed: de yi khyad par can de ni // rna bas nges par 'gyur ba yin //
translated: is the one who has the difference.üîΩThat is ascertained by the ear.

original: de thos thal ba 'jug can te //
analyzed: de thos thal ba 'jug can te //
translated: That is the one who engages in the consequence of hearing.

original: de dran pa las ltos na ni //
analyzed: de dran pa las ltos na ni //
translated: In dependence on memory,

original: phyis ni bdag nyid la dran byed //
analyzed: phyis ni bdag nyid la dran byed //
translated: later it causes memory in oneself.

original: de ltar de rgyu 'dzin sems kyi //
analyzed: de ltar de rgyu 'dzin sems kyi //
translated: Thus, the cause of that is the mind that apprehends

original: yig rnams rgyu dang 'bras bu nyid //
analyzed: yig rnams rgyu dang 'bras bu nyid //
translated: the letters as cause and effect.

original: de dag skyes bus byas pa nyid //
analyzed: de dag skyes bus byas pa nyid //
translated: Those are produced by a person.

original: go rims dag ni yin zhes brjod //
analyzed: go rims dag ni yin zhes brjod //
translated: The order is that of their pronunciation.

original: sems kyis kun nas bslang ba can gyi ngag gi rnam par rig byed yi ge dang tshig dang ngag ces bya ba /
analyzed: sems kyis kun nas bslang ba can gyi ngag gi rnam par rig byed yi ge dang tshig dang ngag ces bya ba /
translated: The verbal informative action, which is motivated by thought, is called ‚Äúsyllable,‚Äù ‚Äúword,‚Äù ‚Äúphrase.‚ÄùüîΩThe syllable is produced by the thought that motivates it.

original: de la yi ges kun nas slong bar byed pa'i sems de ma thag pa'i rkyen gyis yi ge aa kun nas slong ba'i sems bskyed par 'gyur ro //üîΩde bzhin du yi ge rang dang tsheg drag gis kun nas slong bar byed pa snga ma snga ma'i rkyen can no //
analyzed: de la yi ges kun nas slong bar byed pa'i sems de ma thag pa'i rkyen gyis yi ge aa kun nas slong ba'i sems bskyed par 'gyur ro // de bzhin du yi ge rang dang tsheg drag gis kun nas slong bar byed pa snga ma snga ma'i rkyen can no //
translated: The thought that produces the syllable is produced by the thought that motivates it.üîΩThe thought that produces the syllable is produced by the thought that motivates it.

original: de bas na rgyu gzhan dang ldan pa'i yi ge de dag ni rang gi rgyu'i go rims bzhin du skye ba can yin no //
analyzed: de bas na rgyu gzhan dang ldan pa'i yi ge de dag ni rang gi rgyu'i go rims bzhin du skye ba can yin no //
translated: Thus, the syllables, which are the cause of the next syllable, are produced in the order in which they are pronounced.

original: thos pa'i dus su yang gang gi tshe ngal bar 'jug pa can yi ge snga ma shes pa'i lhan cig byed pa'i rkyen la ltos pa can dag gis rang gi shes pa skyes par byed pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: thos pa'i dus su yang gang gi tshe ngal bar 'jug pa can yi ge snga ma shes pa'i lhan cig byed pa'i rkyen la ltos pa can dag gis rang gi shes pa skyes par byed pa de'i tshe /
translated: At the time of hearing, the syllables are produced by the consciousnesses of the syllables, which consciousnesses are produced by the consciousnesses of the preceding syllables, and so on.

original: snga ma dran pa ltos pa nyid kyis dran pa skyed par @356a * //
analyzed: snga ma dran pa ltos pa nyid kyis dran pa skyed par @356a * //
translated: The previous memory is produced by the very dependence on memory.

original: byed do // rgyu dang 'bras bu tha dad pa can gyi rkyen las byung ba'i chos can dang / tha dad par bskyed pa'i chos can de dang de ni yi ge rnams kyi rang bzhin yin te /
analyzed: byed do // rgyu dang 'bras bu tha dad pa can gyi rkyen las byung ba'i chos can dang / tha dad par bskyed pa'i chos can de dang de ni yi ge rnams kyi rang bzhin yin te /
translated: The nature of the letters is that which has a property that arises from conditions that have a different cause and effect, and that which has a property that is produced differently.

original: skyes bus 'dus byas pa'i khyad par gyis tha dad pa ni go rims zhes brjod do //
analyzed: skyes bus 'dus byas pa'i khyad par gyis tha dad pa ni go rims zhes brjod do //
translated: The difference due to the particular composition of the person is called order.

original: de phyir yi ge'i ngo bo de //üîΩtshig dang tshig la gzhan nyid de //
analyzed: de phyir yi ge'i ngo bo de // tshig dang tshig la gzhan nyid de //
translated: Therefore, the nature of the lettersüîΩis different in each word.

original: byed pa'i 'du byed las tha dad //
analyzed: byed pa'i 'du byed las tha dad //
translated: They are different from the composition of the agent,

original: 'bras bu'i khyad par lhan cig byed //
analyzed: 'bras bu'i khyad par lhan cig byed //
translated: and they are co-operative causes for the difference in the effect.

original: de bas na tshig dag la yi ge rnams kyi rang bzhin gcig nyid ma yin te /
analyzed: de bas na tshig dag la yi ge rnams kyi rang bzhin gcig nyid ma yin te /
translated: Therefore, the letters do not have the same nature in each word,

original: byed pa po'i sems kyi 'dus byas pa'i khyad par gyis tha dad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: byed pa po'i sems kyi 'dus byas pa'i khyad par gyis tha dad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because they are different due to the difference in the composition of the agent's mind.

original: de phan tshun lhan cig pa na 'bras bu'i khyad par gyi rgyu yin no //
analyzed: de phan tshun lhan cig pa na 'bras bu'i khyad par gyi rgyu yin no //
translated: When they are mutually co-present, they are the cause for the difference in the effect.

original: yi ge rnams kyi go rims de'ang //
analyzed: yi ge rnams kyi go rims de'ang //
translated: And that order of the letters

original: rtsom par byed las 'jug yin te //üîΩ'dod pas mi 'gal grub can gyi //
analyzed: rtsom par byed las 'jug yin te // 'dod pas mi 'gal grub can gyi //
translated: The order of the phonemes is due to the order of the articulations.üîΩThe order of the articulations is due to the order of the organs.üîΩThe order of the organs is due to the order of the parts of the body.üîΩThe order of the parts of the body is due to the order of the directions.

original: gnas pa'i go rims 'gal phyir ro //
analyzed: gnas pa'i go rims 'gal phyir ro //
translated: The order of the directions is due to the order of space.üîΩThe order of space is due to the order of atoms.üîΩThe order of the atoms is due to the order of the primary elements.üîΩThe order of the primary elements is due to the order of the causes.üîΩThe order of the causes is due to the order of the effects.üîΩThe order of the effects is due to the order of the conditions.üîΩThe order of the conditions is due to the order of the nature of things.

original: rgyu dang 'bras bur gyur pa'i rkyen las byung ba'i rang bzhin gyi khyad par yi ge rnams kyi go rims yin no zhes bshad zin to //üîΩde yang skyes bu'i rtog pa dang dpyod pas byas pa yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rgyu dang 'bras bur gyur pa'i rkyen las byung ba'i rang bzhin gyi khyad par yi ge rnams kyi go rims yin no zhes bshad zin to // de yang skyes bu'i rtog pa dang dpyod pas byas pa yin pa'i phyir /
translated: The order of the nature of things is due to the order of the letters.üîΩThe order of the letters is due to the order of the phonemes.üîΩThe order of the phonemes is due to the order of the articulations.üîΩThe order of the articulations is due to the order of the organs.üîΩThe order of the organs is due to the order of the parts of the body.üîΩThe order of the parts of the body is due to the order of the directions.

original: gnas pa can gyi go rims yi ge ma yin te /
analyzed: gnas pa can gyi go rims yi ge ma yin te /
translated: The order of the directions is due to the order of space.üîΩThe order of space is due to the order of atoms.üîΩThe order of the atoms is due to the order of the primary elements.

original: 'dod pas mi 'gal ba grub pa can gyi go rims can nyid yin pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: 'dod pas mi 'gal ba grub pa can gyi go rims can nyid yin pa'i phyir te /
translated: The order of the primary elements is due to the order of the causes.üîΩThe order of the causes is due to the order of the effects.

original: las kyi khyad par gyi go rims bzhin no //
analyzed: las kyi khyad par gyi go rims bzhin no //
translated: The order of the effects is due to the order of the conditions.üîΩThe order of the conditions is due to the order of the nature of things.üîΩThe order of the nature of things is due to the order of the letters.üîΩThe order of the letters is due to the order of the phonemes.

original: yul dang dus dag tu gnas pa'i go rims can ri gangs can dang / 'bigs byed dang / ma la bya'am /
analyzed: yul dang dus dag tu gnas pa'i go rims can ri gangs can dang / 'bigs byed dang / ma la bya'am /
translated: The order of the phonemes is due to the order of the articulations.üîΩThe order of the articulations is due to the order of the organs.

original: sa bon dang myu gu la sogs pa dag rang gi 'dod pas go rims kyi bkod pa bya bar nus pa ma yin no //
analyzed: sa bon dang myu gu la sogs pa dag rang gi 'dod pas go rims kyi bkod pa bya bar nus pa ma yin no //
translated: The order of the organs is due to the order of the parts of the body.üîΩThe order of the parts of the body is due to the order of the directions.üîΩThe order of the directions is due to the order of

original: de nyid kyi phyir skyes bu'i chos su bgrang ba'i rnam par rtog pa'i go rims yod na yod pa'i phyir dang / med na med pa'i phyir ro //üîΩskyes bu dang ni yig go rims //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir skyes bu'i chos su bgrang ba'i rnam par rtog pa'i go rims yod na yod pa'i phyir dang / med na med pa'i phyir ro // skyes bu dang ni yig go rims //
translated: Therefore, the order of the letters is established as a property of the person, because it exists when there is a thought of the person and does not exist when there is not.üîΩThe order of the letters

original: rgyu dang 'bras nyid grub pa'i phyir //
analyzed: rgyu dang 'bras nyid grub pa'i phyir //
translated: is established as the cause and effect of the person.

original: skyes bus yig kun go rims te //
analyzed: skyes bus yig kun go rims te //
translated: The order of the letters is due to the person,

original: me dang shing gi rigs bzhin no //
analyzed: me dang shing gi rigs bzhin no //
translated: like the order of fire and fuel.

original: shing yod na me byung ba'i phyir dang / med na med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: shing yod na me byung ba'i phyir dang / med na med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because fire occurs when there is fuel and does not occur when there is not.

original: me shing ma mthong ba can yang shing med pa can ma yin te /
analyzed: me shing ma mthong ba can yang shing med pa can ma yin te /
translated: One who does not see fire and fuel does not not have fuel,

original: de'i yul dang dus kyi nges pa mi rung ba'i phyir dang / nges pa yod na ni de nyid shing yin pa'i phyir dang / shing ni me'i nye bar len pa'i mtshan nyid can yin pa'i @356b phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i yul dang dus kyi nges pa mi rung ba'i phyir dang / nges pa yod na ni de nyid shing yin pa'i phyir dang / shing ni me'i nye bar len pa'i mtshan nyid can yin pa'i @356b phyir ro //
translated: because it is not possible that the object and time of fire are not ascertained, and if they are ascertained, it is just fuel, and because fuel is characterized by the appropriation of fire.

original: de bzhin du yi ge'i go rims 'di yang gal te skyes bu'i rnam par rtog pa la ltos pa med pa yin na /
analyzed: de bzhin du yi ge'i go rims 'di yang gal te skyes bu'i rnam par rtog pa la ltos pa med pa yin na /
translated: Similarly, if the order of the letters is not dependent on the thought of the person,

original: dmigs pa med par rang nyid gsal ba yin na 'bad pas kyang mi nus te /
analyzed: dmigs pa med par rang nyid gsal ba yin na 'bad pas kyang mi nus te /
translated: If it is clear by itself without an object, then it cannot be done even with effort.

original: de rab tu phye ba ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: de rab tu phye ba ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because it is not a manifestation.

original: la lar nus na ni thams cad de ltar 'gyur te /
analyzed: la lar nus na ni thams cad de ltar 'gyur te /
translated: If it is possible for some, then it would be so for all,

original: khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is no distinction.

original: de yod pa'i ngang tshul can de dang khyad par med pas des ma byas pa yin na yang /
analyzed: de yod pa'i ngang tshul can de dang khyad par med pas des ma byas pa yin na yang /
translated: If it is not done by that because it is not distinguished from that which has the mode of being of existence,

original: thams cad la rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po yang gsal bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: thams cad la rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po yang gsal bar 'gyur te /
translated: then the state of cause and effect would be clear for all,

original: de ni rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'i mtshan nyid can yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'i mtshan nyid can yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it has the characteristic of being concomitant and reverse.

original: mtshan nyid gzhan brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: mtshan nyid gzhan brjod par bya'o //
translated: Another characteristic should be stated.

original: bum pa la sogs pa'i dngos po thams cad kyang bcos ma dang / bcos ma ma yin pa thob par 'gyur te /
analyzed: bum pa la sogs pa'i dngos po thams cad kyang bcos ma dang / bcos ma ma yin pa thob par 'gyur te /
translated: All things such as pots would be both artificial and non-artificial,

original: de la yang de lta bu'i rnam par rtog pa srid pa'i phyir dang / khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de la yang de lta bu'i rnam par rtog pa srid pa'i phyir dang / khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because such a conception is possible for them and there is no distinction.

original: de dag kyang gzhan med pa mthong ba sngon du song ba nyid kyis gzhan byed pa dang 'ga' zhig byed pa po mi shes pa de ltar na thams cad dam 'ga' zhig kyang byas pa ma yin par mngon par zhen par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de dag kyang gzhan med pa mthong ba sngon du song ba nyid kyis gzhan byed pa dang 'ga' zhig byed pa po mi shes pa de ltar na thams cad dam 'ga' zhig kyang byas pa ma yin par mngon par zhen par 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, one would become attached to the idea that all or some are not created.

original: de bas na /
analyzed: de bas na /
translated: Therefore,

original: yi ge'i go rims 'di ni rab tu grags pa dang 'bras bur yod pa can gyi dngos po'i chos las ma 'das pa'i phyir thams cad skyes bus byas pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: yi ge'i go rims 'di ni rab tu grags pa dang 'bras bur yod pa can gyi dngos po'i chos las ma 'das pa'i phyir thams cad skyes bus byas pa nyid yin no //
translated: this order of letters does not transcend the nature of things that are well known and have results. Thus, everything is created by a person.

original: de nyid kyi phyir /üîΩshes mthu dag gis sngags shes pa'i //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir / shes mthu dag gis sngags shes pa'i //
translated: For that very reason,üîΩa person who knows the order of the arrangement of the mantras

original: go rims byed tshul can skyes bu'i //
analyzed: go rims byed tshul can skyes bu'i //
translated: through the power of knowledge

original: thun mong min pa nyid grub ste //
analyzed: thun mong min pa nyid grub ste //
translated: establishes his uniqueness,

original: gzhan la de dag med pa'i phyir //
analyzed: gzhan la de dag med pa'i phyir //
translated: because others do not have that.

original: gal te gzhan gyis kyang yi ge'i go rims 'dis ni dug bcom pa la sogs pa nus pa yin gyi /
analyzed: gal te gzhan gyis kyang yi ge'i go rims 'dis ni dug bcom pa la sogs pa nus pa yin gyi /
translated: If others also have the power to destroy poison and so on through this order of letters,

original: gzhan ni ma yin no zhes shes par 'gyur ba de de kho na bzhin du rtogs par 'gyur na de ltar ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan ni ma yin no zhes shes par 'gyur ba de de kho na bzhin du rtogs par 'gyur na de ltar ni ma yin no //
translated: But it is not so, for one does not understand in this way.

original: de bas na go rims 'di ni ngo bo nyid kyis 'bras bu byed pa nyid yin na yang /üîΩ'ga' zhig gis rnam par shes pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de bas na go rims 'di ni ngo bo nyid kyis 'bras bu byed pa nyid yin na yang / 'ga' zhig gis rnam par shes pa'i phyir /
translated: Therefore, even though the order is by nature the effect of the activity,

original: lkog tu gyur pa mthong ba'i skyes bu yod do //
analyzed: lkog tu gyur pa mthong ba'i skyes bu yod do //
translated: some say that there is a person who sees the hidden by means of consciousness.

original: 'dis ni don byed nus kyi 'dis ni ma yin no zhes bya ba shes par mi nus te /
analyzed: 'dis ni don byed nus kyi 'dis ni ma yin no zhes bya ba shes par mi nus te /
translated: But one cannot know by this that this is able to perform an action and that is not,

original: rtags kyi khyad par ma 'chol ba ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rtags kyi khyad par ma 'chol ba ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the specific marks of the reason are not established.

original: mngon sum gyis kyang sngags dang sngags ma yin pa ma bstan pa dag yongs su shes pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mngon sum gyis kyang sngags dang sngags ma yin pa ma bstan pa dag yongs su shes pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: And because direct perception does not teach the distinction between mantra and non-mantra, there is no knowledge.

original: bstan du zin kyang rnam par 'ga' zhig gis rang bzhin gyi khyad par mi shes pa'i phyir dang / gzhan du 'bras bu mi slu ba'i phyir dang / de yang byed pa las sngar mthong bar mi nus pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: bstan du zin kyang rnam par 'ga' zhig gis rang bzhin gyi khyad par mi shes pa'i phyir dang / gzhan du 'bras bu mi slu ba'i phyir dang / de yang byed pa las sngar mthong bar mi nus pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Even if it is taught, because some people do not understand the specific nature, and because the result is not deceptive elsewhere, and because that also cannot be seen prior to the action.

original: go rims 'di ni ngo bo nyid kyis byed pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: go rims 'di ni ngo bo nyid kyis byed pa yang ma yin te /
translated: This order is not natural,

original: 'ga' zhig @357a * //
analyzed: 'ga' zhig @357a * //
translated: because some

original: gis myur du 'grub pa'i phyir dang / gzhan gyi dus ring po nas 'grub pa'i phyir dang / gzhan ni brtul zhugs spyod pa la sogs pa la ltos pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: gis myur du 'grub pa'i phyir dang / gzhan gyi dus ring po nas 'grub pa'i phyir dang / gzhan ni brtul zhugs spyod pa la sogs pa la ltos pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: are quickly accomplished, some are accomplished after a long time, and some depend on the practice of austerity, etc.

original: las gcig las kyang 'ga' zhig gi don dang don med pa mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: las gcig las kyang 'ga' zhig gi don dang don med pa mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the purpose and non-purpose of some is seen from even a single action.

original: sngags dag bya ba byed du zin kyang 'ga' zhig la slu ba'i phyir /
analyzed: sngags dag bya ba byed du zin kyang 'ga' zhig la slu ba'i phyir /
translated: Because even though the mantras have already performed their function, they deceive some.

original: rnam pa 'di ni rang bzhin la rigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: rnam pa 'di ni rang bzhin la rigs pa ma yin te /
translated: This aspect is not reasonable in terms of nature,

original: rang bzhin ni thams cad la khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rang bzhin ni thams cad la khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because nature is without distinction in all.

original: skyes bu rang gi 'dod pas 'jug pa can yin pas sems can skal ba mnyam pa la sogs pa'i dbang gis sam bsnyen pa'i khyad par gyis 'ga' zhig rjes su 'dzin gyi gzhan ni ma yin no zhes bya ba ni rigs so //
analyzed: skyes bu rang gi 'dod pas 'jug pa can yin pas sems can skal ba mnyam pa la sogs pa'i dbang gis sam bsnyen pa'i khyad par gyis 'ga' zhig rjes su 'dzin gyi gzhan ni ma yin no zhes bya ba ni rigs so //
translated: Since the person is engaged by his own desire, it is reasonable to say that he is accepted by some, not by others, by the power of the sameness of fortune of sentient beings or by the distinction of service.

original: gal te brtul zhugs kyi spyod pa dang / nyams pa la sogs pas chos dang chos ma yin pa 'phel ba na /
analyzed: gal te brtul zhugs kyi spyod pa dang / nyams pa la sogs pas chos dang chos ma yin pa 'phel ba na /
translated: If, through the conduct of observances, transgression, and so on, there is an increase of Dharma and non-Dharma,

original: chos sam chos ma yin pa'i bdag nyid can ngo bo nyid kyis grub pa dang ma grub pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: chos sam chos ma yin pa'i bdag nyid can ngo bo nyid kyis grub pa dang ma grub pa yin no zhe na /
translated: then the nature of Dharma and non-Dharma would be established by intrinsic reality or not established.

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: No, that is not so.

original: srog gcod pa dang rku ba dang 'khrig pa dang dman pa la sogs pa'i chos 'gal ba mang po dag kyang mkha' 'gro ma dang / sring mo'i rgyud la sogs pa dag la mthong ba'i phyir dang / de dag gis kyang grub pa'i khyad par bsgrub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: srog gcod pa dang rku ba dang 'khrig pa dang dman pa la sogs pa'i chos 'gal ba mang po dag kyang mkha' 'gro ma dang / sring mo'i rgyud la sogs pa dag la mthong ba'i phyir dang / de dag gis kyang grub pa'i khyad par bsgrub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because many contradictory phenomena such as killing, stealing, sexual intercourse, and lowly acts are seen in the tantras of the ·∏çƒÅkinƒ´s and sisters, and because they also establish the attainment of special powers.

original: de lta bu'i rnam pa yang chos kyi rang bzhin ma yin no zhes bya ba ni skabs ji lta ba bzhin du ston par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta bu'i rnam pa yang chos kyi rang bzhin ma yin no zhes bya ba ni skabs ji lta ba bzhin du ston par 'gyur ro //
translated: And such a form is not the nature of the Dharma. This will be shown in the appropriate context.

original: byams pa dang gtsang sbra dang chos la gzhol ba dag gi rgyu mtshan de nyid grub pa 'ga' zhig kyang mi bsgrub pa'i phyir bzlog pa dag gis grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: byams pa dang gtsang sbra dang chos la gzhol ba dag gi rgyu mtshan de nyid grub pa 'ga' zhig kyang mi bsgrub pa'i phyir bzlog pa dag gis grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the reason for love, purity, and devotion to the Dharma is not established, and because the opposite is established.

original: las kyi ngo bo gcig las kyang de dang 'gal ba'i chos dang chos ma yin pa mi rigs so //
analyzed: las kyi ngo bo gcig las kyang de dang 'gal ba'i chos dang chos ma yin pa mi rigs so //
translated: And it is not reasonable that a single entity of action should be both Dharma and non-Dharma, which are mutually exclusive.

original: da ni ji ltar na chos ma yin pa'i bdag nyid can gyi brtul zhugs la sogs pa las chos kyi 'bras bu 'dod pa thob par 'gyur /
analyzed: da ni ji ltar na chos ma yin pa'i bdag nyid can gyi brtul zhugs la sogs pa las chos kyi 'bras bu 'dod pa thob par 'gyur /
translated: Now, how could one obtain the desired result of Dharma from austerities, etc. which have a non-Dharmic nature?

original: 'bras bu 'dod pa de ni brtul zhugs la sogs pa de'i rnam par smin pa ni ma yin gyi //
analyzed: 'bras bu 'dod pa de ni brtul zhugs la sogs pa de'i rnam par smin pa ni ma yin gyi //
translated: That desired result is not the karmic ripening of those austerities, etc.

original: 'on kyang sngon gyi las kyis yin te /
analyzed: 'on kyang sngon gyi las kyis yin te /
translated: But rather it is due to previous karma.

original: bram ze gsod pa'i lung nan tan du byas pa las yul rnyed pa bzhin no //
analyzed: bram ze gsod pa'i lung nan tan du byas pa las yul rnyed pa bzhin no //
translated: For example, like obtaining a country from diligently practicing the scriptures on killing Brahmins.
