original: skyes bu'i rnam pa dang rang bzhin dang spyod pa'i mos pa don med par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: skyes bu'i rnam pa dang rang bzhin dang spyod pa'i mos pa don med par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it would follow, absurdly, that the interest in the aspects, nature, and activities of a being would be meaningless.

original: de yang phan 'dogs par byed pa nyid yin na skyes bu'i khyad par yon tan thun mong ma yin pa can grub ste /
analyzed: de yang phan 'dogs par byed pa nyid yin na skyes bu'i khyad par yon tan thun mong ma yin pa can grub ste /
translated: And if it is the case that it is the one who benefits, then the special being who has uncommon good qualities is established,

original: de dag la mos pa kho na dug gi las la sogs pa byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dag la mos pa kho na dug gi las la sogs pa byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is just the interest in those that causes the performance of the activities of poison, etc.

original: de bas na sngags skyes bus byas pa yin du zin kyang de'i nye bar sbyor ba la ltos pa med pa rang bzhin gyis 'bras bu 'byin pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de bas na sngags skyes bus byas pa yin du zin kyang de'i nye bar sbyor ba la ltos pa med pa rang bzhin gyis 'bras bu 'byin pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, even though the mantra is created by a being, it does not, without depending on the application of that being, naturally give rise to the effect.

original: gang yang rgyud rig 'ga' zhig gis //
analyzed: gang yang rgyud rig 'ga' zhig gis //
translated: Some who know the tantras

original: gsang sngags cung zad byed 'gyur pa //
analyzed: gsang sngags cung zad byed 'gyur pa //
translated: may perform a little mantra

original: de dag gis de gtso bo'i mthu //
analyzed: de dag gis de gtso bo'i mthu //
translated: and those who are the principal

original: des bshad rig pa 'jug phyir ro //
analyzed: des bshad rig pa 'jug phyir ro //
translated: will engage in the knowledge taught by him.

original: lam po che'i skyes bu 'ga' zhig rgyud shes pa bdag nyid kyi sngags byas pa dag gis las 'ga' zhig byed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lam po che'i skyes bu 'ga' zhig rgyud shes pa bdag nyid kyi sngags byas pa dag gis las 'ga' zhig byed par 'gyur ro //
translated: Some beings on the main road who know the tantras may perform some activity with the mantras they themselves have created.

original: de bzhin du gzhan dag kyang phul du byung ba ma yin pa dang sngags kyi byed pa por yang 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: de bzhin du gzhan dag kyang phul du byung ba ma yin pa dang sngags kyi byed pa por yang 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: Likewise, others also are not excellent and are not the agents of mantra.

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: This is not so.üîΩ

original: de dag gi mthu dang ldan pa nyid kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dag gi mthu dang ldan pa nyid kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because they are empowered by possessing the power of those.

original: des byas pa'i dam tshig rjes su skyong ba dang / de'i man ngag gi dam tshig nan tan du byed pa de dag gis nus te /
analyzed: des byas pa'i dam tshig rjes su skyong ba dang / de'i man ngag gi dam tshig nan tan du byed pa de dag gis nus te /
translated: Those who maintain the commitments made by them and who are diligent in the commitments of their esoteric instructions are capable.

original: de'i dam tshig dang man ngag la ltos pa med pa dag la nus pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i dam tshig dang man ngag la ltos pa med pa dag la nus pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Those who are not committed to their commitments and esoteric instructions are not capable.

original: de la yang de'i rnam pa bsam gtan byed pa la sogs pa nyid du rab tu sbyor ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de la yang de'i rnam pa bsam gtan byed pa la sogs pa nyid du rab tu sbyor ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Moreover, they are capable because they apply themselves to the contemplation and so forth of their forms.

original: de bas na des byin gyis brlabs pa de nyid de 'dra bar shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de bas na des byin gyis brlabs pa de nyid de 'dra bar shes par bya'o //
translated: Therefore, one should understand that they are just like those empowered by them.

original: gzhan yang de 'dra ba'i mthu dang ldan pa de nyid kyang gzhan dang thun mong ma yin pa'i nus pa nyid yin pa'i phyir //üîΩskyes bu'i @358a * //
analyzed: gzhan yang de 'dra ba'i mthu dang ldan pa de nyid kyang gzhan dang thun mong ma yin pa'i nus pa nyid yin pa'i phyir //üîΩskyes bu'i @358a * //
translated: Moreover, those who possess such power are also capable because they are not shared with others.

original: khyad par nyid bsgrubs pa yin no //üîΩ'bras bu 'dod pas sngags rnams ni //
analyzed: khyad par nyid bsgrubs pa yin no // 'bras bu 'dod pas sngags rnams ni //
translated: The result is established as being special.üîΩMantras are said to be created and produced by a person,

original: byas dang skyes bus byas brjod bya //
analyzed: byas dang skyes bus byas brjod bya //
translated: because one desires the result.

original: ma byas ba dag gi sbyor ba yod pa ma yin no //üîΩsbyor ba med pa dag las 'bras bu med pa de ltar na /
analyzed: ma byas ba dag gi sbyor ba yod pa ma yin no // sbyor ba med pa dag las 'bras bu med pa de ltar na /
translated: There is no application of those that are not created.üîΩAnd there is no result from those that have no application.

original: skyes bu'i byin brlabs med par 'bras bu med pa can dag gi 'bras bu mthong ba'i phyir //
analyzed: skyes bu'i byin brlabs med par 'bras bu med pa can dag gi 'bras bu mthong ba'i phyir //
translated: Thus, because the result is seen to be without the blessing of a person,üîΩmantras are said to be created and produced by a person,

original: sbyor ba las 'bras bu 'dod pa nyid kyis sngags rnams byas pa dang / skyes bus byas pa brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: sbyor ba las 'bras bu 'dod pa nyid kyis sngags rnams byas pa dang / skyes bus byas pa brjod par bya ste /
translated: because one desires the result from the application.

original: brdar byas pa can gyi snyan dngags bzhin no //
analyzed: brdar byas pa can gyi snyan dngags bzhin no //
translated: They are like poetry that is created by convention.

original: skyes bus nus med sgrub byed ni //
analyzed: skyes bus nus med sgrub byed ni //
translated: The establishment of what is incapable of being done by a person

original: 'di nyid kyis ni bsal ba yin //
analyzed: 'di nyid kyis ni bsal ba yin //
translated: is refuted by this very argument.

original: sngags rnams ni skyes bus byas pa dang des byin gyis brlabs pa las 'bras bu 'byin par bstan to //
analyzed: sngags rnams ni skyes bus byas pa dang des byin gyis brlabs pa las 'bras bu 'byin par bstan to //
translated: It is taught that mantras produce results from being created by a person and blessed by him.

original: de bas na de phul du byung ba 'ga' zhig dang ldan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de bas na de phul du byung ba 'ga' zhig dang ldan pa'i phyir /
translated: Therefore, because they possess some excellence,

original: de spong bar byed ba'i sgrub par byed pa dag kyang bsal ba yin no //
analyzed: de spong bar byed ba'i sgrub par byed pa dag kyang bsal ba yin no //
translated: The proofs that refute those are also refuted.

original: blo dbang smra dang skyes bu nyid //
analyzed: blo dbang smra dang skyes bu nyid //
translated: Intelligence, faculty, speech, personhood, etc.

original: la sogs sgrub byed gang brjod pa //
analyzed: la sogs sgrub byed gang brjod pa //
translated: Whatever proofs are stated

original: tshad ltar snang yin lhag min pas //
analyzed: tshad ltar snang yin lhag min pas //
translated: are only seemingly valid cognitions, not the rest.

original: ji bzhin don rtogs yod ma yin //
analyzed: ji bzhin don rtogs yod ma yin //
translated: Therefore, the meaning is not understood as it is.

original: blo dang dbang po dang smra ba dang skyes bu nyid yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa skyes bu'i phul du byung ba spong ba sgrub par byed pa gang yin pa de yang go bar byed pa nyid ma yin te /
analyzed: blo dang dbang po dang smra ba dang skyes bu nyid yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa skyes bu'i phul du byung ba spong ba sgrub par byed pa gang yin pa de yang go bar byed pa nyid ma yin te /
translated: Whatever proofs are stated to refute the excellence of a person, such as ‚Äúbecause of intelligence, faculty, speech, and personhood,‚Äù are not actually proofs.

original: spong ba dang spyi sgrub par byed pa dag ni mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: spong ba dang spyi sgrub par byed pa dag ni mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is impossible to prove a negation or a generality.

original: dbang po las 'das pa dag la de ma mthong ba'i spong ba yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: dbang po las 'das pa dag la de ma mthong ba'i spong ba yod pa ma yin no //
translated: In the case of what is beyond the senses, there is no negation of what is not seen.

original: yod du zin kyang de dag mi shes pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yod du zin kyang de dag mi shes pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Even if there were, it would not be known.

original: de nyid yi phyir 'gal ba mi 'grub pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de nyid yi phyir 'gal ba mi 'grub pa'i phyir /
translated: For that very reason, there is no establishment of a contradiction.

original: 'gal ba med pa dang lhan cig yod pa 'gal ba med pa'i phyir ro zhes bshad zin to //
analyzed: 'gal ba med pa dang lhan cig yod pa 'gal ba med pa'i phyir ro zhes bshad zin to //
translated: because there is no contradiction between the absence of contradiction and the presence of contradiction.

original: cig shos kyi spyi yang grub pa ma yin te /
analyzed: cig shos kyi spyi yang grub pa ma yin te /
translated: The other‚Äôs generality is not established either,

original: khyad par med pa shes par mi nus pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: khyad par med pa shes par mi nus pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because it is not possible to cognize that which is without distinction.

original: de 'dra ba dag la mi dmigs pa ni gtan tshigs nyid yin pa spangs ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de 'dra ba dag la mi dmigs pa ni gtan tshigs nyid yin pa spangs ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The non-apprehension of such things is itself the reason, because it is excluded.

original: skyes bu la sogs pa spyi dag la yang khyad par 'ga' zhig kyang mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: skyes bu la sogs pa spyi dag la yang khyad par 'ga' zhig kyang mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because even in the case of generalities such as ‚Äúperson,‚Äù etc., some distinction is seen.

original: khyad par yod pa can la yang spyi ma grub pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba yang bshad zin to //
analyzed: khyad par yod pa can la yang spyi ma grub pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba yang bshad zin to //
translated: And it has been explained that even in the case of that which has distinction, the generality is not established.

original: de bas na rjes su dpag pa de ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs la 'jug pa ma mthong du zin kyang /
analyzed: de bas na rjes su dpag pa de ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs la 'jug pa ma mthong du zin kyang /
translated: Therefore, even though the operation of that inference is not seen in the discordant class,

original: ldog pa la the tshom za ba'i phyir @358b lhag ma dang ldan pa nus pa med pa yin no /üîΩ// / bam po bcu gcig pa /
analyzed: ldog pa la the tshom za ba'i phyir @358b lhag ma dang ldan pa nus pa med pa yin no /üîΩ// / bam po bcu gcig pa /
translated: because of doubt regarding the exclusion, it is powerless with regard to the remainder.

original: gzhan yang de skad du brjod pa'i rgyal dpog pa dag gi rang gi tshig dang 'gal bar byed do //
analyzed: gzhan yang de skad du brjod pa'i rgyal dpog pa dag gi rang gi tshig dang 'gal bar byed do //
translated: Moreover, the Mƒ´mƒÅ·πÉsakas contradict their own statements.

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /
translated: For they say:

original: sgra ni kho bos 'di don dang // 'di don min zhes brjod mi byed //
analyzed: sgra ni kho bos 'di don dang // 'di don min zhes brjod mi byed //
translated: ‚ÄúWe do not say that a word has this meaning or that meaning.

original: skyes bus don 'di brtags pa ste //
analyzed: skyes bus don 'di brtags pa ste //
translated: ‚ÄúThe meaning is designated by a person.

original: de yang 'dod chags la sogs ldan //
analyzed: de yang 'dod chags la sogs ldan //
translated: ‚ÄúAnd that is associated with desire and so on.

original: de gcig de nyid rigs gzhan min //
analyzed: de gcig de nyid rigs gzhan min //
translated: ‚ÄúIt is not the same as the one, nor is it of a different kind.‚Äù

original: zhes bya'i khyad par gang gis byas //
analyzed: zhes bya'i khyad par gang gis byas //
translated: ‚ÄúBy what distinction is it made?

original: de bzhin skyes yin rnam 'gas kyang //
analyzed: de bzhin skyes yin rnam 'gas kyang //
translated: ‚ÄúIn the same way, it is a person.

original: khyod ci shes can 'ga' mi 'dod //
analyzed: khyod ci shes can 'ga' mi 'dod //
translated: ‚ÄúIn what way do you not accept any knower?‚Äù

original: rig byed pa'i sgra de dag bram ze khyod tshur shog / kho bo'i don 'di zung shig / gzhan ni ma yin no zhes de skad du brjod par mi byed do //
analyzed: rig byed pa'i sgra de dag bram ze khyod tshur shog / kho bo'i don 'di zung shig / gzhan ni ma yin no zhes de skad du brjod par mi byed do //
translated: The words of the Vedas do not say, ‚ÄúCome here, Brahmin, grasp this meaning of ours, not another.‚Äù

original: mngon par gsal ba ma yin pa'i don gyi khyad par dang 'dre ba can 'ga' zhig gis mnyan pa nyid skyed par byed do //
analyzed: mngon par gsal ba ma yin pa'i don gyi khyad par dang 'dre ba can 'ga' zhig gis mnyan pa nyid skyed par byed do //
translated: They produce the mere hearing of some meaning that is mixed with an unclear distinction.

original: de la skyes bu gcig gis don cung zad gcig dang gzhan gyis gzhan brtags pa yin gyi //
analyzed: de la skyes bu gcig gis don cung zad gcig dang gzhan gyis gzhan brtags pa yin gyi //
translated: One person examines one thing, and another examines something else.

original: sgra rnams kyi rang bzhin so sor nges pa cung zhig kyang yod pa ma yin na //
analyzed: sgra rnams kyi rang bzhin so sor nges pa cung zhig kyang yod pa ma yin na //
translated: There is not even the slightest restriction on the nature of words.

original: gang gis don gcig gi rjes su byed cing gzhan ma yin te /
analyzed: gang gis don gcig gi rjes su byed cing gzhan ma yin te /
translated: Since they are not different, how can they be the cause of a single object?

original: 'on kyang brda'i dbang gis de dang de bzung ba na mthong ba bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'on kyang brda'i dbang gis de dang de bzung ba na mthong ba bar 'gyur ro //
translated: However, when one grasps them in terms of their conventional meaning, one sees them as different.

original: lkog tu gyur ba goms pa'i phyir nyes pas bslad cing mi mkhas ba 'ga' zhig don nges pa rigs pa med pa can de dag de kho na nyid du 'chad par byed pa yin la /
analyzed: lkog tu gyur ba goms pa'i phyir nyes pas bslad cing mi mkhas ba 'ga' zhig don nges pa rigs pa med pa can de dag de kho na nyid du 'chad par byed pa yin la /
translated: Some, who are ignorant and contaminated by faults, explain the meaning of the scriptures in a way that is not logical.

original: gzhan ni ma yin no zhes bya bar rigs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan ni ma yin no zhes bya bar rigs pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not logical to say that the meaning is not as it is explained.

original: ci ste 'ga' zhig las blo dang dbang po la sogs pa dag de nyid kyis rigs pa yin gyi //
analyzed: ci ste 'ga' zhig las blo dang dbang po la sogs pa dag de nyid kyis rigs pa yin gyi //
translated: If someone says that the mind, the sense faculties, and so on are logical in one way,

original: gzhan gyis ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan gyis ni ma yin no //
translated: but not in another,

original: de'i dbang po las 'das pa'i shes pa'i khyad par 'di gang las yin /
analyzed: de'i dbang po las 'das pa'i shes pa'i khyad par 'di gang las yin /
translated: how is it that the special knowledge of the imperceptible is from that?

original: de bzhin du yul dang dus dang rang bzhin gyi bskal ba'i don dag mthong na gzhan dag kyang ci'i phyir med pa can mthong ba yin /
analyzed: de bzhin du yul dang dus dang rang bzhin gyi bskal ba'i don dag mthong na gzhan dag kyang ci'i phyir med pa can mthong ba yin /
translated: Likewise, if one sees the meaning of a time period in terms of place, time, or nature, why would one not see the meaning of another time period?

original: de spong bar byed pa'i sgrub par byed pa gang yin pa 'ga' zhig kyang de dag gis dmigs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de spong bar byed pa'i sgrub par byed pa gang yin pa 'ga' zhig kyang de dag gis dmigs pa ma yin no //
translated: And if one does not see the meaning of another time period, then the proof that refutes that is not observed by them.

original: ji ltar de'i sgrub par byed pa yod na yang 'di'i khyed par 'di yin pa de ltar gzhan gyis yang 'gyur ba de ltar na mngon par zhen pa med par rigs pa yin no //
analyzed: ji ltar de'i sgrub par byed pa yod na yang 'di'i khyed par 'di yin pa de ltar gzhan gyis yang 'gyur ba de ltar na mngon par zhen pa med par rigs pa yin no //
translated: Just as when there is a proof of that, this is its nature, so it is for another. Thus it is reasonable to be free of attachment.

original: gal te gang tshig tshad ma yis //
analyzed: gal te gang tshig tshad ma yis //
translated: If one knows the meaning

original: mi slu @359a * //
analyzed: mi slu @359a * //
translated: of a statement that is not deceptive

original: de don rig yin na //
analyzed: de don rig yin na //
translated: through a valid cognition,üîΩthen there is no need for another valid cognition

original: shin tu lkog tu gyur pa la //üîΩtshad ma sred pa yod ma yin //üîΩde ltar ni 'gyur na kho bos skyes bu chad mar gyur pa'i phyir //
analyzed: shin tu lkog tu gyur pa la // tshad ma sred pa yod ma yin // de ltar ni 'gyur na kho bos skyes bu chad mar gyur pa'i phyir //
translated: in regard to something extremely obscure.

original: 'ga' zhig gi bshad pa la mngon par zhen pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'ga' zhig gi bshad pa la mngon par zhen pa ma yin no //
translated: If that were the case, then I would not be attached to the explanation of someone else because I would be independent.

original: 'o na ci yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci yin zhe na /
translated: What is it then?

original: tshad ma gzhan gyis mi slu ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tshad ma gzhan gyis mi slu ba'i phyir ro //
translated: It is because another valid cognition does not deceive.

original: 'chad pa po mang po dag yod na yang mngon sum la sogs pa'i tshad ma ston par byed pa gang yin pa de khas len to zhe na /
analyzed: 'chad pa po mang po dag yod na yang mngon sum la sogs pa'i tshad ma ston par byed pa gang yin pa de khas len to zhe na /
translated: Even though there are many teachers, we accept only those who teach valid cognitions such as perception.

original: de mi ma yin te /
analyzed: de mi ma yin te /
translated: This is not so,

original: dbang po las 'das pa ma mthong ba la sogs pa tshad ma gzhan mi 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dbang po las 'das pa ma mthong ba la sogs pa tshad ma gzhan mi 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because other valid cognitions such as perception do not operate with respect to what is beyond the senses.

original: de 'jug pa med pa nyid kyi phyir de rtog par bya ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de 'jug pa med pa nyid kyi phyir de rtog par bya ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because they do not operate, they cannot be imagined to be valid cognitions.

original: lung don du gnyer ba yin no //
analyzed: lung don du gnyer ba yin no //
translated: We seek a scripture that is valid.

original: de ltar ma yin de yod du zin yang tshad ma gzhan 'jug pa med pa na don rtogs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ltar ma yin de yod du zin yang tshad ma gzhan 'jug pa med pa na don rtogs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: If it were not so, then even if it existed, since other valid cognitions do not operate, the meaning would not be understood.

original: yan gar ba de las rtogs pa'i phyir lung sgrub par byed pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro //üîΩgal te gzhan yan gar ba las kyang dbang po las 'das pa dag rtogs par mi 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: yan gar ba de las rtogs pa'i phyir lung sgrub par byed pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro // gal te gzhan yan gar ba las kyang dbang po las 'das pa dag rtogs par mi 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: Since it is understood from that alone, scripture would not be established as a valid means of knowledge.üîΩIf you say that even from another alone, what is beyond the senses is not understood,

original: ji ltar dbang po las 'das pa zhes bya ba dang / mngon sum la sogs pa'i yul yang yin /
analyzed: ji ltar dbang po las 'das pa zhes bya ba dang / mngon sum la sogs pa'i yul yang yin /
translated: then how is it that what is beyond the senses is the object of perception and so on?

original: gal te de dag kyang rang gi yul la yang lung la ltos nas bsgrub par byed pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gal te de dag kyang rang gi yul la yang lung la ltos nas bsgrub par byed pa yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that even those are established in dependence on scripture with regard to their objects,

original: du ba la sogs pa las me la sogs pa'i shes pa lung med pa can du mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: du ba la sogs pa las me la sogs pa'i shes pa lung med pa can du mi 'gyur ro //
translated: then the cognition of fire, etc. from smoke, etc. would not be without scripture.

original: gal te lung 'jug pa la tshad ma gzhan tshol ba ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gal te lung 'jug pa la tshad ma gzhan tshol ba ni ma yin no //
translated: If you say that when scripture is engaged, another means of valid cognition is not sought,

original: 'o na ci zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na /
translated: then what is it?

original: lung gi 'jug pa de nyid mi shes so zhe na /
analyzed: lung gi 'jug pa de nyid mi shes so zhe na /
translated: If you say that one does not understand the engagement of scripture,

original: rab tu sgrub pa bdag nyid nus pa 'di lung de nye bas phul du byung ba ci zhig gso bar byed /
analyzed: rab tu sgrub pa bdag nyid nus pa 'di lung de nye bas phul du byung ba ci zhig gso bar byed /
translated: what cure is there for this excessive reliance on scripture, which is itself incapable of establishing?

original: nus pa med na ni lung 'jug tu zon kyang sgrub par byed pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nus pa med na ni lung 'jug tu zon kyang sgrub par byed pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
translated: If it is incapable, then even if scripture is engaged, it will not be a means of valid cognition.

original: dbang po las 'das pa'i don dang 'brel ba'i lung gi 'jug pa de yang dbang po las 'das par ji ltar gzhan gyis grub pa yin te /
analyzed: dbang po las 'das pa'i don dang 'brel ba'i lung gi 'jug pa de yang dbang po las 'das par ji ltar gzhan gyis grub pa yin te /
translated: Moreover, how is the engagement of scripture with a transcendent object established by another transcendent means of valid cognition?

original: gzhan yang de bzhin du lung gi mtshan nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzhan yang de bzhin du lung gi mtshan nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: Moreover, it would be the definition of scripture.

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /
translated: Thus,

original: gang gi tshig ni tshad ma yis //
analyzed: gang gi tshig ni tshad ma yis //
translated: whose words are valid?

original: mi slu ba can de byas tshig / de lung zhes thob de yi phyir //
analyzed: mi slu ba can de byas tshig / de lung zhes thob de yi phyir //
translated: The speech of one who is nondeceptive is scripture.

original: skyes bus byas min don med yin //
analyzed: skyes bus byas min don med yin //
translated: It is not the product of a person, because it is not meaningless.

original: lung smra bar mtshungs na yang tshad ma'i stobs kyis lung ni la lar lung nyid yin te /
analyzed: lung smra bar mtshungs na yang tshad ma'i stobs kyis lung ni la lar lung nyid yin te /
translated: Although the speech of a person and scripture are similar in being speech, scripture is scripture because of the power of valid knowledge.

original: tshad mas mi slu ba'i tshig dag lung gi mtshan nyid yin @359b par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: tshad mas mi slu ba'i tshig dag lung gi mtshan nyid yin @359b par 'gyur ro //
translated: The definition of scripture is speech that is nondeceptive because of valid knowledge.

original: skyes bus byas pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: skyes bus byas pa ni ma yin te /
translated: It is not the product of a person,

original: de ni thams cad la mtshungs pa yin na yang rtogs pa yang tshad mas gnod pa med pa'i phyir ro //üîΩde yod na yang gzhan du tshad ma gzhan gyis slu ba la mi 'dod pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni thams cad la mtshungs pa yin na yang rtogs pa yang tshad mas gnod pa med pa'i phyir ro // de yod na yang gzhan du tshad ma gzhan gyis slu ba la mi 'dod pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because although that is similar in all cases, understanding is not undermined by valid knowledge.üîΩEven if it exists, it is not accepted that another valid knowledge is deceptive with regard to another.

original: gzhan yang / gal te shin tu lkog gyur don //üîΩlung med shes pa yod na ni //
analyzed: gzhan yang / gal te shin tu lkog gyur don // lung med shes pa yod na ni //
translated: Moreover,üîΩIf there were knowledge of a very hidden object

original: dbang po las 'das don rig 'ga' //
analyzed: dbang po las 'das don rig 'ga' //
translated: without scripture,

original: yod do zhes ni mngon 'dod 'gyur //
analyzed: yod do zhes ni mngon 'dod 'gyur //
translated: then one would have to acceptüîΩthat there are some who know objects beyond the senses.

original: gal te skyes bu lung la ltos pa med pa'i shes pa ji lta ba de lta bu nyid lkog tu gyur pa'i don la 'dod na /
analyzed: gal te skyes bu lung la ltos pa med pa'i shes pa ji lta ba de lta bu nyid lkog tu gyur pa'i don la 'dod na /
translated: If you maintain that the cognition of a person is like that, which does not depend on scripture, with regard to a hidden object,

original: dbang po las 'das pa'i don mthong ba'i skyes bu yod do zhes 'dod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dbang po las 'das pa'i don mthong ba'i skyes bu yod do zhes 'dod par 'gyur ro //
translated: then you would have to maintain that there is a person who sees an object beyond the senses.

original: mngon sum sngon du song ba can gyi tshad ma ni de mthong ba med pa la mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mngon sum sngon du song ba can gyi tshad ma ni de mthong ba med pa la mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because a valid cognition that has as its antecedent a perception is impossible without seeing that.

original: mngon sum 'jug pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mngon sum 'jug pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because there is no engagement of perception.

original: de dag la tshad ma gzhan mi srid pa na de la dmigs pa ma yin pa rtogs par bya ba lung tshad ma yin no //
analyzed: de dag la tshad ma gzhan mi srid pa na de la dmigs pa ma yin pa rtogs par bya ba lung tshad ma yin no //
translated: Since another valid cognition is impossible for them, scripture is the valid cognition that comprehends that which is not perceived.

original: tshad ma gzhan 'jug pa mngon sum sgrub par byed pa yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: tshad ma gzhan 'jug pa mngon sum sgrub par byed pa yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Because the engagement of another valid cognition establishes the perception.

original: skyes bu'i phul du byung ba dag bzlog par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: skyes bu'i phul du byung ba dag bzlog par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, the excellence of a person is not refuted.

original: de bas na dbang po las 'das pa dag la tshad ma gzhan 'jug pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de bas na dbang po las 'das pa dag la tshad ma gzhan 'jug pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, another valid cognition does not engage objects beyond the senses.

original: de nyid kyi phyir lung don gyi khyad par la 'jug pa yongs su shes pa med pa'i phyir /üîΩrgyal dpog pa'am gzhan 'dis ni //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir lung don gyi khyad par la 'jug pa yongs su shes pa med pa'i phyir / rgyal dpog pa'am gzhan 'dis ni //
translated: are not aware of the meaning of the Vedas

original: bdag nyid 'dod chags sogs ldan pa'am //
analyzed: bdag nyid 'dod chags sogs ldan pa'am //
translated: through their own attachment, etc.üîΩNor is the meaning of the Vedas known through another,

original: gzhan las rig byed don rig min //üîΩrig byed rig par byed min na'ang //
analyzed: gzhan las rig byed don rig min // rig byed rig par byed min na'ang //
translated: because the meaning of the Vedas is not known through the Vedas.

original: rig byed don ni gang las rtogs //
analyzed: rig byed don ni gang las rtogs //
translated: The meaning of the Vedas is not known through the Vedas, because the meaning of the Vedas is not known through the Vedas.üîΩThe meaning of the Vedas is not known through the Vedas, because the meaning of the Vedas is not known through the Vedas.üîΩThe meaning of the Vedas is not known through the Vedas, because the meaning of the Vedas is not known through the Vedas.üîΩThe meaning of the Vedas is not known through the Vedas, because the meaning of the Vedas is not known through the Vedas.üîΩThe meaning of the Vedas is not known through the Vedas, because the meaning of the Vedas is not known through the Vedas.

original: nyes pa'i 'khrul ba las ma 'das pa can gyi 'chad pa po'i skyes bu thams cad kyi dbang po las 'das pa'i don gyi khyad par so sor nges pa de bdag nyid kyis rig pa ma yin no //
analyzed: nyes pa'i 'khrul ba las ma 'das pa can gyi 'chad pa po'i skyes bu thams cad kyi dbang po las 'das pa'i don gyi khyad par so sor nges pa de bdag nyid kyis rig pa ma yin no //
translated: The meaning of the Vedas is not known through the Vedas, because the meaning of the Vedas is not known through the Vedas.

original: de dag la gzhan gyi rig par byed pa ma yin te /üîΩde la yang thal bar gyur pa mtshungs pa nyid kyi phyir ro //üîΩlong bas drangs par gyur pa'i long bas lam rtogs par mi 'gyur ba lta bu'o //
analyzed: de dag la gzhan gyi rig par byed pa ma yin te / de la yang thal bar gyur pa mtshungs pa nyid kyi phyir ro // long bas drangs par gyur pa'i long bas lam rtogs par mi 'gyur ba lta bu'o //
translated: The meaning of the Vedas is not known through the Vedas, because the meaning of the Vedas is not known through the Vedas.üîΩThe meaning of the Vedas is not known through the Vedas, because the meaning of the Vedas is not known through the Vedas.üîΩThe meaning of the Vedas is not known through the Vedas, because the meaning of the Vedas is not known through the Vedas.üîΩThe meaning of the Vedas is not known through the Vedas, because the meaning of the Vedas is not known through the Vedas.üîΩThe meaning of the Vedas is not known through the Vedas, because the meaning of the Vedas is not known through the Vedas.üîΩThe meaning of the Vedas is not known through the Vedas, because the meaning of the Vedas is not known through the Vedas.üîΩThe meaning of the Vedas is not known through the Vedas, because the meaning of the Vedas is not known through the Vedas.üîΩThe meaning of the Vedas is not known through the Vedas, because the meaning of the Vedas is not known through the Vedas.üîΩThe meaning of the Vedas is not known through the Vedas, because the meaning of the Vedas is not known through the Vedas.üîΩThe meaning of the Vedas is not known through the Vedas, because the meaning of the Vedas is not known through the Vedas.

original: rig byed bdag nyid kyi rang gi don rnam par 'grel bar byed pa ma yin te /
analyzed: rig byed bdag nyid kyi rang gi don rnam par 'grel bar byed pa ma yin te /
translated: The meaning of the Vedas is not known through the Vedas, because the meaning of the Vedas is not known through the Vedas.

original: bstan pa don med par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bstan pa don med par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it would follow that the teaching would be pointless.

original: de bas na yongs su shes pa'i byed pa'i don can ma yin pa'i sgra'i lhag ma 'di ltar zug rngur gyur pa /
analyzed: de bas na yongs su shes pa'i byed pa'i don can ma yin pa'i sgra'i lhag ma 'di ltar zug rngur gyur pa /
translated: Therefore, the remainder of the words that do not have the meaning of the object of complete knowledge, which is like a thorn,

original: yang dag pa mthong ba ma @360a * //
analyzed: yang dag pa mthong ba ma @360a * //
translated: is the root of not seeing reality,

original: yin pa'i rtsa ba rnams kyis rnam par bcings pa 'byung bar dka' ba sdug bsngal 'jog par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: yin pa'i rtsa ba rnams kyis rnam par bcings pa 'byung bar dka' ba sdug bsngal 'jog par byed pa yin no //
translated: which is difficult to remove, and is the cause of the placement of suffering.

original: das mtho ris 'dod me la ni //
analyzed: das mtho ris 'dod me la ni //
translated: In the desire for heaven,

original: sbyin sreg sbyin zhes thos pa la //
analyzed: sbyin sreg sbyin zhes thos pa la //
translated: it is heard that a fire offering is to be given.

original: khyi sha za zhes bya ba de //
analyzed: khyi sha za zhes bya ba de //
translated: In the statement ‚Äúone should eat dog meat,‚Äù

original: don min zhes 'dir tshad ma gang /
analyzed: don min zhes 'dir tshad ma gang /
translated: what is the valid cognition here that it has no meaning?üîΩIn some cases, the meaning is close,

original: don la la yang nye ba dang // bskal ba dang bral ba mtho ris 'dod pas me la sbyin sreg sbyin par bya'o zhes bya ba dag la 'byung ba'i khyad par la ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i mar la sogs pa blugs par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don yin la /
analyzed: don la la yang nye ba dang // bskal ba dang bral ba mtho ris 'dod pas me la sbyin sreg sbyin par bya'o zhes bya ba dag la 'byung ba'i khyad par la ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i mar la sogs pa blugs par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don yin la /
translated: and in some cases, it is distant. In the desire for heaven, a fire offering is to be given in the fire. In this, the meaning is that ghee and so on, which are desired, are to be poured into the fire.

original: khyi'i sha bza' bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i khyad par ma mthong ngo //
analyzed: khyi'i sha bza' bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i khyad par ma mthong ngo //
translated: The meaning of the statement one should eat dog meat is not understood in accordance with the speaker's intention.

original: lkog tu gyur pa'i ston pa po'i tshig gi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du don da ltar bdag gis rtogs par 'gyur ba'am /
analyzed: lkog tu gyur pa'i ston pa po'i tshig gi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du don da ltar bdag gis rtogs par 'gyur ba'am /
translated: Or, is it that one should not eat dog meat?

original: 'on te bzlog pa zhes bya ba 'di thams cad du thal bar 'gyur ba mtshungs pa ma yin nam //
analyzed: 'on te bzlog pa zhes bya ba 'di thams cad du thal bar 'gyur ba mtshungs pa ma yin nam //
translated: Is it not the case that all of this is equally open to doubt?

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: No, it is not.

original: 'chad pa po bdag nyid kyi dgongs pa gsal bar byed pas yang dag pa'i man ngag srid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'chad pa po bdag nyid kyi dgongs pa gsal bar byed pas yang dag pa'i man ngag srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is possible that the speaker himself will clarify his intention, and thus the correct instruction can be obtained.

original: 'di ni ston par byed pa po med pa'i sgra la yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di ni ston par byed pa po med pa'i sgra la yod pa ma yin no //
translated: This is not the case with sounds that are not produced by a person.

original: 'jig rten gyis shes par bya ba'i dgongs pa can gyis gsungs pa na /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyis shes par bya ba'i dgongs pa can gyis gsungs pa na /
translated: When the speaker's intention is to be understood by the world,

original: 'jig rten gyi brda rab tu grags pa rjes su skyong bar mdzad do //
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi brda rab tu grags pa rjes su skyong bar mdzad do //
translated: he preserves the well-known conventions of the world.

original: de las kyang don de'i rtogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de las kyang don de'i rtogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: And from that, the meaning is understood.

original: skyes bus ma byas pa'i sgra dag ni ma yin te /
analyzed: skyes bus ma byas pa'i sgra dag ni ma yin te /
translated: But not from sounds that are not produced by a person.

original: de la 'ga' zhig smra bar 'dod pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de la 'ga' zhig smra bar 'dod pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because some do not wish to speak.

original: gzhan yang mkhas pa rigs pa nyid rjes su skyong bar byed pa dor bar bya ba dang / blang bar bya ba de'i rten dag la 'jug par 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: gzhan yang mkhas pa rigs pa nyid rjes su skyong bar byed pa dor bar bya ba dang / blang bar bya ba de'i rten dag la 'jug par 'gyur gyi /
translated: Moreover, the wise who are intent on the truth engage in the basis of what is to be rejected and accepted,

original: rab tu brjod pas ni ma yin pa'i phyir thal bar mtshungs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rab tu brjod pas ni ma yin pa'i phyir thal bar mtshungs pa ma yin no //
translated: but not in mere verbal expression, so the reductio does not apply equally.

original: de yang skabs ji lta ba bzhin du ston par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de yang skabs ji lta ba bzhin du ston par 'gyur ro //
translated: And that will be shown in the appropriate context.

original: 'jig rten gyi gnas pa la sogs pa rigs pa'i yul ma yin pa'i don la yang skyes bu yid ches pa'i tshig las rtogs pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi gnas pa la sogs pa rigs pa'i yul ma yin pa'i don la yang skyes bu yid ches pa'i tshig las rtogs pa ma yin nam /
translated: But isn‚Äôt the world‚Äôs practice, etc., understood from the words of a trustworthy person even though it is not a matter for reasoning?

original: ma yin te nges pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ma yin te nges pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: No, because there is no certainty.

original: la lar 'khrul ba med pa'i phyir thams cad la de ltar 'gyur ba ma yin te /
analyzed: la lar 'khrul ba med pa'i phyir thams cad la de ltar 'gyur ba ma yin te /
translated: It is not the case that everything is like that, because there is no error in some cases.

original: 'khrul ba mthong ba'i phyir dang / de'i 'jug pa mi slu ba dang khyab pa ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'khrul ba mthong ba'i phyir dang / de'i 'jug pa mi slu ba dang khyab pa ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because error is seen, and because the engagement of that [trustworthy person] is not nondeceptive and is not universal.

original: lung gi mtshan nyid 'di ni go skabs med pa nyid du 'dod pas de las nges pa ma yin no //
analyzed: lung gi mtshan nyid 'di ni go skabs med pa nyid du 'dod pas de las nges pa ma yin no //
translated: The definition of scripture is not ascertained from that, because it is held to be impossible.

original: @360b de bas na lung tshad ma ma yin no zhes bshad zin to //
analyzed: @360b de bas na lung tshad ma ma yin no zhes bshad zin to //
translated: Therefore, it has been explained that scripture is not a means of valid cognition.

original: skyes bus ma byas pa'i sgra dag gi don shes pa yang dag pa'i man ngag las ma yin //
analyzed: skyes bus ma byas pa'i sgra dag gi don shes pa yang dag pa'i man ngag las ma yin //
translated: The meaning of the words of a nonhuman is not known from a correct instruction,

original: rigs pa las ma yin /
analyzed: rigs pa las ma yin /
translated: nor from reasoning,

original: 'jig rten las ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'jig rten las ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: nor from the world.

original: de la rtogs pa med par rigs pa dang ldan pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de la rtogs pa med par rigs pa dang ldan pa ma yin no //
translated: Without understanding, it is not reasonable.

original: de yang gal te /üîΩ'jig rten tshig rab grags rtogs pa'i //
analyzed: de yang gal te / 'jig rten tshig rab grags rtogs pa'i //
translated: And ifüîΩthe world is the cause of understanding

original: rgyu yin na /üîΩde la sna tshogs don can sgra'i //üîΩgang gis don 'di rnam phye bas //
analyzed: rgyu yin na / de la sna tshogs don can sgra'i // gang gis don 'di rnam phye bas //
translated: the words that are well known,üîΩby what means is the meaning of the

original: dbang po las 'das don mthong gang //
analyzed: dbang po las 'das don mthong gang //
translated: words that have various meanings distinguished?

original: skyes bus ma byas pa'i sgra dang don 'brel ba las 'jig rten gyi tha snyad 'di ni ma yin no //
analyzed: skyes bus ma byas pa'i sgra dang don 'brel ba las 'jig rten gyi tha snyad 'di ni ma yin no //
translated: The worldly convention is not from the connection of the meaning of the words of a nonhuman with the words.

original: 'o na ci zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na /
translated: Well then, what is it?

original: brda las yin te /
analyzed: brda las yin te /
translated: It is from a sign.

original: bstan bcos byed rang nyid kyi brda las bstan pa la ltos pa'i phyir //
analyzed: bstan bcos byed rang nyid kyi brda las bstan pa la ltos pa'i phyir //
translated: The treatise is dependent on the teaching, because it is a commentary on the teaching,

original: pa ni na'i slob ma la sogs pa'i tha snyad bzhin no //
analyzed: pa ni na'i slob ma la sogs pa'i tha snyad bzhin no //
translated: like the conventions of a student of NƒÅgƒÅrjuna and so on.

original: skyes bus ma byas pa de la ni bstan pa rigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: skyes bus ma byas pa de la ni bstan pa rigs pa ma yin te /
translated: It is not right to teach what is not made by a person,

original: de ni 'ga' zhig gis kyang mi shes pa'i phyir dang / dbang po las 'das pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni 'ga' zhig gis kyang mi shes pa'i phyir dang / dbang po las 'das pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because it is not known by anyone and because it is beyond the senses.

original: dbang pos gzung bar bya ba nyid yin na ni gzugs la sogs pa dang 'dra bar bdag nyid rtogs par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dbang pos gzung bar bya ba nyid yin na ni gzugs la sogs pa dang 'dra bar bdag nyid rtogs par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: If it were to be apprehended by the senses, it would follow that it would be understood by itself, like form and so on.

original: bstan pa yin na yang skyes bu rang rgyud pa dag gi de kho na nyid ji lta ba bzhin du bstan pas mi slu ba mi 'grub pa'i phyir yid brtan du med do //
analyzed: bstan pa yin na yang skyes bu rang rgyud pa dag gi de kho na nyid ji lta ba bzhin du bstan pas mi slu ba mi 'grub pa'i phyir yid brtan du med do //
translated: Even if it were taught, it would not be reliable, because it is not established that the teaching of the reality of independent persons is nondeceptive, as it is.

original: gal te rig byed dang 'dra bar rnam par bshad pa dang / skyes bus ma byas pa thog ma med pa'i yang dag pa'i man ngag rgyu ma chad pa las 'ongs pa de las don grub pa yin no zhe na //
analyzed: gal te rig byed dang 'dra bar rnam par bshad pa dang / skyes bus ma byas pa thog ma med pa'i yang dag pa'i man ngag rgyu ma chad pa las 'ongs pa de las don grub pa yin no zhe na //
translated: If you say that the meaning is established from that, which is like the Vedas, from an explanation, and from an unbroken tradition of authentic instruction that is not made by a person and is beginningless,

original: de yang sgra'i bdag nyid can yin na ni ji ltar na 'di'i don rig pa yin zhes brgal zhing brtag pa mtshungs so //
analyzed: de yang sgra'i bdag nyid can yin na ni ji ltar na 'di'i don rig pa yin zhes brgal zhing brtag pa mtshungs so //
translated: then the same objection and analysis apply: if it has the nature of sound, how can it be known that it has meaning?

original: re zhig skyes bu bdag nyid kyis brdar byas pa'i sgra rnams kyi don rva las gzung bas kyang mi rtogs pa rtogs par byed pa de ltar na skyes bus byas pa'i don rtogs pa'i thabs yod pa yin no //
analyzed: re zhig skyes bu bdag nyid kyis brdar byas pa'i sgra rnams kyi don rva las gzung bas kyang mi rtogs pa rtogs par byed pa de ltar na skyes bus byas pa'i don rtogs pa'i thabs yod pa yin no //
translated: If the meaning of sounds that are conventionally agreed upon by a person is not understood by grasping the horn, then there is a means of understanding the meaning that is made by a person.

original: skyes dbus ma byas pa'i sgra ni de ltar byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: skyes dbus ma byas pa'i sgra ni de ltar byed pa ma yin no //
translated: But a sound that is not made by a person does not do that.

original: 'ga' zhig gis kyang la lar 'di'i 'brel ba nges pa shes par mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'ga' zhig gis kyang la lar 'di'i 'brel ba nges pa shes par mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because no one can know the relation of that to anything.

original: de'i don rtogs pa nyid med do //
analyzed: de'i don rtogs pa nyid med do //
translated: It does not have the meaning that is understood.

original: gzhan yang rig byed de'am de'i rnam pa bshad skyes bus skyes bu la bstan par gyur pa na /
analyzed: gzhan yang rig byed de'am de'i rnam pa bshad skyes bus skyes bu la bstan par gyur pa na /
translated: Moreover, when the Veda or its meaning is taught by a person who has learned it,

original: yang dag pa'i man ngag 'jig pa med pa @361a * //
analyzed: yang dag pa'i man ngag 'jig pa med pa @361a * //
translated: the continuity of the correct teaching would be interrupted.

original: can nyid rjes su 'jug pa zhes bya ba 'di la yang mna' la brten par bya ste /üîΩlung 'jig par byed par bdag nyid rlom pas sam /üîΩde'i bstan pa la rnam par sdang bas sam /
analyzed: can nyid rjes su 'jug pa zhes bya ba 'di la yang mna' la brten par bya ste / lung 'jig par byed par bdag nyid rlom pas sam / de'i bstan pa la rnam par sdang bas sam /
translated: In this case, you should take an oath.üîΩYou are arrogant and destroy the scriptures.üîΩYou hate the teaching.

original: der zhugs pa dma' dbab pa'i phyir g-yon can zil gyis mnan pas sam /
analyzed: der zhugs pa dma' dbab pa'i phyir g-yon can zil gyis mnan pas sam /
translated: You are deceitful and belittle those who follow the teaching.

original: rgyu gzhan 'ga' zhig kyang rnam pa gzhan du rtsom pa mthong ba'i phyir ro //üîΩgzhan yang 'dir khyod kyis skyes bu 'dod chags la sogs pa dag gis bslad pa brdzun pa yang smra ba'i phyir /
analyzed: rgyu gzhan 'ga' zhig kyang rnam pa gzhan du rtsom pa mthong ba'i phyir ro // gzhan yang 'dir khyod kyis skyes bu 'dod chags la sogs pa dag gis bslad pa brdzun pa yang smra ba'i phyir /
translated: You see other causes in a different way.

original: 'di'i tshig tshad ma ma yin no zhes bdag nyid kyis khas blangs pa brjod pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di'i tshig tshad ma ma yin no zhes bdag nyid kyis khas blangs pa brjod pa yin te /
translated: Moreover, you yourself have stated that the words of the Vedas are not valid because the person who composed them was a human being who was subject to desire and so on.

original: rang gi tshig la rjes su chags pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rang gi tshig la rjes su chags pa'i phyir ro //
translated: You are attached to your own words.

original: de ni 'dir yang yod dam med ces ci'i phyir dpyod par mi byed /
analyzed: de ni 'dir yang yod dam med ces ci'i phyir dpyod par mi byed /
translated: Why do you not examine whether or not it exists here?

original: de nyid rig byed dam rig byed kyi don ston pa na 'khrul pa'i phyir rnam pa gzhan du ston par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nyid rig byed dam rig byed kyi don ston pa na 'khrul pa'i phyir rnam pa gzhan du ston par 'gyur ro //
translated: It is because the Veda is mistaken when it teaches the meaning of the Veda.

original: skyes bu 'ga' zhig gis nus pa las byung ba'i yal ga gzhan dag thos shing da ltar yang nyung zad 'don par byed pa can 'ga' zhig kyang mthong ngo //
analyzed: skyes bu 'ga' zhig gis nus pa las byung ba'i yal ga gzhan dag thos shing da ltar yang nyung zad 'don par byed pa can 'ga' zhig kyang mthong ngo //
translated: We see that some people have learned some of the branches of the Veda that have come down from the past, and we see that some of them recite a few of them even today.

original: de bzhin du rgya cher 'don par byed pa can 'ga' zhig kyang dus 'ga' zhig ge ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du rgya cher 'don par byed pa can 'ga' zhig kyang dus 'ga' zhig ge ste /
translated: Similarly, we see that some people recite a great deal of the Veda at some times.

original: nus pa srid pa'i phyir dang / yang skyes bu yid ches pa'i shes pas rab tu mang po khas blangs pa yod pa srid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nus pa srid pa'i phyir dang / yang skyes bu yid ches pa'i shes pas rab tu mang po khas blangs pa yod pa srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is possible because it is possible that some people have the ability to do so, and it is possible that many people have accepted the Veda on the basis of the knowledge of trustworthy persons.

original: yang rgya cher 'don par byed pa po'i skyes bu 'ga' zhig gi tshe 'don pa brjed pa /
analyzed: yang rgya cher 'don par byed pa po'i skyes bu 'ga' zhig gi tshe 'don pa brjed pa /
translated: Moreover, it is possible that some people who recite the Veda a great deal forget the recitation at some time.

original: 'don par byed pa can de dag dang / gzhan srid pa nyams pa'i 'jig pa la sogs pas rnam par gzhan du srid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'don par byed pa can de dag dang / gzhan srid pa nyams pa'i 'jig pa la sogs pas rnam par gzhan du srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: and others, who are the authors of the recitations, and because of the possibility of other changes in the world, such as the destruction of the world.

original: de shes pa las kyang de la dad pa dag dpyod pa med par rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de shes pa las kyang de la dad pa dag dpyod pa med par rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: And because of the understanding of that, those who have faith in it understand it without analysis.

original: 'dod par byed pa po mang po dag la skyes bu yid ches pa las mang du rtogs pa mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'dod par byed pa po mang po dag la skyes bu yid ches pa las mang du rtogs pa mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: And because of the many who desire it, one sees that many people understand it from the trustworthy person.

original: de las kyang rnam pa 'ga' zhig gis 'khrul pa srid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de las kyang rnam pa 'ga' zhig gis 'khrul pa srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: And because of the possibility of error by some of them.

original: gzhan yang skyes bu 'chad pa po'i nyung zad 'chad pa'i brgyud pa nyid 'di la khyed kyis kyang mnyan par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: gzhan yang skyes bu 'chad pa po'i nyung zad 'chad pa'i brgyud pa nyid 'di la khyed kyis kyang mnyan par bya ba yin no //
translated: Moreover, this lineage of the few explanations of the person who explains should be listened to by you.

original: de la rnam par sdang ba dang / mi shes pa dang / spyang po dag gi nang nas 'ga' zhig gang las rung bar 'gyur ba'i phyir yid brtan par bya ba ma yin no //
analyzed: de la rnam par sdang ba dang / mi shes pa dang / spyang po dag gi nang nas 'ga' zhig gang las rung bar 'gyur ba'i phyir yid brtan par bya ba ma yin no //
translated: And because of the possibility of some from among the hostile, the ignorant, and the intelligent, it is not to be trusted.

original: de bas na skyes bus ma byas pa'i bshad pa las ma yin zhing /
analyzed: de bas na skyes bus ma byas pa'i bshad pa las ma yin zhing /
translated: Therefore, it is not from an explanation that is not by a person.

original: brda las byung ba'i 'jig rten gyi tha snyad las kyang rig byed kyi don grub pa ma yin no //
analyzed: brda las byung ba'i 'jig rten gyi tha snyad las kyang rig byed kyi don grub pa ma yin no //
translated: Nor is the meaning of the Vedas established by worldly conventions that arise from linguistic signs.

original: brda las byung ba ma yin pa la yang don sna tshogs pa can gyi sgra rnams kyi tha snyad mthong ba'i phyir ma grub pa'i don can nam /
analyzed: brda las byung ba ma yin pa la yang don sna tshogs pa can gyi sgra rnams kyi tha snyad mthong ba'i phyir ma grub pa'i don can nam /
translated: Nor is it the case that the meaning of words with various meanings is not derived from linguistic signs, because we see that conventions are seen for them.

original: rab tu ma grags pa'i 'ga' @361b zhig gi yang bshad pa mthong bas thams cad du de'i dogs pa mi ldog pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rab tu ma grags pa'i 'ga' @361b zhig gi yang bshad pa mthong bas thams cad du de'i dogs pa mi ldog pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Nor is it the case that the meaning is not established, because we see explanations of some words that are not well known, and therefore the doubt that they have any meaning is not eliminated.

original: thams cad don ji lta ba bzhin du nges par sbyar ba na yang rjes su mthun par brda ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa bskyed pa'i phyir dang / 'dod pa dang mi 'dod pa dag la khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thams cad don ji lta ba bzhin du nges par sbyar ba na yang rjes su mthun par brda ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa bskyed pa'i phyir dang / 'dod pa dang mi 'dod pa dag la khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Even when all words are used according to their meaning, the meaning is understood according to the linguistic sign that is consistent with it, because there is no difference between what is desired and what is not desired.

original: don thams cad la khyad par med pa dag ni lkog tu gyur pa dang 'brel pa can gyi don gcig lkog tu gyur pa mthong ba ma yin pa'i skyes bu tha mal pa la su zhig rnam par 'byed par 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: don thams cad la khyad par med pa dag ni lkog tu gyur pa dang 'brel pa can gyi don gcig lkog tu gyur pa mthong ba ma yin pa'i skyes bu tha mal pa la su zhig rnam par 'byed par 'gyur zhing /
translated: Who would distinguish the hidden meaning of a single sentence that is related to a hidden object, which is not seen by an ordinary person who is not a knower of the hidden?

original: gang zhig 'jig rten gyi tha snyad las rtogs par 'gyur /
analyzed: gang zhig 'jig rten gyi tha snyad las rtogs par 'gyur /
translated: And how could it be understood from worldly conventions?

original: gzhan yang bdag nyid kyang thams cad du grags pa'i rjes su 'brang bar mi byed do //
analyzed: gzhan yang bdag nyid kyang thams cad du grags pa'i rjes su 'brang bar mi byed do //
translated: Moreover, the author himself does not follow what is well known.üîΩThus, he says:

original: 'di ltar / 'di nyid kyis brjod par gyur pa //
analyzed: 'di ltar / 'di nyid kyis brjod par gyur pa //
translated: The meaning of what is not well known is stated in the verse:

original: grags min don brjod mtho ris dang // lha mo la sogs sgra mthong ngo //
analyzed: grags min don brjod mtho ris dang // lha mo la sogs sgra mthong ngo //
translated: ‚ÄúOne sees the sound of celestial maidens and so on in the higher realms.‚Äù

original: mi las phul du byung ba skyes bu khyad par can gyi gnas dang / mi las 'das pa'i bde ba'i rten dang / nye bar mkho ba rnam pa sna tshogs pa can ni mtho ris so //
analyzed: mi las phul du byung ba skyes bu khyad par can gyi gnas dang / mi las 'das pa'i bde ba'i rten dang / nye bar mkho ba rnam pa sna tshogs pa can ni mtho ris so //
translated: The higher realms are the abode of special beings who are superior to humans, the basis of superhuman bliss, and the source of various necessities.

original: der gnas pa'i lha'i bu mo la lha mo zhes 'jig rten na brjod do //
analyzed: der gnas pa'i lha'i bu mo la lha mo zhes 'jig rten na brjod do //
translated: Celestial maidens are the daughters of the gods who dwell there, and are called ‚Äúcelestial maidens‚Äù in the world.

original: de la brten pa med pa don gzhan nyid la rnam par rtog par byed pa na 'di skra gzhan dag la ji ltar rab tu grags pa tshad mar 'gyur /
analyzed: de la brten pa med pa don gzhan nyid la rnam par rtog par byed pa na 'di skra gzhan dag la ji ltar rab tu grags pa tshad mar 'gyur /
translated: If you imagine that the hair is something other than the basis of the illusion, how can the hair be well known to be a valid cognition?

original: de la gal te 'gal ba med pa'i phyir khas len to zhe na /
analyzed: de la gal te 'gal ba med pa'i phyir khas len to zhe na /
translated: If you accept that because there is no contradiction,

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: then that is not so.

original: dbang po las 'das pa 'di yang 'gal ba ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dbang po las 'das pa 'di yang 'gal ba ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because this is beyond the senses, the contradiction is not established.

original: gzhan dag la yang 'gal ba med par rtogs par dka' ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan dag la yang 'gal ba med par rtogs par dka' ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: And because it is difficult to understand that there is no contradiction with regard to others.

original: me'i sbyin sreg las mtho ris thob pa 'gal du zin kyang blo dman pa'i phyir 'dis shes par yang mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: me'i sbyin sreg las mtho ris thob pa 'gal du zin kyang blo dman pa'i phyir 'dis shes par yang mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Even though the attainment of heaven from fire sacrifice is a contradiction, because of their inferior intellects, they do not understand this.

original: 'gal ba dang 'gal ba med pa dag ni gnod pa can dang / sgrub par byed pa'i tshad ma 'jug pa yin no //
analyzed: 'gal ba dang 'gal ba med pa dag ni gnod pa can dang / sgrub par byed pa'i tshad ma 'jug pa yin no //
translated: Contradiction and noncontradiction are the engagement of the valid cognitions that refute and prove.

original: de dag kyang lkog tu gyur pa la mngon par 'dod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de dag kyang lkog tu gyur pa la mngon par 'dod pa ma yin no //
translated: And those are not accepted with regard to the obscure.

original: de bas na ji ltar na de'i dbang gis rtogs pa yin /
analyzed: de bas na ji ltar na de'i dbang gis rtogs pa yin /
translated: Therefore, how can understanding be due to that?

original: tshig 'jug pa nyid kyi phyir yang 'gal ba med pa ma yin te /
analyzed: tshig 'jug pa nyid kyi phyir yang 'gal ba med pa ma yin te /
translated: It is not that there is no contradiction because the words are used.

original: gzhan dag la yang thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan dag la yang thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it would follow that the same is true of others.

original: lung 'di ni skyes bus ma byas pa yin la de ni 'jig rten gyi grags pa las don grub pa yin no //
analyzed: lung 'di ni skyes bus ma byas pa yin la de ni 'jig rten gyi grags pa las don grub pa yin no //
translated: This scripture is not composed by a person, and its meaning is established by the world‚Äôs testimony.

original: de la yang 'gal ba dpyod pa na lung ni yid brtan du med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de la yang 'gal ba dpyod pa na lung ni yid brtan du med par 'gyur ro //
translated: But when one analyzes the contradiction, the scripture is not reliable.

original: de yod du zin kyang don de bzhin du ma yin pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de yod du zin kyang don de bzhin du ma yin pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Even if it were reliable, it would not be a valid means of knowledge with regard to that meaning, because it has a different meaning.

original: tshad ma mi 'jug pas gzhan dag kyang dogs par bya ba nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //üîΩmtho ris 'dod @362a * //
analyzed: tshad ma mi 'jug pas gzhan dag kyang dogs par bya ba nyid yin pa'i phyir ro // mtho ris 'dod @362a * //
translated: Therefore, it is not a valid means of knowledge, and others would have to doubt it.üîΩOne should make a fire offering with the desire for heaven.

original: pas me la sbyin sreg sbyin par bya'o zhes bya ba 'di la khyi'i sha za ba'i brjod pa'i rnam par rtog par 'gyur ba zhes bshad pa gang yin pa de mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: pas me la sbyin sreg sbyin par bya'o zhes bya ba 'di la khyi'i sha za ba'i brjod pa'i rnam par rtog par 'gyur ba zhes bshad pa gang yin pa de mi 'gyur te /
translated: This is not a case of the imagination of the expression that one should eat dog meat,

original: yul gzhan dag tu de ltar 'di bshad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yul gzhan dag tu de ltar 'di bshad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is explained in that way in other countries.

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: No, it is not.

original: de'i don yongs su shes pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i don yongs su shes pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the meaning of that is not fully understood.

original: yul gzhan dag tu yang de lta bu'i don gyi rnam par rtog pa ni bzlog pa med pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: yul gzhan dag tu yang de lta bu'i don gyi rnam par rtog pa ni bzlog pa med pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: And because such conceptualization of the meaning of a statement is not eliminated in other places.

original: gal te skyes bus ma byas pa'i sgra'i phung po 'di la lar don rtogs pa can du 'gyur ba de'i tshe de las don rtogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te skyes bus ma byas pa'i sgra'i phung po 'di la lar don rtogs pa can du 'gyur ba de'i tshe de las don rtogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: If this collection of words not produced by a person were sometimes to have a meaning that is understood, then at that time one would understand the meaning from it.

original: de dag gis phal cher yang thams cad long ba nyid yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de dag gis phal cher yang thams cad long ba nyid yin pa'i phyir /
translated: But because most of them are completely unknown,

original: ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du byed do //
analyzed: ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du byed do //
translated: one acts as one wishes.üîΩTherefore,

original: de'i phyir / de 'dra'i sgra gzhan dag la ni //
analyzed: de'i phyir / de 'dra'i sgra gzhan dag la ni //
translated: in other statements of that kind,

original: de 'dra'i rnam rtog nyid du 'gyur //
analyzed: de 'dra'i rnam rtog nyid du 'gyur //
translated: there would be that kind of conceptualization.

original: mtho ris 'dod pas me la sbyin sreg sbyin par bya'o //
analyzed: mtho ris 'dod pas me la sbyin sreg sbyin par bya'o //
translated: ‚ÄúOne should offer a sacrifice to fire for the sake of attaining heaven.‚Äù

original: zhes bya ba'i ngag 'di ci 'dra ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i ngag 'di ci 'dra ba'o //
translated: This statement is just like that.üîΩMoreover,

original: gzhan yang / grags pa dag kyang mi rnams tshig /
analyzed: gzhan yang / grags pa dag kyang mi rnams tshig /
translated: people also say that the Vedas are authoritative.

original: de ni tshad mar mi 'dod na //üîΩde las yang yang don rtogs pa //
analyzed: de ni tshad mar mi 'dod na // de las yang yang don rtogs pa //
translated: If you do not accept that they are valid,üîΩthen what is the use of the desire

original: sdang 'dod des ni ci zhig bya //
analyzed: sdang 'dod des ni ci zhig bya //
translated: to understand the meaning again and again?

original: skye bo'i rab tu brjod pa las gzhan du rab tu grags pa zhes bya ba gzhan ni med do //
analyzed: skye bo'i rab tu brjod pa las gzhan du rab tu grags pa zhes bya ba gzhan ni med do //
translated: There is no other so-called ‚Äútradition‚Äù apart from the statements of people.

original: skye bo de dag thams cad ji lta ba de lta bu can gyi tshig can du bsam par bya ba ma yin pa de bas na rab tu brjod pa ni tshad ma ma yin te /
analyzed: skye bo de dag thams cad ji lta ba de lta bu can gyi tshig can du bsam par bya ba ma yin pa de bas na rab tu brjod pa ni tshad ma ma yin te /
translated: And since all people are not to be considered as having statements that are in conformity with fact, tradition is not a means of valid cognition,

original: 'dod chags la sogs pa dang / ma rig pa dang ldan pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: 'dod chags la sogs pa dang / ma rig pa dang ldan pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because people are subject to desire and so on and to ignorance.

original: 'ga' zhig gi yang dag pa'i 'jug pa med pa na phal cher don dang ldan par 'gyur ba ma yin te /
analyzed: 'ga' zhig gi yang dag pa'i 'jug pa med pa na phal cher don dang ldan par 'gyur ba ma yin te /
translated: And even when there is no error in the statements of some people, it is not the case that they are mostly meaningful,

original: par si ga ma bag mar len pa'i log pa'i spyod pa bzhin no //
analyzed: par si ga ma bag mar len pa'i log pa'i spyod pa bzhin no //
translated: like the perverse behavior of the groom at the wedding of a girl from the PƒÅrashara clan.

original: skyes bu de dag nyid kyi tshig las kyang lkog tu gyur pa'i don rtogs pa de ltar na /
analyzed: skyes bu de dag nyid kyi tshig las kyang lkog tu gyur pa'i don rtogs pa de ltar na /
translated: And even from the statements of those very people, the object that is hidden is not understood in that way.

original: ji ltar de nyid cig car sdang bar bya ba dang 'dod par bya ba yin /üîΩci ste grags pa las brgal ba'i //
analyzed: ji ltar de nyid cig car sdang bar bya ba dang 'dod par bya ba yin / ci ste grags pa las brgal ba'i //
translated: How could it be that very thing that is to be hated and desired at the same time?üîΩBut if it is argued that it is not a means of valid cognition because it is not a means of knowing the hidden,

original: rtog la rgyu med nyid yin no //
analyzed: rtog la rgyu med nyid yin no //
translated: then the imagination of what is not a means of valid cognition is groundless.

original: rab grags tshad ma nyid min phyir //
analyzed: rab grags tshad ma nyid min phyir //
translated: because it is not a valid cognition.

original: de 'dzin la rgyu ci zhig yod //
analyzed: de 'dzin la rgyu ci zhig yod //
translated: What is the cause for apprehending it?

original: gal te phrad pa bzlog pas gzhan du 'jug pa'i yon tan dang / skyon mthong ba na rigs pa de ltar na rab tu grags pa'i rjes su 'gro ba yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gal te phrad pa bzlog pas gzhan du 'jug pa'i yon tan dang / skyon mthong ba na rigs pa de ltar na rab tu grags pa'i rjes su 'gro ba yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that it is a valid cognition because it is the opposite of contact, and because it is the seeing of the qualities and faults of the other, then it is the same for the well-known.

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: No, it is not.

original: phrad pa ni tshad ma 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid can yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: phrad pa ni tshad ma 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid can yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because contact is the characteristic of the engagement of valid cognition.

original: rab tu grags pa'i tshad ma nyid ma yin pa'i sgo nas rtogs par @362b gzung ba gang yin pa ni cir yang mi rung ngo //
analyzed: rab tu grags pa'i tshad ma nyid ma yin pa'i sgo nas rtogs par @362b gzung ba gang yin pa ni cir yang mi rung ngo //
translated: What is apprehended through the non-valid cognition of the well-known is not suitable for anything.

original: thob par dka' ba'i rigs pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: thob par dka' ba'i rigs pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because it is difficult to attain the nature of reasoning.

analyzed: rang dang gzhan gyi rnam par rtog pa rnam pa gnyi ga'i yang 'jug pa mtshungs pa de ltar na rab tu grags pa'i rjes su byed pa ci zhig yod / gzhan yang / grags pa nyid kyis sgra don gyi //
translated: In that way, what is the imitation of the well-known when the engagement of both types of conceptions, one's own and others', are the same?üîΩMoreover,üîΩthe generation of doubt regarding

original: nges la la dogs pa bskyed pa ni //
analyzed: nges la la dogs pa bskyed pa ni //
translated: the ascertainment of the meaning of the words by mere renown,

original: gang phyir de la sgra rnams don //
analyzed: gang phyir de la sgra rnams don //
translated: Because the words are seen to have

original: sna tshogs 'jug pa can nyid mthong //
analyzed: sna tshogs 'jug pa can nyid mthong //

analyzed: sgra rnams ni rab tu grags pa las don gcig tu nges pa ma yin te /

original: de nyid las dogs pa skye ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de nyid las dogs pa skye ba'i phyir ro //

analyzed: 'jig rten la sgra'i don sna tshogs pa can du snang ba dang / 'jig rten gyi brjod pa ni grags pa yin no //
translated: The various meanings of words appear in the world, and the usage of words in the world is well known.

analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir don sna tshogs pa can yin pa'i phyir /

analyzed: de las don gyi nges pa rigs pa ma yin no //

original: nges byed ma mthong ba dag gis //
analyzed: nges byed ma mthong ba dag gis //

original: sna tshogs nus can sgra rang nyid //
analyzed: sna tshogs nus can sgra rang nyid //

original: nges par dogs par bya ba yin te //
analyzed: nges par dogs par bya ba yin te //

analyzed: rnam gzhan mi srid med phyir ro //

analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bar skabs kyi tshigs su bcad pa'o //

original: de bas na don gyi dbye ba rigs pa med pa can gyi sgra dag gi don gcig lkog tu gyur pa dang 'brel pa can dmigs pa med pa sgro btags pa can don gcig nges par byas nas rgyal dpog pa 'chad par byed pa na /
analyzed: de bas na don gyi dbye ba rigs pa med pa can gyi sgra dag gi don gcig lkog tu gyur pa dang 'brel pa can dmigs pa med pa sgro btags pa can don gcig nges par byas nas rgyal dpog pa 'chad par byed pa na /
translated: Therefore, when the Mƒ´mƒÅ·πÉsakas explain that the meaning of words that have no logical connection to the meaning is related to a hidden object, that is not observed, and is a superimposition, they do so after ascertaining the same point.

original: de'i zol gyis bdag nyid de skad du smra ba'i phyir /
analyzed: de'i zol gyis bdag nyid de skad du smra ba'i phyir /

analyzed: de ltar na don de gsal bar byed pa'i bya bas stong ba der sgro 'dogs par brjod pas rang gi tshig khyad par du byas pa med do //

analyzed: de byed pa can gyi 'dul ba nyid log pa 'ba' zhig bdag nyid gsal bar byed par 'gyur ro //

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /

analyzed: 'ga' zhig lam ni 'di yin zhes //

original: sdong du ma 'di ni smra 'gyur zhes //

original: de dag bye brag brtag par bya //
analyzed: de dag bye brag brtag par bya //

analyzed: bsam pa dang bya ba dang tshig med pa can gyi sdong du ma la sgro btags nas ston par byed pa'am /

analyzed: rang rgyud pa'i bdag nyid tshig khas len pa la /

analyzed: gzhan yang don nges pa yod na de dag rgyal dpog pas shes par 'gyur ro //

original: thams cad la don rung gcig gis //
analyzed: thams cad la don rung gcig gis //

original: gsal byed la nges gang las yin //
analyzed: gsal byed la nges gang las yin //

analyzed: gang gis dbang po las 'das shes // brjod par 'dod pa 'ga' zhig gis //
translated: How can one know that which is beyond the senses?üîΩIf there were a sound that was produced by a person,

original: skyes bus byas pa'i sgra yod na nges de 'ga' zhig gi tshe 'ga' zhig la shes par byed par 'gyur ba'i yang phyir ro //
analyzed: skyes bus byas pa'i sgra yod na nges de 'ga' zhig gi tshe 'ga' zhig la shes par byed par 'gyur ba'i yang phyir ro //
translated: then at some time or other, it would be known by someone who wanted to hear it.

original: brjod par 'dod pa sngon du song ba can gyi sgra rnams kyi don nges par yang rtogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: brjod par 'dod pa sngon du song ba can gyi sgra rnams kyi don nges par yang rtogs par 'gyur ro //

original: skyes bus ma byas pa yod na yang don nges pa ji ltar rnam par shes par 'gyur te /
analyzed: skyes bus ma byas pa yod na yang don nges pa ji ltar rnam par shes par 'gyur te /

original: rang bzhin tha dad pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rang bzhin tha dad pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because there is no difference in the nature of the sound.

original: yod na yang mngon sum bdag nyid kyis rtogs par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yod na yang mngon sum bdag nyid kyis rtogs par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //

original: mngon sum nyid ma yin na yang /
analyzed: mngon sum nyid ma yin na yang /
translated: And if it is not direct perception,

original: 'ga' zhig gis kyang shes par mi nus pa nyid kyi phyir ro /
analyzed: 'ga' zhig gis kyang shes par mi nus pa nyid kyi phyir ro /

original: khyad par cung zhig kyang yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: khyad par cung zhig kyang yod pa ma yin te /

original: sgra thams cad ni don thams cad dang nye ba dang bskal ba dang bral ba nyid yin no //
analyzed: sgra thams cad ni don thams cad dang nye ba dang bskal ba dang bral ba nyid yin no //

original: de'i phyir de dag ni /üîΩnges pa'i brjod 'dod rgyu yin zhing //
analyzed: de'i phyir de dag ni / nges pa'i brjod 'dod rgyu yin zhing //
translated: Therefore,üîΩthey are the cause of the desire to express.

original: brda ni de yi gsal byed yin //
analyzed: brda ni de yi gsal byed yin //
translated: The convention is the revealer of that.

original: de ni skyes min la med na //
analyzed: de ni skyes min la med na //
translated: If that is not in the unproduced,

original: de don gcig can de gang las //
analyzed: de don gcig can de gang las //
translated: how can it have the same meaning as that?

original: brjod par 'dod pas sgra ni don dag la nges par bya ba yin gyi ngo bo nyid kyis ni ma yin te /
analyzed: brjod par 'dod pas sgra ni don dag la nges par bya ba yin gyi ngo bo nyid kyis ni ma yin te /

original: de ni 'ga' zhig la yang rag lug pa med par thams cad la mtshungs pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni 'ga' zhig la yang rag lug pa med par thams cad la mtshungs pa nyid kyi phyir ro //

original: gang la rag las pa yin na yang de rjod par byed pa'i nges pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gang la rag las pa yin na yang de rjod par byed pa'i nges pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Even if it does depend on something, there is no determination of that as the expresser.

original: sgra thams cad kyi byed pa rnams brjod par thal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sgra thams cad kyi byed pa rnams brjod par thal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: It follows that the activity of all words would be expressed.

original: de bas na brjod par 'dod pa gsal bar bya ba'i phyir bsam pa ston par byed pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi brda byas pa yin no //
analyzed: de bas na brjod par 'dod pa gsal bar bya ba'i phyir bsam pa ston par byed pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi brda byas pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, a convention is made that has the characteristic of revealing the intention in order to reveal the desire to express.

original: skyes bus ma byas pa la ni brjod par 'dod pa med cing brda med de 'ga' zhig gi yang bsam pa med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: skyes bus ma byas pa la ni brjod par 'dod pa med cing brda med de 'ga' zhig gi yang bsam pa med pa'i phyir /
translated: But if it is not made by people, then there is no desire to express, no convention, and no thought of anyone.

original: nges pa med cing de shes pa med do //
analyzed: nges pa med cing de shes pa med do //
translated: There is no certainty, and there is no cognition of it.

original: rang bzhin gyis ni nges yin la //
analyzed: rang bzhin gyis ni nges yin la //
translated: It is not certain by nature.

original: gzhan la nges kyang mi rung ngo //
analyzed: gzhan la nges kyang mi rung ngo //
translated: Nor is it certain in relation to others.

original: gal te brda la ltos pa med par sgra ngo bo nyid kyis don dag la 'dres par 'gyur ro zhe na /üîΩ'dir rag lus pa med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gal te brda la ltos pa med par sgra ngo bo nyid kyis don dag la 'dres par 'gyur ro zhe na / 'dir rag lus pa med pa'i phyir /
translated: If it is argued that a word would be mixed up with its meaning by its intrinsic nature, without depending on a convention,

original: nges pa yod pa ma yin no zhes bshad zin to //
analyzed: nges pa yod pa ma yin no zhes bshad zin to //
translated: then it has been explained that there is no certainty because there is no dependence.

analyzed: gzhan yang ngo bo nyid yis brjod par bya ba dang rjod par byed pa'i ngo bo yin na ni /
translated: Moreover, if the intrinsic nature is the nature of the expressed and the expresser,

analyzed: brjod par 'dod pas kyang ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du nges par sbyar du mi rung ngo //
translated: then it would not be suitable for the one who desires to express to apply it as he wishes.

original: brda yang don med can nyid 'gyur //
analyzed: brda yang don med can nyid 'gyur //
translated: And the convention would be meaningless.

original: rang bzhin tha dad pa dbang po'i rtogs par bya ba ni rang @363b nyid rtogs pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rang bzhin tha dad pa dbang po'i rtogs par bya ba ni rang @363b nyid rtogs pa'i phyir /

original: spyi btang ba la sogs pa la ltos pa ma yin te /
analyzed: spyi btang ba la sogs pa la ltos pa ma yin te /
translated: It is not dependent on a convention, etc.

original: sngon po la sogs pa'i khyad par bzhin no //
analyzed: sngon po la sogs pa'i khyad par bzhin no //
translated: It is like the particularities of blue, etc.

original: de la ltos pa'i rtogs pa can dag ni dngos po'i rang bzhin ma yin no //
analyzed: de la ltos pa'i rtogs pa can dag ni dngos po'i rang bzhin ma yin no //
translated: The realists, who are dependent on that, are not the nature of things.

original: 'o na ci yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci yin zhe na /
translated: What are they, then?

original: brdar byas pa yin te /
analyzed: brdar byas pa yin te /
translated: They are a convention.

original: rgyal po'i rtags la sogs pa bzhin no //
analyzed: rgyal po'i rtags la sogs pa bzhin no //
translated: They are like the insignia of a king, etc.

original: brdar byas pa gang yin pa de ni de'i rang bzhin nyid du nges par rigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: brdar byas pa gang yin pa de ni de'i rang bzhin nyid du nges par rigs pa ma yin te /

original: de ni 'dod pas 'jug pa yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de ni 'dod pas 'jug pa yin pa'i phyir /

original: de nyid kyi phyir /üîΩbrda las rang bzhin khyad par gyi //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir / brda las rang bzhin khyad par gyi //
translated: For that very reason,üîΩHow can the nature of a thing

original: gsal ba'i nges pa'ang gang las yin //
analyzed: gsal ba'i nges pa'ang gang las yin //
translated: Be ascertained by a convention?

analyzed: rang gi 'dod pas 'jug pa'i brda de ni 'di nyid la bya bar nus kyi //
translated: That convention, which is engaged by desire, is able to be applied to this,

analyzed: gzhan la ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i gnod pa yod pa ma yin no //

analyzed: de ni skyes bu dag gis rang nyid kyi 'dod pa byas pa na rang bzhin de nyid gsal bar byed kyi /

analyzed: de gzhan ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i nges pa yod pa ma yin no //
translated: then it is not established by itself.üîΩIf it is established by itself,üîΩhow can it be established by another?

analyzed: gang la 'dod pas rang rgyud pas //

analyzed: gang phyir rig byed phyogs gcig phyir //

analyzed: de skad gzhan dag zer ro lo //

analyzed: phyin ci ma log pa yin te /
translated: If it is established by itself,üîΩhow can it be established by another?üîΩIf it is established by another,üîΩthen it is not established by itself.üîΩIf it is established by itself,üîΩhow can it be established by another?üîΩIf it is established by another,üîΩthen it is not established by itself.

analyzed: dper na me ni kha ba'i gnyen po yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i ngag bden pa lta bu'o zhes smra'o //
